11111.content:
Naruto was running to meet his team for training.

"Man, Why dose Kakashi-sensi get on MY case for being late when he never shows up on time?!?" Naruto complaned, why did he come back to the Leaf village? He was happy with them, they accepted him, demon and all. And then, there was HER. Of all the things he remembered, her personality stood out in his mind, it was so much like his own, She was fiercely independent, sarcastic, direct, brutally frank, and confrontational. carefree and adventurous, and she was very tomboyish in the way she acts and dresses, loves battling and takes great pride in her earth-manipulating skills. She was always eager to prove that she is as strong as anyone else, she was born blind and she didn't let that stop her. He also remembered how he loved being around her since she didn’t know him or judge him as the village idiot or the carrier of the Nine Tailed Fox like most of Hidden Leaf Village did. She was like him in that they both we treated differently since they were born because of things that made them different that they didn’t have control over. He was shunned and hated for what he was by the villagers while SHE was treated as weak and helpless by her family. Naruto never asked to carry the demon and SHE never asked to be blind but they got used to it over time and even turned it into an advantage that made them stronger than most. They took what made them different and made themselves stronger with it. Both had always been treated different and wanted to be treated as normal people not a blind helpless girl and a village idiot with a hated demon inside them. The one place where they had found someone who wouldn’t be biased by what they were was with each other. Suddenly, a hole in the ground opened up right under him. As soon as he got up to his neck, the ground closed around him, trapping him. Naruto's eyes widened, was this an earth-style jutsu? No...he knew this technique. But...how on earth did she here?!

"Hello, Ninja-boy. Remember me?"

Naruto blushed and gulped at the same time. There was no mistaking that voice, they had traviled together, they had shared eachother's secrets, and among other things, they had sneaked into the Earth King's party acting as a couple.

"Toph?"

Toph came around into his fild of vision. Smiling.

"So this is your village? Nice place, I like the giant mountan with the stone carvings on on it best. Well...second best."

Naruto felt himself getting redder in the face by the second, Toph could tell of course, she could feel vibrations to tell a person's bodly reactions to know if a person was lying of embarissed.

"Now...about you leaving me behind..." Toph's good good mode disappered, she frowned

"Toph, please! I didn't WANT to leave you! You can tell when a person's lying! I wanted to stay! Honest!!!!!!!!!!!"

Toph knew he was telling the truth, but she still wanted to have some fun with him.

"Alright Ninja-boy. But I want to enjoy you, after all, you took part of me with you when you came back here. Now, I think I'll have some foot-fun with you, Naruto."

"Yes it's real, you've shrunk."

Naruto gapped up at the tan-skinned giantess. HE'D SHRUNK?!

How did that happen?!

However, he had bigger problems at the moment, literally! And those problems were currently towering over him with a sneer on her face. Naruto finally took the time to look at his tormentor. She had ocean blue eyes, dark skin that indicated a life in the sun and dark brown hair, it was braided into a long braided into two... What could something like that be called...? Was hair-loopies a real word...? She also wore clothes made out of blue material. Naruto had to admit to himself, despite how she'd treated him and the nasty smirk on her face, she was quite attractive. Those thoughts about her were cut short as her foot lightly slammed onto him and pinned him under her with just enough pressure to keep him imobile but not enough to hurt him. His head was between her big and second toes.

"You know, I think its past time we were introduced, I'm Katara." she said in a friendly tone.

"Naruto Uzumaki...and why have you been doing this to me?!" Naruto shouted up at her.

Katara sighed and looked at him with remorse. "To be honest, its nothing personal, I just need to vent."

She then told Naruto all about what happened to her mother and that Fire Nation solidger.

"Wait...this guy that killed your mother...did you...?" Naruto asked in horror.

He felt happy for her when the giantess who was now rubbing her feet aganst him to massage her feet shook her head no.

"I thought so...you don't have a killer's eyes...there's no blood on your hands. For what its worth, I think you made the right choice and I'm sure your mother would say the same thing." Naruto said with a smile.

Katara smiled at him as she used his head to massage between her toes.

"...You know...I had a friend who sold his soul for reenge...he had a near utopea-life, and he threw it all away because he wanted to put blood on his hands...I tired to stop him...I failed of course, seeing as the only way to stop him would be to kill him...I regreted not being able to stop him, but I'm glad he's still alie." Naruto said.

Katara's eyes went wide at this information.

"So...I'm guessing you shrunk me and have been using me as a scapegoate because you refuse to kill." Naruto said.

Katara nodded and Naruto smiled up at her.

"So...my little fox-faced friend...mind if I keep ypu as my foot-property?" Katara asked.

Sighing, Naruto nodded and Katara gave him a soft, gentle, grateful, and bright smile.

Knowing he'd just perminitly condemed himself to belonging to Katara as her personal pet for the rest of his life, Naruto sighed as Katara held him up by his head between her toes. Only one thought crossed his mind.

The things I do to keep people from revenge...
11211211112111.title: The things I do to keep people from revenge...

112112111121111.content:
“Oh thank you so much Naruto,” Katara said as Naruto’s shrunken body hung suspended in the air between her toes. “I know having you as a tiny attendant to my feet will really help me relax and forget about all the horrors I’ve had to go through in my life.”

Naruto sighed inside before responding. Although he’d ultimately accepted his new position in life as plaything for Katara’s feet, it didn’t mean he was going to actually enjoy it. At the same time, he didn’t want to make Katara upset in any way. He eventually decided the only thing he could do was to always outwardly appear to be happy servicing Katara’s feet, no matter how hard that task proved to be.

“Oh….don’t you worry about it…” Naruto began despite his voice always being somewhat muffled by Katara’s monstrous toes. “I’m just glad to…” his sentence began to trail off, and he gulped before continuing, “To have the honor of indulging your lovely feet,” he finished, having force himself to spit out the words honor, indulging, and lovely.

Katara didn’t seem to notice the difficult time Naruto had with his last sentence, or if she did, she didn‘t feel the need to mention it. “That’s great Naruto…” Katara responded before pausing abruptly. Naruto, unable to Katara’s full face from his current position, wondered what could have made the girl stop all of a sudden. Did she see something, or was she just deep in thought? Naruto would soon come to find that the latter was true.

“You know Naruto, I just thought of something. I should probably come up with a new name for you.” Katara finally said.

Naruto wasn‘t quite sure if he hard correctly. New name? Before he could stop himself he blurted out, “What? Why would you do that?”

“Well you see,” Katara started, “you’re my pet now, and that means I’m going to be treating you as such. If you still have a human name, then I’ll have a harder time truly thinking of you like an animal, and that just means I might be more resistant to using you in the various ways I may need to in order to calm myself and get over whatever is really bothering me. I may want to put you in situations that I would never subject another human being to.”

Naruto was shocked. This girl was really something. He had already pledged himself to her, or to be more apt, her feet, for the rest of his life, and if that wasn’t enough, here she was talking about renaming him. She basically wanted to strip him of what little humanity he had left so she could have an easier time of abusing him without feeling guilty.

He wanted to yell and berate her for being so callous, but since he was practically the size of one of her calluses himself, he figured that wasn’t the best course of action. Besides, he had already promised himself, and Katara unknowingly, that he’d do all he could to appease her. He couldn’t let her ever fall far enough into despair again that she’d seriously consider taking revenge on another.

“Oh that sounds like a great idea,” Naruto gritted between his teeth. “Did you have anything in mind?”

“I was thinking about just calling you Foot Pet, seeing as you are my pet, and you are going to be spending your life taking care of my feet. It’s just simple and easy to remember that way.” Katara answered.

“What have I gotten myself into?” Naruto thought as he mentally beat himself up. “Foot Pet? How utterly humiliating.”

“I’d just love to be called Foot Pet.” Naruto begrudgingly said, making his voice sound as happy as possible. “And Miss Katara, I also think…”

“Mistress Katara,” Katara corrected him as she interrupted his sentence midstream. “That’s another thing I was thinking about. It would really be a big boost to my self esteem if you referred to me as Mistress Katara when addressing me from now on.”

Naruto couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Mistress Katara? Having him shrunk down to be used as a toy by her feet wasn’t enough? Sticking him with a degrading name like Foot Pet wasn’t enough? Now he had to refer to her by the title of Mistress Katara. Even if was to help keep her on the path of righteousness, Naruto felt that last stipulation was a little much. He just had to see if he could change her mind on this one.

“Do I really have to call you Mistress Katara?” Naruto asked, not caring if Katara could sense the desperation beginning to seep into his voice. “I mean, your self esteem already seems very high to me and…”

“You have no idea!” Katara cried as she interrupted him once more, a distraught and reflective look appearing on her face. “I don’t let it show very often, but I’m really not very confident about myself at all in some respects. I already told you about my mother, and I how I couldn’t save her. But that’s not the only time I’ve been powerless in my life. Some time after my mother was killed, my father left my family to go fight against the Fire Nation, and I couldn’t do anything to stop him. I lost touch with him for several years because I was too weak. And then later, when I started to travel the world, I had no one to teach me Waterbending. I eventually convinced a Master to teach me, but only after he brutally beat me in a fight and proved he was my better. And even then, after that, a friend of mine almost died because I didn’t have the strength to protect him in battle. He was fatally wounded, and it was because of a mystic power, hardly my own doing, that he somehow survived.

“Having both your parents gone? Not having anyone to help you realize your full potential? Almost losing a friend because you weren‘t strong enough to protect them? God, it all sounds so familiar.” Naruto thought sadly to himself. “I still absolutely hate having to refer to her by a fancy title, but I guess it’s worth it if I can help her feel she has a little power for once in her life.”

“Don’t worry, Mistress Katara,” Naruto said, taking the plunge and getting used to the taste of those words on his tongue, “You have total control over me now, so there’s no reason to worry about being helpless any longer!”

Naruto must have gotten through to Katara, for her melancholy state dissipated, and she immediately perked up, shaking a little after hearing his last words. “Wow Foot Pet, you really are good at making me feel better!” Katara declared.

Naruto thought he may have heard Katara directly call him by his new name for the first time, but he wasn’t sure. He was still off the ground in the grasp of her toes, and her new shaking around was starting make him rather dizzy. He had to get her to put him down with offending her.

“Mistress Katara,” Naruto called out, “If it pleases you, could you maybe set me down on the ground? All this shaking is making me dizzy, and uhh…..if I’m dizzy I won’t be able to take care of your beautiful feet as well I should.”

Katara stopped moving around when she thought she heard parts of the tiny boy’s plea. “What was that Foot Pet? Set you down? My beautiful feet? Oh, I get it. You really want to get started on learning how to take care of my feet at your new size.” At that she quickly moved her leg once again, this time to the left. Naruto couldn’t tell where she was putting him, but all of a sudden her toes spread apart and he dropped from the air.

At his new, smaller stature, Naruto felt like he was falling a couple of stories when, at most, it could have only been a couple of inches. He was glad Katara had heard his request, but he just wished should would have moved her foot closer to the ground before releasing him. The landing was sure to hurt.

After falling for some time, Naruto eventually landed on the ground, or what he thought was the ground. The first thing he realized after coming to a stop was that his landing didn’t actually hurt at all, surprisingly. He was very thankful that whatever piece of ground Katara had dropped him on was very wet and squishy. The next thing noticed was how dark it was. He was surrounded by walls all around him except for above. “Did I land in some sort of well?” he muttered to no one in particular.

It was only after the surprise of falling so far, so fast, vanished, and the shock of landing somewhere unknown passed, did the smell finally hit him. Right away he covered his nose, breathing as little as possible. “Oh god what is that awful stench?! Sick!”

Katara looked down into her boot at Naruto covering part of his head and thought he was acting very peculiar. “Don’t tell me the fall into my boot hurt your nose Foot Pet. I know you’re stronger than that.” Katara called out.

Naruto heard this and quickly panicked for several reasons The first reason he was panicking was due to where Katara had said he was currently standing. “Her boot? Well that’s just perfect.” he thought sarcastically.

The second reason he was panicking was because if Katara figured out why he was covering his nose, she might get upset that he thought her boots stunk. Instantaneously, he uncovered his nose, breathing through his mouth best he could. “I’m fine Mistress Katara. The only reason I’m not hurt is because you’re so very smart and dropped me into your boot where I could land with ease,” Naruto yelled out in a sickeningly sweet voice.

“I guess it is good I dropped you in my boot Foot Pet,” Katara giggled, “but that really wasn’t my sole concern. Get it? Sole because you‘re my Foot Pet“ Katara said still giggling, now at her own joke. Eventually her laughter died down and she continued. “I was more focused on putting you in a place where you could really get close to, and take care of, my feet.”

Naruto exhaled dejectedly. “I should have seen that coming.” He then looked around, still trying to pay as little attention as possible to the overwhelming smell that permeated Katara’s boot. He couldn’t see much due to lack of light, but he could still walk around. He moved a little, feeling himself sink into the wet, spongy floor with every step, before lifting his leg and stepping along. The thought of the ground being wet with what he could only imagine was the Waterbender’s foot sweat made his stomach churn.

Naruto gradually noticed the floor of the boot was somewhat higher near the walls, and the light shining from above showed the ground was a little bit lighter there as well. This was opposed to the floor in the middle of the boot which was lower and much darker. The only thing Naruto could come up for the differences in elevation and color was that was he was walking around on what was a massive copy of Katara’s foot, imprinted on the sole of the boot from being worn so long. He decided to get some information on his new prison.

“Mistress Katara, if I may ask, how long have you had these boots?” Naruto questioned.

“Foot Pet, why do you want to know something as pointless as that?” Katara questioned back.

Naruto didn’t expect a question in response to his question, and he didn’t have answer on hand that Katara would likely find suitable. He hastily made something up. “ Mistress Katara, I er…uh…wish to know everything I can about your feet so that I can better tend to them. This includes what vessels you bless with their presence from time to time.”

“I’ve got stop putting myself in situations where I have to suck up to her. I’m running out of big words.” Naruto thought after trying to answer Katara‘s question.

A slight blush found it’s way to Katara’s face. “Foot Pet, I can tell our relationship is going to please me for years to come. And to answer your question, I’ve had those same boots practically forever from when I lived back at the South Pole. As I’m sure you’ve already discovered, running around the snow back in the day, and fighting to save the world in the them during recent times, has made the insides kind of dirty. They’ve held up pretty good all things considered.”

Naruto considered the phrase kind of dirty the understatement of the century. “A disgusting imprint of your foot darker than a black hole in the depths of the universe is more like it. I’d be surprised if light can escape these things. And…”

Naruto’s thoughts were interrupted when Katara continued speaking. “I’m getting bored Foot Pet, so I think it’s time for you to actually get to work. Better lay down, because here comes my foot.” Katara, doing as she said she would, began to lower her foot into her boot. Naruto just looked up in horror, watching the massive girl’s foot descend upon him. He then thought of one last thing to say to her.

“Mistress Katara, before you reward me with your foot, I feel it my duty to inform you that you seem to have forgotten to put on your socks.” Naruto yelled, hoping to make hell just a little bit more bearable.

Katara just laughed. “That’s very kind of you Foot Pet, but I don’t wear socks. I did at South Pole where it was very cold, but I haven’t needed them since then in the warmer parts of the world. It hasn’t really been a problem, except for the fact that my feet get really sweaty and smelly without them. It bothers my friends some, but a girl has to just let loose every now and then.”

Naruto’s jaw dropped. “No socks? Smelly? Sweaty? Oh no no no no.” was all that his mind could come up with.

Lucky for Naruto, Katara didn’t immediately continue moving her foot down. She seemed to be thinking about something before speaking. “Foot Pet, you’ve handled yourself nicely so far,” Katara said while smiling, “so I’m graciously going to give you a choice.”

Naruto wondered just what she was planning now.

“I’m going to let you choose where you want to be and what you want to do in my boot. You can either lay down in the middle of my boot and massage my sole while I walk, or you get to the end of my boot and clean whatever gunk and jam I have between my toes.” Katara then finally continued lowering her foot into the boot.

Naruto didn’t know what to do. Being directly in the center of the boot while Katara walked would probably hurt, a lot, but cleaning the jam between her toes at the end of the boot would just be the absolute lowest point in his life. Naruto had to choose quickly, because Katara’s foot didn’t look like it was going to let up. Quickly, he decided to…

11412.title: Moving forward.

114121.content: Okay,will the newest female Avatar,the badass Avatar Korra,dominate with her probablly very smelly feet?
114121.title: Yes!

1141211.content:
Korra looked at the member of the anti-bending revolution, the Equalists.

He glared at the members of the Metalbending Police Force around him and then his eyes settled on Korra.

"So...you're the Avatar, huh?" he said, not sounding impressed.

Korra raised an eyebrow at him. He certainly didn't seem the type Amon worked with. She eyed the teenager before her as he yawned, he looked more bored than anything.

The guy had spiky blond hair and on his face were three marks on each cheek that looked like whiskers. His pants were a dark shade of orange, held securely in place by a black cloth tied around his waist. His upper body was now covered by a common, short-sleeved Earth Kingdom tunic, with the only difference being that instead of the usual green, yellow or beige color, it was white. And to top the whole thing off, over it he wore a black and orange over-shirt. Clearly, the Metalbending Police Force had confiscated his equipment and that was the source of his annoyance.

"Who are you?!" Lin Beifong demanded.

He yawned and looked at the Chief in annoyance. "I told you twenty times now: I. Don't. Remember."

Lin grit her teeth, looking ready to explode with sheer rage.

"Hold up...then what do the anti-bending revolution members call you?" Korra asked.

He looked at her "Ok...that I can answer. They call me "Spiral" for some reason." he shrugged and leaned back in his chair.

Korra looked at the blond and raised an eyebrow at him "How did these guys catch you anyway?"

Spiral shrugged. "I just don't see how Amon is going to do it. Unless he's planning genocide for benders, I just don't see how he aims to equilize everything...I suggested he take anger management classes and his lapdogs beat me bloody. These guys swooped in and cuffed me while my wounds were closing."

Korra snorted as she tried not to laugh. "And you don't remember anything, i take it?"

He shrugged again "I woke up in a crater that was fifty feet deep and twenty feet wide and I'm expected to remember anything? Amon's boys found me and I was drafted after beating the crap out of of them."

The Avatar nodded. "So Spiral...if you get your memory back, what'll you do?"

He shrugged yet again "Not sure."

Korra looked at Lin and took her out of the room for a few minutes and came back in.

"Ok Spiral...you're being turned over to Korra here until we figure out what to do woth you. However, due to you having information on the Equalists, you can't leave." Lin said.

"House arest with the AVATAR as my warden? Is that suppose to be a good thing?" he asked.

Korra grinned at him and he felt his blood chill. Somehow he knew this was going to be bad. He raised an eyebrow at the police chief "...you gave her permission to get all that I know about the Equalists out of me by any means she deems fit, torture included. Didn't you?" he asked.

Lin nodded.

114121111.content:
After everything was set up, the blond boy was escorted back to Air Temple Island by Korra and two metalbender guards. The situation was quickly explained to Tenzin and accomidations were made for his stay. He would be staying in a room next to Korra's so the girl could keep a close eye on him. After he was set up the guards left and Spiral, as he was known, was left in his room. Shortly after he was asleep from the ordeal.

Upon his awakening the first thing he saw was a pair of big, bare, brown feet next to his face. He followed them up until he looked into the glacial blue eyes of the young avatar. Korra looked down at him, smiling broadly at what she was about to do.

"What are you doing?" he questioned.
114121111.title: Korra and the Spiral

choices: Korra tortures him with her feet's stink as she has him lick her foot-sweat
Korra straps her boots to Naruto's face
1141211112.content:
"What are you doing?" Spiral asked.

Korra shrugged "Well, I figured that maybe I could shock your memory back with the smell of my feet." she admitted.

Spiral looked at her with clear confusion "Are you mental or something? How will that make sense? I lost my memory from being involved in an impact that left a crater from what I saw when I woke up and you think something like THAT'S going to help me?"

Korra smiled a bit "You'd be surprised at how weird stuff can work when you're the Avatar." With that, the Southern Water Tribe girl shoved her feet right into his face and he ended up getting a nosefull of her oder. Spiral jerked his head back, coughing and hacking a second later.

"Sheesh...I thought waterbenders would put more of an emphasize on bathing but...phew!" Spiral gagged. Then a sudden flash of red light coming from his body blinded Korra and she threw up her arms to shield her eyes! Once the spots stopped dancing in front of her eyes, she looked at where Spiral had been standing and blinked for a second, dumbstruck, before bursting out laughing so hard tears leaked from the corners of her eyes at what had happened to her prisoner.

He had turned into a small, two-foot-four-inch tall fox! He was mainly slate-gray in coloration with red and black accents on his head and feet. the ears of Spiral's ears were triangular with dark insides, and it has a large, whorled scruff of fur on its head, tipped with red coloration. His blue eyes appeared to have lost their pupils, and his eyelids and circular "eyebrow" markings were red. He also possessed a ruff of black fur around his neck, and Spiral's limbs were tipped with red. His tail wass bushy, and when the fox opened it's mouth, small fangs can be seen developing.

Spiral glared up at Korra, though in his current form, it only caused her to laugh even more at how cute his new form was.

"Sorry..." she said as she once again shoved her feet into his face, causing him to get his second wiff of them and he backed up, gagging, before he turned back to normal with a popping sound.

"I swear: you're as crazy as Amon!" Spiral snapped, throwing his hands in the air.

"Sheesh, I said I was sorry Spiral."

"Actually my real name's Naruto..." he muttered before he could stop himself. Then froze in horror and turned pale as snow in a matter of seconds as he clapped his hands over his mouth. He didn't just say that!

Turning his attention to Korra, he saw her eyes widen and then an evil grin split her features as they both realized that Korra's idea worked about shocking his memory back with the smell of feet.

"HA! It worked...you at least know your name now. Guess that means a bit of "Aromatherapy" is just what you needed after all...fox-boy!" Korra laughed.

Naruto backed up nervously "Uh....ahahah....ya know what? Having memoris is overrated anaways. Um....GOTTA GO!"
He turned and bolted, only to fall flat on his face as he tried to run. Looking as what caused it, his jaw dropped. His ankles were submerged in the ground.

"DAMN EARTHBENDING!" Naruto swore.

Korra swaggered up to him with a broad smile "Naughty, naughty...trying to escape. Guess that means I have to punish you." she said in a sing-song voice.

"So sue me, your feet reek as bad as Fire Lord Ozai was a psychopath!" Naruto said.

At that, Korra frowned. "That so? Well...guess that is as good a time as any to tell you that the only kind ofg bending I still need to learn is air." she said and picked up the fur boots she wore while back home at the south pole and put them on. It was too hot to wear them...and of course Korra knew that.

Slipping on her fur boots, Korra then started preforming katas with as many kicks in them as possible, flames launching from her feet and legs as she did so.

"Oh god...please not that...!" Naruto whimpered. Korra smirked. The thick fur boots added onto firebending was going to make her foot oder unbareable.

A good six hours later, Korra slipped her boots off and walked up to Naruto. "Time to disipline the fox-boy!" she laughed.
1141211112.title: Hell's  Aromatherapy

choices: Naruto wakes up shrunk with a giant Korra holding a bare foot over him
Naruto wakes up on Korra's bed with Korra and Asami wiggling their feet at him
11412111121.content:
Korra's bare foot slammed down in front of Naruto's face. Her sweat glistening on her wiggling toes as she brought her foot right to the boy's face.

"Go on, smell the avatar's feet, lick them clean of sweat." Korra drummed her big toe against Naruto's forehead as she made her demands.

The blond haired boy squirmed at the touch of the bronzed toes on his face. Each time her big toe tapped against his forehead it shot a plum of foot odor into his nose. After a few minutes of this Naruto finally collected enough of his wits to speak.

"No way am I going to lick your smelly feet!" he screamed up at the girl.

Korra looked down, staring harshly at Naruto with a deep frown on her face. "It sounds like you think you have a choice," she said with a tone of finality that left no room for argument. She brought her foot over his face and began to smother the poor boy with it before lifting it off him. This continued for five minutes before she pulled away to allow him a breath of air that didn't smell like foot. "Now that you understand who's in charge, stick out your tongue and get to work licking up my footsweat!"

Naruto begrudgingly oblidged. His tongue darted out quickly for a timid lick. Her foot tasted horrid and the salty taste of her sweat caused tears to well up in his eyes. After looking up at the young avatar, the blond realized that this wouldn't cut it and began to lick her foot with gusto, much to his regret.

"Much better, now, take a big whiff of my foot and I'll show you something really cool."

He obeyed, and her smell filled his nose, so strong he could taste it. Shortly afterwards he passed out.
11412111121.title: Korra tortures him with her feet's stink as...

114121111211.content:
The darkness subsided and Naruto's eyes slowly flickered open. The smell of Korra's feet still burned in his nose, it was truly the most foul experience he ever had. It was only when the earth shook about him that Naruto's senses went on full alert and he was on his feet. His eyes darting back and forth, gathering all the information they could. At first he found nothing.

But then he looked up.

Poised above him was a brown foot the size of a sky bison. Peering down at him through her toes was Korra, a playful smirk on her face.

"About time you woke up," Korra spoke teasingly, "now we can finally get down to some more fun."

Korra muttered, causing Naruto to pale. He didn't know who this "Jinora" person was, but he wasn't really didn't WANT to find out. Still, being Korra's insole was worse!

"Ready...fight!" Korra said, a split-second later, the Avatar had punted Naruto into the air. As he fell, he dared to peak as what Korra was up to next came rushing at him.

BAM!

Afther 20 minutes, Korra grabbed Naruto inbetween her toes and put him back on the ground, she released him and started juggling him back and forth between her feet like a soccer ball. She was loving this.

Naruto, understandably, wasn't sharing the water tribe girl's enjoyment. He finally got to his feet and ran, where, he didn't care, he just wanted away from that girl's feet. A series of loud BOOMS told thim that Korra was chasing him, she was laughing her head off.

BASH!

Korra's foot crashed into his back and fent him flying and he landed face-down on the floor, he felt like he'd just been hit by a train. He felt Korra nugge him with her big toe and he groaned in response.

Using her toe that she had been proding him with, Korra flipped her little Naruto over and placed her foot on him so that his head was between her big and second toes. Korra started to drag Naruto across the floor.

"I win." Korra said in a sing-song voice "You know what that means!"

Korra leered at him playfully as she made up her mind on what to do and...

11412111121111.title: Korra gives Naruto to Jinora

choices: Naruto agrees to be her boyfriend, but Jinora traps him with her foot anyways
time's up, Jinora slides her foot compleatly into her boot
114121111211111.content:
Naruto heard the door open and he looked out of the opening in the boot Korra had placed him in and his eyes widened at the sight of a brown-haired girl dressed in yellow, orange and brown clothing consisting of an orange shawl over a long-sleeved yellow shirt, an orange sash, double-layered pants with brown underneath them and a loose yellow layer on top that seemed about ten years old. Naruto guessed this little girl was the "Jinora" the Avatar had mentioned.

Naruto scampered back into the toe section of the high boot that would reach just below the girl's knees, where he was greeted by five dark sweat patches on the floor beneath him, cursing Amon to a horrific and very bloody death and the utter ruin of his anti-bending ambitions for leading him into this. If that masked bastard hadn't forced him into the Equalists, the blond wouldn't be in this mess! As the "masked bastard" thought passed through his mind, Naruto gripped his head as it started throbbing, an image of a man in an orange mask with spiral-pattern that only showed his right eye, wearing a black cloak with red clouds stiched on it, and a black long-sleeve top under the cloak that also covered his neck and chin, a pair of black gloves, and a pair of dark-coloured pants along with a pair of almost boot-like sandal shoes and white stirrups. On the image's waist was a thick black belt with armor-like metal plates attached to it. He wore the same metal plates on his shoulders.He wore blue nail polish on his toes and he wore dark grey gloves and a ring on his left thumb.

Then the image changed to someone else wearing a mask was white with a purple tint that covered the entire upper-half of his head with a design that resembled an eye, consisting of a ripple-pattern with three tomoe around the centre; two of these tomoe acted as the mask's eye-holes. His attire includeed a pair of black pants and gloves, with a white, presumed form-fitting shirt underneath. Over this, the second person wore a purple, high-collared, long sleeve mantle that split down the lower half and had a crest that resembled a paper fan on the back. Around his waist he wore a simple, light-purple obi and a belt. Strapped to his back was a purple gunbai with black trimmings and black tomoe, connected to a black chain that ran up his right sleeve.

Naruto fell to his kness against the sole of the inside of the boot. Who was that? Somehow he knew the two were actually the same person. Naruto sighed, amnesia sucked! He knew his own name now, and that was something at least...though crediting that he was able to remember his name now to the Avatar using her foot oder to shock it back wasn't something he was keen on considering. Speaking of which...

The interior of the boot he was in suddenly darkened and Naruto paled at it as a object slid into the boot, Jinora's bare foot. The toes move closer, wiggling as if anticipation of smishing him. All Naruto could do was stare, frozen to the spot. As the foot of the little girl who was anything but 'little' to him got closer to him, Naruto wished he was a firebender or something, even if Jinora felt him, she'd most likely assume he was just a pebble or something. Realizing he could potentally be crushed to death if he didn't do something, Naruto slid so thayt he was standing sideways as the foot reached him, trapping him between her big toe and her second one. He groaned, well, at least he was going to live a bit longer rather than having "crushed by a little girl's foot" on his gravestone.

Jinora blinked as she looked at her right boot. She could swear that there was somthing inside of it. As far as her personality went, she knew she was quietly reserved, intelligent, studious girl; much different from her younger, more rambunctious siblings (something she took pride in, actually). Out of Tenzin and Pema's children, she was the calmest and most mature. She enjoyed reading historical fiction, as well as her father's journals which chronicle his adventures with her grandfather, Avatar Aang. She was also beginning to find boys interesting, (something, she noted,which troubled her father greatly). So natrually she was curious as to what it was.

Naruto gasped as the toes stddenly clenched, squeezing him on both the front and back, before the toes started moving up and down along his body, clearly studying him, trying to determin what he was. Ne was tempted to bite the girl, but that wouldn't help him. Seemed that part of him lucked out with this Jinora. He just hoped that she didn't KILL him while trying to determin what he actually was.

'No doubt about it,' Jinora thought, 'there's DEFINATLY something in my boot.' Question was, what was it? Curious, she sat down and pulled her foot out of her right boot and tilted it and gave it a few shakes. She was surprised when something tumbled out of it. Then she sighed in annoyance, it was one of her sister's dolls from the looks of it.

"Ikki..." she said in agrivation, picking the human-shaped toy up "...how many times do I have to tell you not to leave your things in my room?"

This one had spiky blond hair and on it's face were three marks on each cheek that looked like whiskers. It's pants were a dark shade of orange, held securely in place by a black cloth tied around it's waist. The doll's upper body was covered by a common, short-sleeved Earth Kingdom tunic, with the only difference being that instead of the usual green, yellow or beige color, it was white. And to top the whole thing off, over it the toy wore a black and orange over-shirt.

Jinora blinked, seemed this one was new. And what was it made of it even felt real. She shrugged, not really her business, even if the thing WAS cute, she had to give it back to her chatterbox of a sister. She stood up.

"Thank you for letting me out of there."

HUH?! Jinora's eyes widened and head whipped to face the toy in her grip, which was now using it's arms to try helping it pull free of her fingers. Then it stopped and looked at her sheepishly "If you could set my down, preferably NOT into your boot again, I'd appreciate it, little lady."

Jinora slumped down, stunned. "You can talk?"

"Of course I can, I'm not a toy if that's what you were thinking. My name is Naruto." the blond said.

"Not a...wait...then that means you're a shrunken person then, aren't you?"

Naruto nodded. "And you're very smart."

The young airbender girl's jaw went slack and she gapped. WHAT?! She brought him to her face, looking him over. Clearly this was some kind of joke.

"You know a bird might deside to make a roost if you don't close your mouth. You're name's "Jinora", right?"

"H-How do you...?"

'Naruto', if she had heard right shrugged again "The one who put im in there mentioned you by name."

"The one who put you in there?" Jinora asked.

"You wouldn't believe me if I told you, but can you please help me find a way to be turned back to normal?" he asked.

Turned back? That wouldn't do. Jinora suddenly smiled as her free came down to lightly pet the boy on the head, pushing his spiky locks down with her huge fingers,the texture of his hair was something she had never really felt before. It reminded her of a mixture between hair and fur. She looked at him and thought about this and smiled as she made her decision.

"I'm keeping you." Jinora said suddenly.

Naruto jaw dropped and his heart skipped a few half dozen beats. "WHAT?!"

"Relax, I'll take good care of you while you're mine, little pet. And you'll be safer with me than you would be with Ikki or Meelo. Now wher will I be able to keep you where I know you'll always be?" Jinora said, talking to herself with the last part. Then her eyes fell on her boot from before and her eyes took on a strange gleem that frightened Naruto.

"Yeah...that could work...I already know how you feel under foot and you'd be safe there since you couldn't get out..." the ten-year-old said to herself.

"Naruto followed her gaze hand his blood went cold. "Not the boot! PLEASE NOT THE BOOT!" he cried.

Jinora didn't seem to be listening. She propped the boot up and dangled Naruto over the opening. "Welcome to you're mobile home, I promise I'll be gentle with you." she cooed, batting her eyelashes as him and leaned in and planted a kiss on Naruto before she let go and he fell into her boot again. She then peeked in, the massive brown eye staring down at him.

"How cute. But since I don't want you loney in there, I'll keep you company. Let me know when you're in the position you were before. I don't want to squish you." Jinora said and her head moved away andher foot entered again. re-entered to boot only enought to block the opening.

Well, at least she was considerate. Naruto wondered if he could at least talk his way out of being this girl's foot-pet. "Is there anything I could do to convince you NOT to do this?" he called.

In responce, Jinora's foot slid in a little bit, causing Naruto to yelp and move back into the toe section, standing sideways like he had before.

"Hmmm...Is there anything you could do to convince me? Well, you ARE pretty cute. How about...becoming my boyfriend?" Jinora said.

Naruto almost fainted at the answer. WHAT THE?! HER BOYFRIEND?! SHE WAS SIX YEARS YOUNGER THAN HE WAS! But given his position he was sure she was serious.

"Well? What'll it be? my boot or my boyfriend?" Jinora asked "I'll give you a minute before I slide my foot to you and make you my foot-property. So which one?"

A minute?! She expected him to choose in only one minute!? Oh man, if that was a joke, he wasn't laughing.

"Tick tock, little one." Jinora said.

"If I agree, whose to say you'll let me out?" Naruto muttered to himself.
114121111211111.title: Jinora walks in

1141211112111112.content:
Before he could answer, Jinora slipped her giant foot all the way into the boot. the avalance of a little (well, big) girl's toes approached him with terrifying wiggiling speed.

The toes settle in around Naruto's old spot, sandwhiching himm between two unpainted toes. They squeeze him tightly and then let go, repeatedly. They pull him closer to the space in between Jinora's toes, wiggling until he is tightly hugged by her rosy toe-flesh.

Already the heat is beginning to rise. Naruto can feel a small bead of Jinora's sweat run down his back. These giant girl feet clearly sweat way more than Korra's. The humidty is just beginning to rose in the confined space in the toe of Jinora's leather boot - and she was going to make it worse.

Jinora went out for a walk around the island, on the hottest day of the year. Her feet smelled like peaches when she first grabbed Naruto with them - but now they were starting to sweat like crazy. The sides of her toes were sticky and shine with sweat, and kept rubbing up against Naruto's face. Her smelly toes drew him deeper and deeper umderneath her foot, almost as if they were eating him alive. A bead of sweat splashed onto Naruto's face, he was soaked in the preteen airbender's perspiration now.

"Oooh! Jinora got a new doll! I wanna play with it! I wanna play with it!"

Naruto only assumed that this girl was not Jinora, unless she referred to herself in the third person. This other girl wore a combo of yellow and red garments, and had two buns in her hair.

11412111121112.content:
"Giving you to someone else would be such a waste. I think I can have more fun using you as an insole." Korra lifted the tiny boy off the ground, keeping him trapped between her big and second toes. As Naruto dangled there, helpless at the feet of this bronze giantess, he could only wonder at the horrors he would face as her personal insole for any stretch of time.

Korra let him worry by himself, as she thought if now would be a good time to break him in as an insole, or if she should just play with him some more before setting him to work. While the thought of him beneath her foot while she walked around was amusing, she could also think of other fun things she could do with him. Naruto could only hope she would let him down soon. He was starting to hope she would finally put him in her boot, so long as he got to breath again.

1141211112112.content:
"Uh...fun?" Naruto asked. He didn't like the sound of that.

Korra grinned and lowered her feet in front of him "Yeah. My training's exhausting. And I figure you licking my soles while you're that size would feel great!"

"NO WAY!" Naruto shouted.

Korra frowned at him. "You're in no position to object. Now do it or I'll mail you to my cousin Eska in the north pole and let her keep you!" Korra threatened, then stopped, looking thoughtful. "Now that I think about it...seeing you as the pet of an androgynous, creepy girl that smells like a grandmother's attic and is able to manipulate the environment around them while also happening to be the PRINCESS of the Northern Water Tribe sounds like it'd do you some good."

Naruto paled. WHAT?! The north pole?! And the rest...

"You wouldn't!" Naruto shouted up at her.

Korra smirked "Try me, little man."
1141211112112.title: Licking Korra's sole

choices: Train him to be her slave
11412111121122.content:
Using her foot to playfully poke her prisoner, the Avatar pressed Naruto for his answer. “So what’ll it be?”

Naruto groaned slightly under the weight of her sole. He could feel how sweaty her toes were and grimaced at the thought of having to lick her feet in that state. He know that his captor was the one holding all the cards but at the same time he wasn’t the type to give in so easily. Crossing his arm firmly, he shook his head defiantly. “Not gonna happen.” He told her.

Korra scoffed. The little guy was spunky. She’d give him that. Her toes rewarded him with a good squeeze. “Fine then,” She said. “Have it your way.”

Naruto watched in Horror as the Avatar lifted her sole bringing it down on top of him in a quick but graceful motion.

Whap!!!

***The North Pole***

Eska sighed as she sorted through her mail. The day was proving itself to be more boring than usual. After her father’s tenure as chief of the water tribe ended, the day to day tasks of ruling the Water tribe had fallen to her and her brother but it mostly involved sorting out political and civil disputes. There were only so many minor property disagreements a person could listen to in one day. When her brother agreed to cover the arbitration duties for the afternoon in exchange for her taking care of written communications for the day, she was quick to take him up on it. Now as she leafed through the hundreds of messages the northern water tribe chiefs had received, she was regretting that decision.

“Junk, junk, junk, tribute, junk, summit invitation, junk… what’s this?” Eska paused as she noticed an Iron box with an letter attached. “Hmm this one’s from the Avatar.” Opening the envelope, Eska read the note inside.

Dear Eska,

Came across a particularly stubborn prisoner that needed to be down a peg or two.

Thought you might enjoy a new toy to play with.

He doesn't seem to like feet very much. Tried to get him to lick after mine for me after my workout but he refused. Feel free to use that to your advantage.

Have Fun!

Your Cousin
-Korra

“Hmm perhaps this day would be enjoyable after all,” Eska thought. She carried the box into her room.

Naruto groaned as light unexpectedly entered his eyes. After Korra had knocked him out, he had woken up inside the box and had been stuck in it for a few hours. Judging from the motion of his environment, he assumed the Avatar had kept her promise to ship him north. Of couse he tried using his Rasengan to bust out of there but it had proven ineffective. His powers seem to have reduced with his size and the walls around him must have been specially reinforced. He supposed that he was grateful that the box had holes allowing him to breath but he was unable to see anything outside of it. The ninja was actually really relieved when the box finally opened.

As light came pouring inside, Naruto could see a feminine hand reach out to him. His first thought that Korra was back to abuse him further but as his eyes adjusted he realized that the hand was lighter in skin tone. The hand lifted him out of the box and he soon found himself facing a new giantess. The new girl resembled Korra in a way. She was paler and a little younger but there was something about her that reminded Naruto of the Avatar. She wore the same style of clothing (fur material intended to keep its wearer warm) but appeared to favor purple rather than blue. She also seemed like less of a tomboy and more reserved than the Avatar. Though she didn't wear black, Naruto sort of got a goth vibe from her something that her purple eye shadow seemed to accentuate.

As he was sizing her up, the girl seemed to be examining him up as well turning him around tilting him forward and backwards like he was new toy she had received. “My you are a cute one.” She told him. “It’s hard to believe such a tiny thing like you could get on my cousin’s bad side.”

So this was Eska. “That wasn't my fault. Your cousin was being totally unreasonable.” The Ninja explained. “Mean too! ”

Naruto thought he saw the faintest traces of amusement appear on her face. “Well…you may not be in better hands" She said to him. "People tell me that between me and my cousin... I tend to come off as the mean one.”

She was more difficult to read than her cousin. On the surface, she looked cold but Naruto got the impression that she had a dry sense of humor. The problem was he couldn't tell how whether she was joking or breaking the grim reality of his situation to him.

“Are you?”

She shrugged. “I guess it’s a matter of perspective.“

Again her answer was ambiguous.

She continued. “The fact remains though… the Avatar has left you in my care” Her thumb tickled his stomach. “It does raise the question… what do I do with you?”
11412111121122.title: Mailed to Eska

114121111211222.content:
Naruto gulped as Eska contemplated him. The idea of him ending up in the hands of someone that could be worse than that Avatar girl...Maybe that masked guy, "Amon" wasn't wrong, just bat-shit insane.

The giantess that had him now seemed like she usually showed very little emotion except for boredom and apathy, and a type of distaste for most people, places, and things. She spoke in a very monotone and matter-of-fact fashion and seemed to over-analyze whatever situation she was in.

Just like...

Naruto winced. How had he been able to tell those sorts of things about her? and "Just like"? Just like who?!

He grit his teeth. He HATED having amnesia! He was so angry, so frustrated with his missing memories. The fact that to only thing that seemed to get them back was foot-odor shock therapy didn't help him. He hated THAT too!

He remembered his name, that he was a ninja, and a technique he knew, and just now he seemed like he was close to something, but it had vanished.

He was brought out of his thoughts as he felt Eska's thumb tickle his stomach again. He looked up at her as the purple-clad female studied him more.

"Now...according the the note that came with you and that Iron box you came in, you don't seem to like feet too much." she said, as if contemplating her thoughts aloud to herself.

Naruto paled and his blood went cold. SAY WHAT!?! No! Please no! He shook his head desperately. the LAST thing he wanted was to go through that again!

Eska's finger stroked the top of his head. Getting his attention back onto the seemingly-emotionless girl that held onto him. "Be still, Tiny" she chided lightly in her flat tone.

"Umm...Korra told me your name. Eska, right?" Naruto asked.

The faintest traces of amusement appeared on her face as he said her name. It was good her new toy knew his new mistress. "Yes, I am Eska, Tribal Princess of the Northern Water Tribe." she siad

"...I do have a name, it's Naruto." he said.

In response to that, the hand around him tightened slightly.

"Shush." Eska told him. "I know you were only out to introduce yourself, but there are those who would take that as being insolent." With that said, Eska loosened her grip on him. He sighed.

"Now..." Eska said, getting his attention again, "...I believe we should start training you, from what that note said, you have obedience issues." as she spoke, Eska removed her thick boots, exposing her sock-covered feet.

At the sight of them, Naruto whimpered, making Eska raise an eyebrow. Cute, tiny and helpless against her? Amusing. She set him down in front of her feet and he backed away from them as if they were a set of bombs that were about to go off. Eska didn't show it, but this pleased her.

Seems she'd have better luck than her Southern Watertribe cousin had with the little one. Good

"Calm yourself. I wish to play with you." Eska said in her monotone.

Naruto gazed at the monolithic shadow cast by Eska's foot. Judging by the dirty lint balls and yellowish sweat stains covering the sock, it was safe to assume that Eska had worn these socks for a while without washing them.

*Thump*

Almost instantly, Naruto felt an immense amount of pressure on top of his body. He felt the moist, sweaty fibers of Eska's sock. Naruto also noticed the cheesy smell that the sock was emitting as it crushed him. It was far too heavy to resist against. As much as he tried, the sock had completely conquered him.

The princess didn't step on him with her full weight, but she applied enough pressure to keep Naruto firmly pressed against the ground.

Underneath her foot, the blond begin to struggle with all his might, trying his best to escape.

Eska moaned as she felt Naruto squirm under her sole. “That feels rather nice.” She informed him, somehow still sounding bord. “In fact I want you to keep struggling just like that.”

Before Naruto could respond, Eska began rubbing her humongous foot against him, using his tiny, struggling body as a foot massager for the next 30 minutes. By the time she had used him massaging every crevice of her socked left foot, Naruto was panting with exhaustion.

Eska’s left foot lifted off of him, but Naruto didn't have the energy to run away as Eska brought her right foot towards him and placed it atop his body. She saw he was too tired to even struggle anymore. Eska solved that problem by pressing her foot harder against Naruto, just enough to remind him he still had a job to do, forcing him to quickly resume wriggling around. Eventually, twenty-five minutes later, Eska has used Naruto to massage every part of both her soles.

“That was a good start.” Eska said, pulling her foot off of Naruto and picking him up. "You make a good toy. I will keep you."

Naruto stared at her. KEEP him?! No! Not if it meant more foot-torture! At least let him get back to his normal size!

Eska bent down and picked up one of her boots and held Naruto over the opening.

"Enjoy your new home." she said, her bland tone making it seem more like an order than anything. Peering down into the foul smelling cavern Naruto bit his lip nervously "Please don't tell me she's gonna..."

Then Eska released him.

Naruto was sent plummeting downwards, Upon making contact with the insole of Eska's winter moccasin-like boots, he simple bounced on it like a jellotine-like surface.

The footsweat the insole had absorbed had made it near spongy and had cushioned Naruto's landing. "Gross" Naruto complained as he stood up and wiped some of the moistness from his body. Walls surrounded him on every side. The floor underneath him was soft and spongy and felt wet to the touch. The atmosphere of this place was incredibly hot and humid, making being in the area a truly unpleasant place for the ninja.

Looking up, Naruto saw Eska looking down at him within her boot. He face eclipsing everything, demanding his attention as she loomed over him like a goddess.

"Rest." she said, then her face pulled away. Then the footwear tilted and Naruto's eyes widened. A sock-covered foot that he'd gotten very familiar with entered the boot and drew near him. Naruto, filled with panic, ran until he was in the toe section of the shoe. and had to turn around to face the beast that pursued him as Eska's foot caught up with him and forced him onto his back.

Helpless, as it poured over him. Trapping him beneath it. Smothering him.

Eska's sock-enveloped foot rolled over Naruto like a heavy carpet. He pushed with both arms. Tried to squirm away. Too late. He tried to roll out from underneath. But the heavy, living carpet had Naruto pinned on his back. Pinned to the sole. It rolled over his waist. And then quickly, over his chest. Was it going to sweep over his head? Was Eska going to smother him with her foot? It was too late to push it away. Too late to do it any harm. Too late to stop it as it crept closer to his neck. So warm and heavy...It was no use. Too late. Too late to fight back. And now Naruto laid there, trapped. And felt Eska's foot slid up to his chin. Felt the blood throbbing through her foot even through her sock. Pulsing. Covering him. Naruto took a deep breath and held it as the heavy, warm carpet pressed itself against his chin. His arms and legs were pinned to the sloe of Eska's boot. He couldn't squirm away. Couldn't move. To his surprise, the socked foot stopped under his chin.

Naruto let out a long whoosh of air.And waited. Had she really stopped? Yes. Eska's foot didn't crawl over his head. It rested heavily on top of him.

So she expected him to be her insole...or was it to use her socked foot like a blanket? Probably both. Either way, it was warm, and he wasn't in a position to refuse her whims unless he wanted to get squashed into a crimson grease spot under her sole. He didn't want that.

With that, Naruto let all his exhaustion take over and her closed his eyes...
114121111211222.title: Eska's feet fun

1141211112112221.content:
His body rejuvenated, Naruto's eyes creaked open as he slowly awoke. To his relief, the first sight to greet him was not the socked toes of Eska on top of his body. Rather, it was the sight of a distant ceiling, which was soon blocked by the giant face of the waterbender who had used him as an insole.

"Finally awake?" she asked in her lackadaisical tone, "I hope you're ready to get right back to work. It was boring when you stopped moving. I wondered if I had broken my little toy on the first day. So to make it up to me, you better work hard to not disappoint me again."

With little regard for Naruto's well being, Eska brought her bare foot down on her tiny captive, trapping his head between her big and second toes. Giving it a painful squeeze, she lifted him to his feet by his neck, taking time to watch as he dangled by his head from her foot.

Forced to grab at her toes so he could still breath, Naruto tried to free himself from their iron grip on his head. It wasn't long before his face was turning purple and he began to feel lightheaded. He was on the verge of passing out again when Eska released her grip on him.

"Next time, be sure to get to your feet on your own, or I won't be as nice in helping you."

Naruto gasped for air, only to take in big whiffs of foul smelling foot odor. Looking up, he saw that Eska had placed her feet directly in front of him.

"Now let's see if you've learned anything so far. I want you to lick my feet, like you didn't for Korra," the creepy water tribe girl commanded, wiggling her toes in anticipation. The look in her eyes almost dared him to disobey her like he had with her cousin.
1141211112112221.title: Naruto wakes up to Eska's bare feet

choices: Keep him in her boot as she goes about her day.
Put him in a sock and leave him there for the day.
11412111121122211.content:
Naruto didn't know why, but he just couldn't give in to Eska's demands. It was like a part of him he still couldn't remember just would not submit to the giant water tribe woman in front of him. "NO!" shouted Naruto to Eska. "I DON'T CARE WHAT YOU THINK, BUT I WON'T LICK YOUR FEET! I MAY NOT REMEMBER MUCH OF MY PAST, BUT I WON'T LOWER MYSELF TO LICKING SOMEONE'S FEET!" Naruto shouted in defiance to Eska's demand. Eska responded back to Naruto's comment with a glare. After glaring at him for a minute, the glare changed into a smirk. "I'll be honest, I was hoping you would still defy me." Eska said down to Naruto dryly. "It wouldn't be much fun if I was able to break you in such a small amount of time. I promise you, though, that you will eventually obey me and whoever I say can use you. For now, however, I believe your insolence deserves some form of punishment. Consider this the first of what I expect to be many punishments."

Hearing those words, Naruto quickly tried to escape from his captor. Running as fast as he can, Naruto ran about two feet, to normal perspective, before Eska started to box him in for his punishment. Taking her boot, Eska threw the item in front of Naruto's path. Reacting quickly, Naruto decided to go left and escape that way. Seeing where her future belonging was going, Eska took her other boot and threw it in Naruto's path once again. Figuring out what he would likely do next, Eska decided to stop him early. Taking her socks, she quickly threw one behind him and another to the right of him, thus boxing him in a smelly cage of foot stink. Naruto didn't know what to do. He couldn't remember anything that could likely help him, and the smell from the boot openings and socks were starting to mess with his head. Seeing her captive stuck, Eska decided to slowly walk over to where Naruto currently was and taunt him.

"I wish you wouldn't have tried to escape, little one. It would have been easier for you to just accept what would happen to you instead of make me irritated at your pitiful escape attempt." Eska said to Naruto. "Oh well. More fun for me. First though, I'm going to show you how hopeless your attempt would be if you did get outside." Eska grabbed a second pair of boots to wear and started reaching down. Eska grabbed Naruto and started to walk outside to the cold. After going out, Eska finally opened her hand and showed Naruto what he would see if he escaped. "Look around you." Eska said to him. "This is what awaits you. That is, if you didn't die of hypothermia. Your small size makes you more susceptible to freezing to death out here quickly. You can already feel the effects, can't you? I can see your shaking badly and you've only been out here for less than a minute. I'd give you ten before you freeze to death." Deciding she crushed his escape attempts for a while, Eska came back inside to the room where she had Naruto trapped in a square of boots and socks and placed him back inside of said square. "Now that you know what to expect should you escape, I believe it is time to start your punishment." Eska said.

Taking off the second pair of boots, Eska points her bare naked foot down at Naruto toe first. Naruto was still too cold from being outside to do anything and could only watch as Eska brought her sweaty and smelly toe down on him. Taking her big toe first, Eska placed it onto Naruto's face and placed a miniscule amount of pressure on him. Not enough to hurt him, but enough to let him know he couldn't get it off of him. She then started to rub his face with her toe, covering him in the sweat and dried skin stuck to it. "You should be grateful I'm doing this." said Eska. "This should hopefully warm you up enought to lick my foot." After two minutes of her rubbing Naruto's face, she slowly took her big toe off of him. Thinking this was a reprieve, Naruto was unprepared for the next toe that landed on his face. This process repeated itself for each one of Eska's ten toes. Deciding that Naruto was warmed up enough, Eska started the next part of his punishment.

Grabbing Naruto with her first to fingers and thumb, Eska slowly brought him over to her right foot. She then shoved his body into the sole of her foot and slowly rubbed him all over it. From heel to the tips of her toes, Eska rubbed him into every part, covering him in the sweat and smell that her foot generated. She then brought him over to her other foot and repeated the process. By the time she was through, the smell had soaked into Naruto's very being and the sweat coated him like slime covers a slug. For some reason, when he thought of this, he had an image of a blond woman with an odd diamond shape on her forehead. Finally deciding that she had punished him enough, Eska decided to end it for the day. Taking both of her socks, she put Naruto between them both and rubbed them together vigorously, making Naruto smell like her foot even more. This torture would surely break a normal man, but this small part of him flared up again and stopped him from giving in.

After five minutes of rubbing Naruto between her socks, she decided that it was time to go to bed. Picking up Naruto, Eska made her way over to her bed. "I assume you still have some fight left in you still." Eska said to Naruto. "I will take care of it in the morning. For now, though, I am tired. Hopefully after tonight, you will be more willing." Taking Naruto over to her right boot, shestarted to lower him into it. "Sorry, but this is the only way for you to survive the night in this cold. Don't worry, though, you will have company." Dropping the barely conscious into the boot, Eska maneuvered it so that Naruto would be stuck in the toe section. Grabbing her socks, she quickly stuffed them into the section where Naruto was. Feeling like Naruto would barely be able to move and would surely be able survive the night, Eska called it a night and slipped into bed. Naruto, however, was forced into the toe print of Eska's big toe because of the socks pushing down on him and stopping him from moving. He was warm, thankfully, and decided to go to sleep, not knowing what Eska had planned for tomorrow.

What will Eska do to Naruto tomorrow when they wake up?

114311.content:
Naruto had gone into the woods to practice his rasengan technique. That morning had been very foggy and Naruto had wandered too far and had gotten lost. He decided that Kakashi would eventually find him and he might as well use that location to practice his technique.

Tired of dealing with her incompetent soldiers, Azula had gone into the woods to relax and clear her mind. It was there that she noticed the young ninja dressed in unusual orange clothes. Curious as to who he was, she hid behind a tree and watched. Naruto didn't see the young girl who had spotted him hiding there. He began to practice his Rasengan on a nearby tree.

Azula watched as the ninja created a ball of what she could only guess was air with his bare hands and destroyed a tree with it. Orange clothes she thought and the ability to control air. He must be an airbender she decided. I'd better capture him she thought.

She came out of hiding and called out to the ninja. "Well well well...looks like I caught an airbender." She said grinning.

Naruto jumped at seeing the fire nation princess come out of nowhere. He also had no idea what she was talking about.

"What's an airbender?" He asked confused.

"Don't deny it! I saw you bend air a second ago. You're now a prisoner of the fire nation." She informed him.

Of course none of that made any sense to Naruto.

"huh?" was all he could manage to say.

Azula was tired of this "airbender's" game. She decided to capture him first and interrogate him later. She lauched a fireball at him. Naruto who was still trying to figure out what the heck a airbender was didn't even see the attack coming. The fireball hit him head on and he was knock unconscious.

Now that Azula had captured her victim, what does she do to him?
