1143111111.content:
“Naruto! Naruto! Wake up!” Sakura called to him.

Naruto opened his eyes. He looked up at Sakura’s smiling face.

“Ugh...I had the worst nightmare.” He said. “I dreamt I was being tortured by a psycho girl with the worst smelling feet I’ve ever seen in my life.”

“That’s terrible.” Sakura told him. “Let me make you feel all better.”

She kissed him on the lips. Naruto was shocked. Happy but shocked.

“I thought you wanted to be with Sasuke.” Naruto looked at her surprised.

“Sasuke’s an emo jerk” Sakura told him smiling. “I’d much rather be with a cool ninja like you. Do you want to be with me?”

“Of course” Naruto grinned.

“Great!” Sakura said. “There’s just one think I need you to do for me.”

“Anything for you Sakura.” Naruto said lovingly.

“I want you to smell my feet.” She said evilly.

“What!!!!!!” Naruto said.

“Yup start smelling” Sakura said sitting on his stomach and bringing her feet to his face. Naruto gagged at the horrible odor coming from Sakura’s feet.

“Stop this Sakura” He begged. He began choke on the stink of Sakura’s feet.
“NOOOO!!! STOP!!!!! STOP!!!!!!!” Naruto screamed...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------
Naruto screamed as he opened his eyes.

“Awwww did the poor little Airbender have a bad dream” Azula said taunting him.

Naruto looked around. He realized he was chained to torture table. Azula was using him as a footstool resting her awful smelling feet in his face.

“I was having such a fun time torturing you but then you had to pass out on me.” She said acting disappointed. “But that’s ok. It gave me the time to get my feet extra sweaty and gross just for you”

Naruto moaned as she rubbed both her feet against his nose. He was trying his best to breathe as little as possible but it was a losing battle since even the smallest whiff of Azula’s foot odor hindered his ability to think. Azula smiled as she told him the routine she did to make her feet an extra punishment for him.

“I hope you appreciate all the work I did just to torture you” She said laughing. “I jogged for an hour. Practiced kicking techniques for two hour and to top it off I’ve been using mild firebending to keep my feet extra warm the entire time. Could you tell?”

Naruto could tell. Azula feet smelled worse than before which was something he thought was impossible. He also noticed her feet had become a lot sweatier as her footsweat soaked into his face. He desperately wanted her to pull her feet away but Azula just kept rubbing and rubbing. Naruto vaguely remembered his ideology of never giving up but the more he experienced the fire nation princess’ feet, the more he felt like abandoning that principle and begging for mercy. Azula could also tell so was close to breaking him. She was sure the next foot related torture would snap his remaining resistance like a twig.
What does the evil princess have planned?
1143111111.title: Bad Dream becomes a Worst Nightmare

choices: Naruto faces the verge of defeet
11431111112.content:
The princess suddenly showed Naruto an odd tube that was next to her and proceeded to cover the mouth and nose of the trapped ninja. Naruto was weaker than weak, but was wondering what the heck that could mean.

"Naruto, you see what's connected to that tube?"

And he was shocked. It was connected to two of her boots! Suddenly, Before Naruto could react, the smell of double boots suddenly overwhelmed his mask.
11431111112.title: One is Fun, But Two...

choices: Naruto is able to answer most of her questions (more kisses less boot mask)
Naruto is unable to answer many of her questions (more boot mask less kisses)
114311111121.content:
Naruto coughed and gagged as he smelled the odor of Azula's boots. The nasty combination of leather and footsweat burned away at his lungs. He desperately wanted her to remove the breathing mask. Azula just casually leaned back and smiled at him while he suffered. She watched his eyes began to tear up as he breathed in her stench. Finally the smell became too much for him. He began to close his eyes. Instantly Azula pulled her mask away and slapped him conscious.
"Sorry...No passing out again just yet." She said. "You still haven't answered all my questions."
Naruto groaned.
Azula smiled. "Now that you know I'm serious about punishing you. Let's try the interrrogation...shall we?"
Naruto nodded. He didn't want to experience her foot odor anymore.
"What's your name airbender?" Azula asked.
Even Naruto knew by this point she was referring to him.
"I'm Naruto" He told her.
Azula smiled. He was finally beginning to crack. "Do you think my feet are cute Naruto?" she asked.
"They're ok" He said surprised she would ask such an unusual question.
Azula instantly covered his face with the boot mask for another minute.
"I'm sorry I didn't catch that. Do you think my feet are cute?" She asked rolling the torture device slowly around in her hand.
"Yes they're beautiful" he told her.
"That's better." Azula said. "Here's what I'm going to do. I'm going to ask you a question, If your answer pleases me I'll reward you by letting you kiss my feet. However if I get upset it's another minute of the boot mask for you"
"But I don't want to kiss your feet." Naruto complained.
Azula put her boot over Naruto's face for another minute.
"Believe me by the time I'm done with you, you'll view it as a reward." The fire princess told him. "Ready to start?"

How does Naruto do in this Question and Answer session?
114311111121.title: Azula's Foot Conditioning

choices: Naruto continues to get odor tortured
Naruto is now begging for his life
1143111111212.content:
Naruto was quite shocked at her set of questions, asking things relating to airbending as well as other miscellaneous things. And these miscellaneous things could mean more doom, as Naruto could not quite get the right set of answers she wanted to hear.

"Naruto, do my feet look like they need some service?" Azula asked.

"Yes, they do!" Naruto said, hopefully getting away further from the mask.

"Too bad! I don't need service, I'm already stronger than you!" Azula screamed as she again put the mask on him for another minute. Naruto could not take the stench further any longer, as he seeked for a way to get far from Azula's foot assault as possible. Unfortunately, Naruto also had to kiss Azula's feet for every right answer. And the stench was just as unbearable.

But kisses are a luxury for Naruto, as he received more boot mask inhalations for his unfortunate efforts.
1143111111212.title: More Boot Mask

choices: Get Mai and Ty Lee to join in torturing you
Practice  with firebending moves useing kicks,  then make you smell my feet
114311112.content:
Azula leered at the boy, it was clear to both of them that her feet reeked, but he didn't pass out.

"Hm...seems your the strong-willed type. Good, I'll enjoy crushing that resolve of yours." Azula said with a grin.

Naruto glared at the princess, his eyes giving off a voiceless challange: Do your worst, I've had things worse than this done to me, I'll outlast you if it kills me.

Azula snickered and sat on a stump and ran her foul-smelling toes along the whisker-marks on his cheeks. As to why an airbender had whisker-marks rather than the triditional blue arrow-markings puzzled Azula.

"Heh. You still woun't talk?" Azula taunted, Naruto growled from deep in his throat, she laughed, she knew he couldn't answer back without inhailing the stench emanating from her footwear.

"I'm enjoying this, having you to myself. But maby I get Mai and Ty Lee to join in." Azula mused, knowing that their feet stunk just as baddly as hers did becouse of all the traviling they did hunting the Avatar, that would be a good way to get him to talk, making him smell all three of their feet at once. Azula suddenly remembering something: After practing with firebending moves useing kicks, her feet stunk worse than that water-tribe warrior that was traviling with the Avatar's jokes. She smiled at her prisoner with enough crulty to freak out Orochimaru.

"Well...guess what? I've desided on what I'll do to you next." Azula said, delighted when Naruto whimpered in reply

"I'll..."
114311112.title: Wondering what to do next

choices: Naruto is introduced to Mai and Ty Lee
1143111121.content:
Azula made her suggestion as she rubbed her foul smelling feet against the poor ninja’s abused nose.
“I think I’ll get Mai and Ty Lee to join in.” She told him as he coughed from the smell of her feet. “By the time we get through with you…we’ll have to gag you to get you to stop talking!!”
To Azula’s disappointment, her suggestion was met with confusion rather than actual fear.
“Who are Mai and Ty Lee?” He asked.
“They’re my friends!! I’m gonna get them to torture you with their feet as well” Azula told him.
Naruto gulped.
Azula smiled. That reaction was a little better but she wanted him to be a little more terrified. It seemed she was going to have to describe what situation he was walking into.
“Aw don’t worry about their feet not smelling enough,” Azula teased him. “I can assure you they smell just as bad as mine.”
The color drained from Naruto’s face. He felt sick just thinking about it.

Seeing his reaction Azula giggled. Next she proceeded to describe Mai and Ty Lee’s rigorous work out routines for her captive. She told him all about how Ty Lee spent hours on her feet practicing acrobatic moves every day and she described how Mai ran around practicing throwing her knives from different distances. After that she described her friends’ footwear for Naruto and talked about how hot, sweaty and smelly their feet would become after wearing their shoes all day. By the time the fire princess had finished her description, Naruto was shivering and whimpering like a frightened puppy. Azula felt very proud at having achieved this level of fear in her “airbender” prisoner.
“Ready to meet them?” She asked grinning.
Naruto shook his head vigorously.
“That’s too bad cause you are going to anyway” Azula laughed. “But first I’m going to need you to take a little nap.”
Naruto’s eyes opened wide as he saw Azula stand and pull her foot back ready to give him a powerful kick. Smiling, Azula brought her foot towards Naruto’s face with amazing speed. The last thing Naruto remembered before passing out was the smell of Azula’s sole as it hit his face.
1143111121.title: Azula wants her friends to help torture Naruto

11431111211.content:
Naruto woke up to find himself chained to floor of a dungeon. He took a moment to process what had happened and realized that cruel woman must have moved him there while he was asleep. He tried to break free of the chains but found that no matter how hard he tried, he could not get loose. The chains seemed to be extra strength and to top it off, the demon fox seemed to be holding back on lending him his power. Naruto guessed he was enjoying the particular method the woman was using to torture him. Eventually Naruto gave up on struggling and waited in terror for Azula to follow up on how she said he would be tortured next. He wasn’t kept waiting long. About five minutes later he heard voices outside his cell as the fire princess meet up with her henchwomen.
***
“Did you two follow my instructions?” Azula asked.
“Yes we did a double workout routine and a 2 hour jog just like you said Azula,” Ty Lee told her.
“Good…remember I don’t want him physically harmed, just mentally broken.” Azula said looking in Mai’s direction.
“Yeah yeah,” Mai said annoyed. “I heard you the first time.”
Mai sighed. Of the three of them, Azula was really the one who would most likely seek to physically torture her captive.
“I still can’t believe you found another airbender” Ty Lee said impressed. “I thought there was only one left.”
“You’re sure he’s an airbender right?” Mai asked dryly. She knew Azula had a tendency to jump the gun.
“I saw him use an air technique with my own eyes.” Azula told them insistently “But the problem is he is refusing to confess and answer my questions…that’s why I need your help. Anyway we’ve kept him waiting long enough!!”

***
Naruto shuddered as he heard his cell door open.
“Ah you're awake…good” Azula told him. “I actually wanted you to wake up to the smell of my feet in your face but at least that means we can get your torture started right away. These are the friends I told you so much about.”

Naruto could easily tell which girl was which. Azula’s description of them had been perfect. He knew right away that the cheerful girl in pink was Ty Lee and the girl with the sour expression on her face was Mai. Thinking about how accurate Azula’s description of them had been, he shivered and prayed that Azula had exaggerated about how bad their feet would smell.

Ty Lee smiled as she looked at the captive ninja.
“That airbender is pretty cute” She giggled.
“For the last time…I’m not an airbender!!!!!!!!!!!” Naruto whined.
“See what I’m dealing with,” Azula said annoyed. “At least now we have an excuse to torture him.”
“Do we have to do this?” Mai asked bored. For her torturing a captive seemed like a waste of time.
“Of course!!” Azula said exasperated. “Do you know how bad it would be for the fire nation if there are other airbenders unaccounted for? However...here’s some added incentive for you. Whichever one of us can get the airbender to spill his secrets, gets to play with him for the rest of the night.”

Both girls were intrigued by Azula’s offer. They each liked the idea of having the “airbender” to their self for the night. Even Mai gave a rare smile at the thought of the games she could play if she was given some time alone with this prisoner.

“So are we agreed?” Azula asked.
Mai and Ty Lee nodded enthusiastically.
“Ok so we’ll each take turns torturing him for an hour” Azula said looking at her friends. “Since he’s already been introduced to my feet, why don’t one of you two go first.”

Who takes the first turn?
11431111211.title: Meeting Mai and Ty Lee

choices: She uses the smell of her  bare feet.
She uses the smell of her boots.
114311112111.content:
“Mai why don’t you go first?” Azula suggested.
Mai nodded and sat down on Naruto’s stomach placing her booted feet on both sides of his head. After 3 hours of weapons training and running, Mai couldn’t wait to take off her boots and give her feet some much needed air. Naruto grimaced as Mai lifted her left foot just above his face allowing him a good view of the removal of her boot. Then he watched in horror as Mai slowly began to tug at her boot eventually popping them off. The smell hit everyone in the room like a stack of bricks. Azula and Ty Lee backed away as even the two of them weren’t spared from the smell. Mai wrinkled her nose a bit and blushed slightly embarassed.
“Sorry!” She apologized. “I guess the result of my workout were a little better than I expected.”
“That’s alright” Azula laughed actually glad her captive was really going to suffer smelling Mai’s feet. “I just hate to be in the “Airbender’s” position right now.”
Ty Lee just covered her nose and mouth with her hands.
“I think we’ll watch from outside the cell” Azula announced. “That will give your feet the space they need to break our captive.”

The fire princess and Ty Lee left the cell pretty fast to watch the torture from a distance.

“Looks like it’s just you, me, and my feet” Mai said an emotionless tone to her voice. She removed her other boot and wiggled her toes in front of Naruto’s face causing the ninja to yelp in terror.
“This torture stuff bores me but once I have you to myself, we might be able to have some real fun,” Mai told him. “The thing is in order to play with you…I’m going to have to break you first!!”
114311112111.title: Mai goes first

choices: Naruto gives up and Mai gets to play with him.
Give up is not in Naruto's vocabulary.
1143111121111.content:
“Why don’t I use my bare feet to break you” Mai said. “I’m really a hands on type of girl.”
Mai slowly brought her feet down to Naruto’s face and began rubbing them around while Naruto gagged on the smell. While the weapon girl’s feet were soft (probably from soaking in sweat all day) the smell was unbearable for Naruto and tears began streaming down his face in less than five minutes.
Mai noticed but she didn’t stop. She was extremely lonely and bored after her boyfriend Zuko abandoned her to join up with the avatar. It was true that she still had Azula and Ty Lee but they were the kind of friends she could only handle in small doses. The yellow-haired boy looked like he might be entertaining company in Zuko’s absence.

As Mai thought of Zuko, she felt anger fill her. He didn’t even bother to say goodbye in person. He just left her a note. She thought she meant something to him. You’d think he tell her he was going to do something big like confront her father. Guess he didn’t care for her as much as she cared about him. It bothered her how much she changed when she was with Zuko. She had begun to expose her feelings to him which was something she didn’t do to just anyone and she had listened to him responding to his problems the way a caring girlfriend would. What upset her the most was that she still had feelings for Zuko…eventhough he had chosen to leave her…she still loved him.

She began to take out her anger on Naruto kicking and pressing her feet against his face and nose trying to rub whatever sweat and dirt remained on her feet into him. Naruto groaned and whimpered throughout the process.

For Naruto the torture was definitely an awful experience. But what made it worse was that he was unable to read this girl as she tortured him. Mai kept her emotions guarded and Naruto had trouble telling if she felt happy, angry, sad, or indifferent doing this to him. He knew he shouldn’t care about how his enemy felt but they was something about this girl’s expressionless face that bothered him.

“Are you ready to give up yet?” Mai asked him pressing her feet hard against his face. “If you give up now…I’ll definitely stop”
Definitely not wanting to give the watching Azula the satisfaction of hearing him submit, Naruto refused.

Sighing, Mai continued his torture.
“Why do guys always have be so stubborn?” She asked annoyed. “Always so hesitant to let a girl know their feelings even if all they wanted to do was help!”
She pinched Naruto’s mouth open and picked up her boot and poured the large amount of footsweat inside of it down the ninja’s throat.

As Naruto choked on the salty taste of Mai’s feet, he realized what it was that bothered him about Mai’s expression. It was an expression he had seen frequently in Sasuke, Gaara and even sometimes in himself. It was the cold dead look of loneliness…she had lost someone close to her and she was hurting inside from it.

Naruto didn’t get the chance to dwell on his discovery as Mai continued to torture him. She gave him a second helping of footsweat from her other boot and proceeded to use the smell of her feet and her boots to put him through hell.

By the time his hour with Mai was up, Naruto was constantly sobbing. Azula and Ty Lee came in and informed Mai her time was up. They wondered whether Mai had done enough to break the ninja.
“So “airbender” are you ready to talk yet?” Azula asked. “Or does the torture continue with a fresh set of feet?”

Naruto didn’t know how much more torture he could take. Maybe he should just submit now and spend some time alone with Mai. At least he would be with a kindred spirit who shared his loneliness.

What does he do?
1143111121111.title: Mai's bare feet

choices: Mai talks to Naruto, he's more than willing to listen to her and vise virsa
11431111211111.content:
"Alright, just keep HER away from me." Naruto said, jerking her head in Mai's direction and emphasis for good mesure, hoping Azula bought his fib.

Azula, being the cruel person she is, took the bait, nearly the whole rod.

"Now why would I do that?" Azula laughed as she basicly threw Mai back in the cell and locked them in and left with Ty Lee.

"Moron, she bought it." Naruto snickered, Mai looked at him. He wanted this to happen?

"When you were doing all that to me, Something was bothering me about your expression. I've seen it frequently and even felt it myself. It was the cold dead look of loneliness…you've lost someone close to you and your hurting inside from it. I know its not my bussiness, but I'm not an idot. If you want to talk, I'll listen."

"SHUT UP!" Mai covered her ears, Why? How? How did he know what she felt? What bugged her most was that he was right on target with it, like his words were hitting every single sore spot in her body, With every beat of her heart she felt a small constricting pain throughout her chest. So that was why he tricked Azula, Naruto wanted to help her. Mai fought back furious tears. How dare he do this!!!

"You DON'T know a thing about me!"

"I know being alone sucks more than I'd like to." Naruto said with unmistakable honesty and sadness.

"Why you..." Mai's mask was starting to come off, she seemed sad and angry at him. She was more than ready to pull out one of her throwing blades and yet something stopped her as soon as she saw his face...those eyes. Those beautiful deep sea-blue eyes that seemed to see right through her, they made her feel like she was drownding in comfort and yet she saw a pain she knew too well. He didn't toy with people's hearts, that was forever beneath him. He was telling the truth. He truly DID know how she felt inside. Mai felt her heart crack, he wanted to help her so much that he was willing to druge up all his own pain and suffering, the pain that could have made him go mad, the pain that could have made him a monster. Just for her to have a shoulder to cry on. Mai felt a smile tug at her lips, glad he was willing to be there for her, and a small voice in her head told her Ty Lee had been right, this kid was cute. He'd make a wonderfully entertaining plaything, she could feel it. The question now was do they share feelings or dose she clame him as her toy right away?
11431111211111.title: Naruto and Mai

choices: Even Servicing Her Feet Is Better Than Death
114311112111111.content:
As promised by Azula, Mai won the prisoner Naruto for the night to do with as she wished. She put on her still wet and spongy feeling boots as two Fire nation guards Azula had ordered entered the cell. The guards the proceeded to knock Naruto out with a quick blow to the head, remove him from his one set of chains, force his arms behind his back, and then chain his wrists and ankles together with the another set of the same extra strength chains found in the dungeons, only this time they weren’t latched to the building. They then carried Naruto to Mai’s private quarters as she followed behind. Upon arriving, the two guards threw Naruto into the room on his back, allowed Lady Mai to enter, and stood guard outside the now shut door.

Mai, starting to have ideas begin swirling in her mind, hurriedly sat herself down upon Naruto’s chest/stomach. She quickly pulled out a kunai from her sleeve and aimed it preciously at Naruto’s exposed throat just as he awoke.

“Listen blond boy” Mai began softly “From spending so much time around Azula, I’ve become the type to never tolerate disobedience. I want everything in life the way it is when I throw my knives: quick, precise, and direct. Never boring.”
At this point Naruto became very worried from her somewhat hostile words, as if the sharp object pointed at his jugular wasn’t already enough. A quick glance around the room told him he was quite alone, and Mai was quite in charge.

Mai continued, “I know you just want to help me, but right now…this very moment…I need to get something out of the way before you can begin to do that, if at all.”
At this, Naruto was confused, but he thought it simply best to allow her to go on with her explanation. Maybe he could find out some useful information for later.

“As you may have noticed, there was a somewhat hidden anger behind parts of my torturing you before. Not directed at you in particular, but maybe at all men in general, my seemingly uncaring former boyfriend Zuko especially for sure.”

Naruto internally groaned. ‘Oh great, a girl with weapons that isn’t so keen on men right now. Her and Tenten would get along swell.’

Mai had the perfect idea in mind…a way to get at least some semblance of vengeance, if not against Zuko for leaving her alone, then at least against all males and their pigheaded ways of only caring for their own feelings.

“You and I are going to play” she said with the slightest of smiles, one that would uncharacteristically grow as she went on. “And by play, I mean I start to feel confident about myself once again, my pain maybe heals, and you possibly make up for some of the other members of your gender’s past mistakes.”

“How exactly do you plan on that!?” Naruto cried out.

“You’re going to lick my feet clean” Mai said nonchalantly as one could while kicking her boots off. The walk back from the dungeons encased in her boots had once again put her feet in a less than dainty state.

Naruto’s jaw dropped, and as the familiar aroma of Mai’s putrid foot stench once again reached his nostrils, he practically screamed an ear piercing “WHAT!?”

“You heard me” Mai started with a her clear and steady voice, although one could say it began to crack towards the middle of her monologue. “It’s exactly what you’re going to do. And during it all I get to feel like the princess Azula is…the Fire Lady I should have been by Zuko’s side. If nothing else, it’ll just be relaxing to have my tired, smelly, dirty, sweaty feet massaged and cleansed by your male tongue…therapeutic in a way when you think about it.”

“And if I refuse?” Naruto asked meekly.

Mai twirled the kunai in her hand, and pressed it against Naruto’s throat. Should she have pressed any harder, she would have surely drawn blood. “I don’t think you want to find out.”
114311112111111.title: Mai's Idea of "Playing"

1143111121111111.content:
Mai waited for his answer.

"Well?"

Naruto's eyes darted to the blade at his throat then back at Mai.

"Ho...sorry."

Mai pulled the kuni away and Naruto thanked heaven. Mai looked at him with saddness in her eyes, she didn't bother hiding it, after all, this boy could see through her emotionless mask. He'd do it now, and she didn't blame him.

"I'm sorry I threatened you, its just...its just I want you to stay. I hate being alone so much I'd do anything to avaoid that again."

"Heh. That's it? Ha! That was all you had to tell me, but to be honest this wasn't the first time having a blade to my neck." Naruto said as he thought about his childhood, all those mobs of villagers trying to kill him becouse they thought that it would rewrite time and keep the nine-tailed fox trapped inside him from even showing up at all, The effects of going through all that until he was a Genin and had to have Itachi have to be his self-proclamed personal bodyguard until he went nuts and killed everyone in his clan except Sasuke had on Naruto were enough to help him explane Mai's seemingly bipolor-behavior.

"Sorry." Mai winced, she tried sounding nonchalant, but he was use to things like that? What kind of messed-up village was he from?

"So...which do you want first?"

"Huh?"

"What you said earlier. Do I start with licking or massaging you feet?"

Mai smiled a bit, he was going to stay! She wanted to hug him.

"Alright start with...
1143111121111111.title: Servicing Mai's Feet

choices: She's ready to have an intimate conversation with him.
She wants to continue her foot games with him.
11431111211111112.content:
“Let’s try to kill two birds with one stone,” Mai said. “I want you to massage my feet with your tongue!! Be extra careful that you get them nice and clean!!”
Naruto nodded and began licking Mai’s right foot up and down causing the young girl to giggle. Naruto couldn’t say that he liked the taste of Mai’s feet (Who would?), but for some reason the small smile that emerged on her lips as he licked, made him feel glad.
He guessed it was because he sympathized with Mai. That emotionless expression the weapon girl had given him had brought up the memories of his own lonely childhood. He shuddered as he remembered the cold and empty feeling inside of him and he was determined to stop Mai from feeling that. It didn’t matter that she spent an hour cruelly torturing him or had a dagger to his throat a couple seconds ago; Naruto couldn’t abandon someone who had that type of pain in her heart. Since Mai wasn’t ready to share her feelings with him yet, Naruto decided he would remain by her side just so she wouldn’t have to be alone. If licking her feet made Mai feel even the slightest bit happier, than Naruto was more than happy to endure the salty taste. He continued to lick her foot making sure to lick away whatever dirt he found.

Mai smiled as Naruto worked away at her foot. The feel of his tongue against her sole was both mentally and physically soothing for her and she was grateful to him for doing it.
Naruto continued to lick for another 20 minutes. After he had finished licking every area of the top and sole of Mai’s foot, Naruto began to lick her toes. Mai moaned as she felt Naruto’s tongue gently graze her toes. It really felt amazing for her. As Naruto licked between Mai’s toes, the weapon’s girl felt warm tingles of enjoyment run down her spine. After Naruto had finished licking every area of Mai’s right foot, Mai pressed her left foot against his face. Smiling, Naruto began to run his tongue up and down Mai’s other foot licking her left foot clean. After another half an hour of licking, Naruto had thoroughly licked every area of the weapon girl’s feet.

Mai inspected her feet to discover that Naruto had licked them spotless. She nodded approvingly. “You’re pretty good at this!!” She joked. “Maybe I can convince Azula to let me keep you as a personal foot licker.”

Naruto smiled. He felt glad that Mai was starting to warm up to him.
“No matter what the job is, I always do my best!” he said.

Mai laughed. The licking had made her feel a lot better. Apparently, Naruto had made more than her feet feel good. Just having someone to stay with her and keep her company eased some of the pain and anger she was feeling.

She looked at her “captive” trying to decide what to do next with him. She wanted to take him up on his offer to listen and talk with her but she didn’t trust herself not to break down and cry while she poured her soul out to him. Maybe it was better to just to continue to play with him for now. Mai affectionately rubbed her feet against Naruto’s head as she considered what to do.

What does she decide?
11431111211111112.title: Licking Mai's feet clean

choices: Mai cages Naruto, she wants to keep him
114311112111111121.content:
"So..." Mai said, a sheepish look on her face, "ready to talk?"

Naruto nodded

"Would you like to go first?"

Mai nodded, she was ready to have an intimate conversation with him.

"From early on, I was taught to be the picture of an obedient girl. I was a rich only child who got anything I wanted. As long as I behaved...and sat still?and didn't speak unless spoken to. My mother said I had to keep out of trouble. We had my Dad's political career to think about. The only person who could get me to express myself before you came along was former boyfriend Zuko, Azula's brother. Azula, Ty lee and I have been friends since...I can't remember how long. We went our seprate ways after we graduaited from the Royal Fire Accemey for Girls, Ty lee when off and joined the circuse, Azula stayed with her family, and I was sent off with my family after my dad was made a govoner. I found out from Azula that Zuko was banished by his dad for speaking out in a war meeting. I can't remember crying so much, that made feeling much of anything even harder, it convinced me emotions were painful and something that life would be better off without. My dad was made the govener of the city of Omashu after the king there surendered, after that Azula and Ty Lee came back into my life with a mission to help capture the Avatar, I was board out of my mind at the city and I'm sure you know by now, Azula's not the type that takes 'no' for an answer. We chased the Avatar and his friends for a while, eventually running into Zuko again, his banishment was revoked after Azula told her dad some fib about how he got rid of the Avatar. For a while, I was acctualy happy. sure me and Zuko had a few minor squabbles, but that was easy to deal with. It didn't last, Zuko turned on his dad, then ran off to join the Avatar and his friends, he didn't even say good-bye in person, he just left me a note telling me about it. Sorry if all my problems stem from Zuko, but I cared about him and he tore my heart out. After all that, Azula found you and...well, you know the rest."

Naruto nodded, going back into...that place...was never a good thing. That dark, cold, empty, lonely pit in the bowles of hell. He'd been there and he knew what it was like. he couldn't help it...he shuddered as he remembered the sheer loathing he had for that place. He was also feeling sheer disgust twords Mai's so-called parents, he knew he'd never be able to understand what having parents do something like that to you was like, but still...who chose political statuse over family?!?!?!? After she finished, Naruto looked Mai in the eye and told her everything about his life, how had had no parents to begin with, how his earliest memories were from members of the noble families in the village trying at assinate him when he was only a year old, the attack by the nine-tailed fox being why everyone hated him becouse of how all becouse he was born on the same day and how it had given them the idea that if they killed him, the fox demon would never have shown up at all.Obviously, the Third Hokage; also known as Sarutobi Sasuke, had passed a law forbidding anyone from talking about the accursed fox and his attack. Of course, this meant that Naruto had no idea why everyone gave him regular beatings, why everyone glared at him; why everyone hated his guts. It was no secret that Mitokado Homura and Utatane Koharu; heads of the village's council held a strong dislike for Naruto and did anything in their power to make his life a living hell or get an execution. In fact, they sometimes sent ANBU to assassinate him behind the Hokage?s back. Of course, they would always be caught and the Sandaime passed new orders to murder anyone who spills the secret or attacks Naruto. Needless to say; there were several ?mysterious? deaths regularly. Naruto was shunned by everyone, both peers and everyone else except for a few people, how thay saved him from that dark place. All of his life up to this point she learned it all, poor boy had wanted to vent all this for years, that was painfully obvious.

" Like I said, I know that being alone sucks more than I'd like, I've been in that place before, I know what its like, what it dose to people. I was lucky. Mai, here's what I know from having to go through all that: When you've spent your whole life surrounded by the darkness of the human heart, having people that you care about and care about you in turn is like being able to cluch a star in your bare hands. I'll remain by your side just so you don't need to be alone for as long as I have a say in the matter." Naruto finished.

Mai hugged him and held him close, and whispered in his ear something that made him smile.

"If that's what its like, I just found a star to hold onto."

1143111121111111211.content:
She was warm.

Never in her life had she ever felt so comfortable while sleeping. She found that she couldn't wake up. For some reason, she felt completely safe and secure, and she'd give anything to get a few more nights like this one. She sighed and snuggled deeper into the eerily soothing pillow. Perhaps it wasn't so bad to let herself relax every now and then. She hadn't realized exactly how good it felt to get a full night of imperturbable sleep, and no matter what it took, she'd get one of these pillows for herself. They were damn cozy. A sudden flash of light interrupted her from her ceaseless rest. She hadn't heard anything about a thunderstorm, and the lightning was quickly annoying her. Mai shut her eyes tighter to block out the sporadic sparks, digging her face deeper into the soft cotton of the pillowcase. She wasn't quite ready to wake up yet, and she'd do everything in her power to hang on to those last few minutes of precious sleep. The unmistakable sound of muffled giggling reached her ears, and she immediately snapped her eyes open and hopped up onto her knees. She blinked a few times to gain her bearings, her vision eventually becoming clear enough to see both Ty Lee and Azula looking down at her with devilish grins on their faces. The room was imperceptibly dark, signifying that it was early morning at best, and thin rays of light streamed in through the open window.

"What's going on?!" Mai spat, her luxurious sleep immediately forgotten. Their grins only widened, and both girls simultaneously pointed at something to her left. She glared at them for another few seconds before skeptically turning her head. To her amazement, Naruto was wantonly lying on the bed next to her, a miniscule amount of drool seeping out of the open corner of his mouth. Her own mouth opened in horror as she realized that the pillow she'd been snuggling up against all night was her new friend. At least they were still wearing they're clothes, that would have been a nightmare otherwise.

Azula couldn't resist. "Mai...I see you and the airbender were getting friendly!"

Mai's face tured red with furry. Ty Lee looked at Mai. Her aura wasn't dingy, pasty and gray anymore, something about this boy had changed her for the better. She'd have to ask Mai about it...

A knife missed her ear by inches, good thing Mai was too mad to aim straght

...assuming the girl in question didn't kill them first!

Ty Lee knew she was up next. Knowing what the smell of her own feet were like imagined the torture Naruto would go through smelling them up close and took pity on the poor ninja.
“Just tell Azula what she wants to know and we can put an end to this.” The circus girl told him assuming her natural role of good cop.

Naruto considered. For the briefest second he wondered if it would satisfy Azula if he told her about his techniques and village. Maybe then she would let him go. As soon as the thought hit him, he admonished himself for having it. A ninja’s techniques were not meant to be shared with anyone and his comrades depended on him to keep the location of his village a secret. Sorry Mai, Naruto thought, but giving away those secrets now would be like giving away my honor. He definitely didn’t want to endure anymore foot smelling but his pride was on the line. His firebender captor thought she could use foot odor to beat him and he was determined to prove her wrong. That was his way of the ninja!!

“You can all go to hell cause I’m not talking!! I don’t betray my comrades” He told them. For a second everyone (even Azula) was stunned speechless at the intensity of his outburst.
Stopping herself from feeling admiration for her captive, Azula broke into a cruel smile. “We’ll see how long that sentiment lasts.” She said coldly. “Ty Lee you’re up!!”

1143111121111212.content:
FYI: This takes place BEFORE the cooking rock episode of Avatar
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------


Ty Lee pat Naruto's cheek as she checked the door, She was glad when Naruto's eyes fluttered open. Ty Lee was now immensely grateful that they were in the interrogation room with its sound-proof walls because otherwise her real plan would be ruined.

“Look, I don't want to torture you, but Azula scares me, she woun't like it if I don't tell her something about you. So, where did you say you were from again?”

“...I want you to guess.” Replied a disgruntled Naruto as he looked at too-happy-to-be-natural Ty Lee, he was thanking his lucky stars that he got the "good cop" as the one to do this to him now he was being interrogated in the strangest way by an all-too-exuberant to-be-here girl. He was going to at least make it hard for her.

"As for what you said about being scared of her, I don't blame you, but what scares you more: letting something bad happen to the people you care for or the flame-shooting banshee? Now what's your first guess." Naruto said.

“...Hmmm...I Know! I bet you’re from...the eastern corner of the Earth Nation!”

“NOPE. Guess again...” While they continued the game of 20 questions, Naruto began making mental notes of the places Ty Lee mentioned in case he ever needed to make a good cover story since she was probably guessing based on his looks.

“Aw man,” replied a pouting Ty lee. Lying down in front of Naruto and holding her head in her hands while kicking her legs, Ty Lee tried again.

“Um...Oh! How about the eastern Fire Nation! They have a few blonds out there...I think.”

‘Fire Nation, eh?’ Pieces started matching together in his head. She-bitch who had been glaring alternately between him and Ty Lee earlier on was a firebender, whatever that was.

“NOPE! Guess agaaaaaaaain!” Naruto said as annoyingly as possibly, which is definitely saying something.

“Awwww...why won't you tell me?” asked Ty Lee.

“Please?” She almost whispered as she leaned in toward him, pouting cutely all the way. Damn, this was actually starting to get hard.

She took her finger and twirled it on his chest, leaning toward a slowly reddening and very embarrassed Naruto's ear with a devilish smile on her face.

“I promise not to tell Azula...as long as you promise to do something...special...for me, Kay?” she practically breathed into his ear.

“Well...uh...you see...uh...I'm not allowed to tell you where I’m from”

“Really?” she giggled a centimeter from his nose, giving him a look that sent jolts of energy up and down his spine like a bouncing ball. Ty Lee started to press herself against him and leaned into him as she ran a hand along his cheek.

“I'm...sorry but… I can’t tell you.” This came as almost a whimper from Naruto. Too much more and he wouldn’t be able to take it any longer.

Ty Lee looked back to make sure no one was watching and, when she knew it was clear, practically saddled up on Naruto’s chest and started to rake her hand through his hair like an expert. Damn what she could do with her hands! “Pleeease?” she said in the cutest voice she could muster while batting her eye lashes.

“Uh… well, m-maybe I can say...village...h-hidden in…” Naruto finaly gave in as Ty Lee's hand went from his hair to his lips, in the say-no-more-way that tells people to be seilent after hearing something, Naruto got the message, Ty Lee had gotten what she wanted whith him just saying he was from a hidden village. Ty Lee's hand moved to his chest. A coy smile made its way to her lips as she said, “Now that wasn’t so hard, was it?”

As she said that, Ty Lee pressed a little harder on Naruto’s chest, forcing him to the ground with their faces mere centimeters apart. Naruto began to sweat as she started to close the gap, “W-what are you do…?” he began but was cut off as she mashed her lips into his while pressing her tongue into his mouth in a strong and impassioned kiss.

Naruto was in shock. He had never been kissed before, and especially not like this. There was no denying that he enjoyed it and he was almost sad when Ty Lee ended it. She looked down at him with a sultry smile and spoke. “If I remove your bindings will you promise to play nice?” she purred, she liked this kid, she now knew Sokka was a bit of a lost cause with her, he was involved with that Suki girl, not that she cared anymore, this boy was a way better catch. Still in a daze from the intense kiss, Naruto numbly nodded his head, not really sure what he was acknowledging.

He soon heard four consecutive clicks and the bindings were off. Now Naruto was having an internal debate as to weather he should try and flee or stay. However, Ty Lee straddled him again before he could choose so he was forced to decide that he would stay for now and make his escape later.

“Uuuunnnnhh,” he moaned as she began to stroke his whisker marks, Ty Lee smiled as Naruto's eyes started to close lazily,

"Like that, do you? I guess it helps you relax then." Ty Lee cooed to the now half-asleep ninja. He looked so cute as he was drifting off to sleep. This was for the best anyways, if Azula came back and he was unconcouse, she'd be none the wiser, just assume that her foot-oder had knocked him out. After a little more stroking, Naruto was fully out like a light. Ty Lee had just lifted him into a chair when Azula re-entered the room.

"Well, what did you find out? And WHY is he out of the bindings?" the princess snapped.

"You said whoever got him to talk got to have him, Azula." Ty Lee pointed out, that caught Azula's intrest instantly.

"What...did...you...find...out?!" Azula hissed

"He said something about a hidden village...but he passed out from the smell before I found out were it was."

Azula's eyes went wide at the idea of a hidden village of airbenders, that would be a desaster for the Fire Nation! Azula felt her outrage buld until she sniffed the air. and she scrunched her nose in descust at the foul oder still in the air, no wounder the boy had passed out.

"Take him then." Azula said.

Ty Lee gathered Naruto up in her arms, she and Naruto had both won this, and now Azula would be chasing after non-existent airbenders, so that would help the Avatar out too. And she was got to take Naruto home with her. That brought one thought to her head as she looked fondly at Naruto's peacefull face:

She swore she'd pummle her sisters if they tried to take him from her.

Naruto eyes opened wide as Azula shared her plan with Naruto.

“Do you know I’ve mastered over a hundred firebending attacks involving just my feet.” Azula told him. “Some of the more powerful kicks cause me to generate fire and lightning around my feet. Rather hot fire and lightning.”

She looked down at her captive cruelly. “What would be the result on my feet if I were to perform all one hundred moves? Do you think that it would improve the quality of your torture?”

Naruto was horrified as he realized that amount of training would drive the psycho chick’s foot odor to a new unbearable level. Her feet would be dripping with sweat by the time she was done. Naruto struggled with all his might against the ropes but the smell of Azula’s feet had weakened him. He tried drawing on the demon fox’s energy but it dissipated. Apparently since Naruto’s life wasn’t in danger, the demon fox was content to sit back and enjoy Naruto being tortured. Once he realized he would be unable to escape, Naruto began to shake in fear.

Azula watched with a sick amount of pleasure at the “Airbender’s” increasing terror. If there was one thing she was better at than firebending it was psychological torment. She pulled her boot off of Naruto’s mouth.
“Sorry to deprieve you of my scent for a while but these boots will help make my feet extra sweaty.” She told him bending down to put on her boots.
Naruto looked at her angrily.
“Aww don’t be mad,” she teased him. “Once I finished practicing I’ll let you smell my feet for hours”
“Let me go!!” Naruto screamed at her.
“You don’t want to spend time with me” Azula said giving a mock pout. “I’m hurt.”
“Untie me and I’ll spend as much time with you as you want” Naruto said “Beating the crap out of you.”
“Save all that energy for sniffing my feet later.” She recommended. “For now just relax and enjoy the show.”
Azula got up and began practicing her moves performing a rather graceful series of kicks.
Naruto shouted after her calling her every bad name he could think of but the princess ignored him lost deep in training.
Eventually Naruto realized his shouting was useless and gave up exhausted. He had no choice but watch his tormentor practice her routines.

Azula made a mental note that Naruto had stopped shouting but didn’t say anything instead choosing to focus on her techniques. She smiled to herself as she continued her kicks. She knew forcing her captive to watch her make her feet as gross for him as possible was a horrible torture within itself. She imagined it was like forcing a condemned man to watch his executioner sharpen the ax. She grinned as she thought about how much agony he must be in watching her prepare her feet for him.

Naruto watched as Azula’s firebending kicking techniques got more and more elaborate. She performed spin kicks and flip kicks generating blue flames and even lightning from her feet. Even Naruto had to admit that her attacks looked amazing but the thought of what was happening inside her boots sent a cold chill down his spine.

Finally two hours later Azula stopped her attacks. She was panting from going all out. She smiled evilly and slowly began to walk towards her victim. Naruto shuddered as he knew what was coming next.
1143111122.title: A Sweaty Workout

choices: He wakes up in a Kennel  at the foot of Azula's bed
He waks up in Azula's boot, she shrunk his so he would simmer in her footsweat!
11431111221.content:
Azula bent down and took off her boots again. Naruto wimpered, causing Azula to feel a smirk grow on her face.

"Don't worry, this woun't hurt a bit." Azula said

Naruto shuttered, the way she said that...he suddenly wish the Akatsuki would show up. Fat chance of that, they wanted to rip the demon fox out of his still-living body, if he would have welcomed seeing those psychos, this girl could put Ibiki to shame, and he was the one who was going to learn that the hard way. He had to convince her not to do this.

"I have to admit, your attacks were amazing."

Azula looked up at him, she was delibritly going as slow as possable to improve the quality of the boy's psychological torment.

"Thank you. You seemed to enjoy the show I put on for you." she said

"I did. What are you, a pyro-goddess or something?"

Azula felt herself begin to blush, true she had been complimented on her skill as a firebender befor, but someone she didn't even know calling her a pyro-goddess? That was new. Azula kicked off her boots and still had her smirk on.

"So, I'm a pyro-goddess to you am I? Well, how about I give you a sample of the fruits of my training, little one."

With that, Naruto felt her feet plant themselves so close to his face that it seemed to him that they were tring to mirge with him. The smell was even more awful that before. All those kicks did a better job than he was afraid of. He couldn't think, couldn't breath, or even move. The stale smell of overworked feet continues to degrade his state, the stink of which makes his determination wither. Naruto continues to shudder from having Azula's foot odor corrupt his bodily system. Naruto's mouth is filled with the vinegar taste. And his eyes were teary from the overwhelming odor thanks to forcibly enduring the hellacious torture.

"Thirsty?" Azula asked, a mock-sweetness in her tone. She forced open his mouth and poured all the built-up sweat inside her boots down his throat, forcing him to drink every last drop. Naruto let out a muffled scream that made Azula laugh.

"Aw...how cute, you can't stand not having my feet on your face."

Azula put her feet back were they were. Naruto was sure as this was hell that the demon fox was loving this. That became wickedly clear as the fimmiler feel of red chakra gathered at on place: His nose, making his sinse of smell god-only-knew how sharper. Naruto passed out, he couldn't stand it.
11431111221.title: Naruto experiences the fruits of her training.

choices: Azula begins to treat him like a foot pet.
114311112211.content:
“Ugh” Naruto groans as he wakes up. His lungs burn and his head is dizzy from having to breathe in a large amount of foot odor. Worse he can still taste Azula’s footsweat on his tongue. He looks around to find himself in a small metal cage. Through the cage he can see a bed in front of him that seems fit for a queen. Don’t tell me that psycho chick took me home with her he thought. Suddenly he realizes his hands are untied. Bitch made her first mistake he thought. He gathers his chakra and uses a rasengan on the cage. Surprisingly nothing happened.

“That won’t work.”

Naruto hears a familiar laugh that causes his face to turn paler than Orochimaru.
He feels a tugging on his neck. Someone has attached a leash and collar onto him while he was asleep and he had a pretty good idea who it was. He turns around to see the pair of boots that he had gotten to know a little too well during his last few hours of torture. His worst fears confirmed, Naruto looks up at Azula’s smiling face.

“That cage is built to withstand attack from even the most powerful airbenders” She tells him grinning.

“I’m not an airbender.” Naruto whines. “I don’t even know what that is.”

“Whatever,” Azula says. “I’m having too much fun torturing you to stop even if you did confess everything now.”

Naruto shuddered. The more he become familiar with Azula’s tortures, the less he looked forward to seeing how she could top herself torturing him.

Azula bent down by Naruto’s cage an amused smile on her face.
“You have no idea how bored I was until you woke up. That was very inconsiderate of you passing out on me like that.” She lectured him clicking her tongue. “But at least it gave me the time to think up new ways of making your life miserable. Do you want to hear what I came up with?”

“If I say no would it make a difference,” Naruto said dryly.

Azula briefly wondered if Naruto was related to the boomerang kid that traveled with the Avatar before ignoring his snide remark and continuing.

“You know growing up I had all the material objects I ever wanted. But traveling around a lot, I never really got to have a pet” Azula told him tugging on his leash.
Naruto could see where this was going. He already had a collar around his neck. No way he thought…she wouldn’t. Then again he realized...she was evil.

“I always wanted a puppy” Azula continued to talk in a classic rant that all villains are inherently gifted with. “Something that would look up at me with devotion and loyally lick my feet no matter what I did to it. Unfortunately even when I was allowed to have one, the thing would always be afraid of me.”

Gee I wonder why Naruto thought. You’re so charming in person.

“I mean you light the thing’s tail on fire and suddenly it doesn’t want to be around you.” She said acting hurt.

That comment gave Naruto a vivid description of what being Azula’s pet would be like and he began to pull at his collar in a useless attempt to get it off.

“Fortunately you came along.” Azula informed him “After you passed out from our little torture session, I decided you’d make a great pet for my feet. I’ll take care of you and you’ll be devoted to me for it. We’ll play games. I’ll teach you tricks. Of course I’m still gonna torture you but you’ll learn to deal with it…well eventually anyway. It will be perfect”
She grinned as she thought how humiliating this idea was for him.

Naruto didn’t want to be anybody’s pet but the idea of belonging to this woman particularly frightened him. He doubted she was as compassionate an owner as Kakashi or Kiba.

“I’m not going to be your pet” he said adamantly.

“It’s so cute that you think you have a choice.” Azula laughed. She was going to enjoy humiliating him.
114311112211.title: Kennel

choices: She tortures him before going to sleep making him smell her feet all night
She uses her feet to train her pet to do tricks.
1143111122111.content:
“Well as your new owner, I guess the first thing I should do is name you.” Azula said. She looked at Naruto grinning. “Any suggestions?”

Naruto decided not to play her game. He just clenched his teeth and glared at her. This was fine for Azula who was more than happy to offer suggestions of her own.

“Let’s see Appa, Momo, and Zuzu are taken” Azula says wondering aloud “What else can I name you?”

The marking on Naruto’s face give her an idea.

“How about I call you whiskers? Here Whiskers here here” She says calling him the way she would a pet. She tugs on the leash forcing Naruto to come towards her. She pets his head through the bars.

“That’s a good boy” She says teasing him. She was loving this.

Naruto angrily tried biting her hand. Azula quickly pulls her hand away before Naruto can get to it.

“Bad pet. Bad” Azula scolds him “Now your owner is going to have to punish you.”

She smiles as she once again takes her boots off. Instantly the odor Naruto has become too familiar with fills the room. Azula pulls on his leash getting Naruto’s nose to stick out through the bars and brings one of her boots to his face. Naruto begins to cough and gag. Azula’s feet smelled as awful as ever.

“Still can’t get used to the smell huh?” Azula laughs.

She makes him smell her boot for five minutes. By the time she takes it away tears are running down Naruto’s face.

“Now you better behave like a good foot pet Whiskers or I’m going to make you smell my boots all night.” Azula tells him.

Seeing the grin on Azula’s face, Naruto can tell she is serious. The idea of smelling Azula’s boots the entire night is too terrifying a prospect for him and he reluctantly submits to her.

“I’ll be good.” He finally says.

Azula smiles with glee. She feels a rush of power in getting her new pet to accept his role. She decides to see whether he’ll really behave himself.

“Let me pet your head,” She orders.

Humilated Naruto bends his head down tears running down his face.
Azula gently rubs her hands through his hair.

“There there” she says stroking him gently. She cups his chin and squeezes his cheeks. “You make a cute pet Whiskers.” She taunts him.

Naruto cheeks turn red with humiliation.

Azula decides to twist the knife even further.
“Bark for me Whiskers.” She orders.

Naruto hesitates only long enough for Azula to roll her boot around in her hand. Seeing that, Naruto quickly releases a little yelp.

“Louder” Azula orders.

Naruto releases a loud bark.

Azula is laughing like crazy.

“Good boy” she tells him chuckling.

Azula smiles happily at having broken her pet. Now that he is hers, What does she do with him?
1143111122111.title: Azula's Foot Pet

11431111221112.content:
"Now Whiskers...would you like learning some tricks?" Azula cooed mockingly.

Naruto nodded reluctently, his new owner still had her boots in one hand.

"Good boy Whiskers." Azula laughed as she opened his kennel. Azula pulled on his leash and he walked out on all fours, the way a pet would, Azula howled histericly at seeing how good her pet was being, but that didn't mean she wasn't going to make him pay for doing something BEFORE she told him to.

“Here Whiskers here.” She says calling him the way she would a pet.
She tugs on the leash forcing Naruto to come towards her. She pets his head and smiles wickedly. Naruto whimmpered.

"Your a VERY good boy, Whiskers...but mommey didn't say to come out on all fours yet!" Azula said with glee. Using the leash to hog-tie him she puts her feet in his face again. Azula relaxed, pressing her feet to his forehead and streching and flexing her toes. Naruto yelped, why was she doing this to him for being a good pet?

"Now... what tricks would I like to teach you first? Keep in mind, if you don't do them up to my sadisfaction, I'll punish you and you know how." Azula said lightly as she rubbed her feet through his hair.

"Let's see, the tricks you teach a dog are too easy. Hey I know: The ring of fire first, dosn't that sound like fun Whiskers? Ho-no wait, how about I teach you how to juggle hot coals only useing your nose?" Azula said excitidly, Naruto made a dash for the door, but was stopped dead in his tracks when his owner tugged on his leash forcing Naruto to come towards her, chocking him in the process.

"Hm. Seems you like my feet don't you my little pet." Azula said as her feet rested on her pet's face, she was delighted at the muffled screams that she heard. As Whiskers tried to get her feet away from his poor nose, his owner got up, steped over him, slipped her feet back into her boots, and headed for the cortyard.

"Ho Whiskers...I desided on what you'll learn first. Azula said

Her pet made her chock him again.

(Author's Note: For the sake of avoiding confusion, from this point on Naruto will be refired to as "Whiskers" seeing as how Azula renamed him when she made him her pet)

choices: he messes up and gets a bet scorched and has to smell Azula's feet
he gets it right and Azula makes him smell her feet anyway, she's cruel
114311112211121.content:
Azula pulled Whiskers along, humming to herself. Her pet on the other hand, was tring to naw throught the leash around his neck, but couldn't get even a mark on it. What was this made of?

"Here, change into this." Azula said pleasently, tossing him a red one-peice, spandex leotard with strips of cloth tied to it so it looked like it had streamers sewn on it, it looked like a red virsion Gai and Lee's outfit. Azula being pleasent and that silly-looking outfit along with the hoop in the cortyard had her guess that much. The poor boy looked scared, and she didn't blame him.

Ty lee asked, she had a bad feeling, and two little voices were currently having an argument in her head, one marked "DO THE RIGHT THING" that wanted her to help Azula's pet get away and the other was marked "SANITY" thay was saying she shouldn't risk Azula's wrath to help him. He looked over at Azula, saying everything he needed to without opening his mouth. Azula was who knew what was going on, not him.

"I was thinking of having him do the ring of fire, that outfit was dipped in lamp oil along with the cloth streamers." The boy looked like he wanted to throw himself at Ty Lee and beg for help. Again, Ty Lee didn't blame him, memories of how Azula "persuaded" her to join her and Mai flashing through her head and the two voices in her head began screaming themselves horse.

Azula lit the ring and took off the leash, leaving just the coller, then ordered him to jump through. Ty Lee couldn't watch. She turned away. with only one thought in her mind: Poor kid.

Naruto, or "Whiskers" as he was now being made to go by, did as Azula told him and...
114311112211121.title: The ring of fire

choices: Azula makes her pet smell her feet nonstop for a full hour.
Azula decides to force Ty Lee to torture Naruto with her feet.
1143111122111212.content:
Even from twenty feet away, Whiskers could feel the heat coming from the flames. He shivered in terror. He really didn’t want to do this. For a brief second he considered running away but realized the courtyard was blocked off and he had nowhere to go. He had experienced Azula’s punishment before and he would do anything to avoid being punished by her again. In his mind, he was also beginning to accept Azula’s role as his owner. She had beaten him, she had broken him and now he belonged to her.

As he crawled towards the hoop, he realized that just obeying his owner and jumping through the hoop wasn’t enough, he had to emerge from the hoop unscathed or he would have another personal punishment session with Azula’s feet. The odds however were against him considering Azula had dipped his costume in lamp oil. Even the smallest spark would cause his outfit to burst into flames. At the last second the ninja turned foot pet got his most creative idea since using a clone to form the rasengan……creating a chakra shield!!! Working quickly, he gathered his chakra as he leaped through the hoop. His chakra extended around his costume preventing the cruel sparks from reaching him. To Azula’s dismay, Whiskers came through the hope unharmed.

Ty Lee who had turned away during Whisker’s dangerous jump had turned back expecting to see the horrific sight of the charred remains of Azula’s pet . She was surprised to see him not only alive and well, but without a burn on him. She breathed a sigh of relief, then she clapped her hands impressed with Whisker’s ability to survive the ring of fire.

“Good job Whiskers. You’re so good at tricks” Ty Lee said petting his head. She really wanted to say she was happy that he survived Azula’s evil game, but that was as close as she dared go to showing her support for him.
Whiskers smiled happily. He looked over at his owner hoping for her approval. Pets lived to please their owners. Looking at Azula’s face, he saw her eyes narrow and shuddered. She didn’t look happy he had emerged unhurt. Whiskers wondered if she was going to punish him anyway. However, Azula stern expression broke into a smile.

“Here Whiskers, Here Here” She called. Whiskers reluctantly ran to her. Azula cupped his chin and affectionately petted his head. “Good job Whiskers…your owner is so proud of you.”
Naruto felt glad. Not only had he pleased his owner, he was sure he had avoided the dreaded punishment Azula had become so good at giving him. He began to relax.

Ty Lee of course knew Azula better than that. She spotted Azula’s trademark grin appear and knew bad things were in store for Whiskers. She wanted to call out and warn him but fear of Azula’s wrath prevented any cry from escaping her throat.

Sure enough…Ty Lee was right. As Azula stroked her pet’s head, she winked at Ty Lee before creating a spark with one of her fingers and brushing one of the streamers on Whisker’s outfit. Instantly the costume burst into flames. Naruto began to howl in pain as he tried desperately to extinguish the flames covering him.

Azula laughed hysterically as Whiskers rolled around on the ground in an attempt to put out the fire scorching his body. Ty Lee covered her mouth to prevent herself from screaming.

“Oops!” Azula giggled. “Looks like I spoke too soon, it appears I get to show Ty Lee how I punish you after all."
1143111122111212.title: A Successful Trick

choices: Azula puts Whiskers in his kennel and takes him somewere with her
Ty lee, wanting to help, sends a message to Aang's friends telling about Naruto

Whiskers instantly recconised the smell and attepmted to dround himself.

The costume she had him ware was now nothing but ashs at the pond's bottom but he wasn't hurt at all! Maby it was karma, she had to confess although she liked seeing others suffer, Whiskers had only done what she wanted him to and she was such a poor sport that she sabotaged him for just bing good at it. She thought about that, she was known as "Huo Long Azula" (a nickname that translated from chinese, meant Fire Dragon Azula) but she wasn't suppose to be that cruel. Azula felt her guts churn. was she developing a...yack... Conscience? She knew Avatar Roku was one of her ansestors, but this was absurd! Still...seeing Whiskers shrink away from her made her feel sorry for him and outraged at herself.

"Whiskers...I'll make it quick, just a hour." she said "Promise."

Azula felt better when Whiskers acctually did the hour, she dressed him in dry clothes then...
11431111221112121.title: Azula's a BAD  owner, but maby that can change

choices: They play a friendly game of "Dragon Cards", Naruto Vs. Azula
114311112211121211.content:
Azula put Whiskers back in his kennel and put it on a cart.

Whiskers looked at his owner with a question in his eyes, Azula hadn't said if he was allowed to talk yet, the last time he did something like that, Azula had tortured him useing the meathod she resserved for him alone.

"Whiskers have you heard of "Dragon Cards" ? Its a Chinese card game that I think you might like."

Naruto didn't have a clue what Azula was talking about, but until they got to where ever they were off too. he decided that learning this game would pass the time. By the time they got the were they were heading to, Naruto knew the game's rules.

Rules:

-First place Dragon Cards deck in the middle of the table they are going to play at

-Second, two players draw 6 cards one after the other

-Each card depicts a dragon of one of 5 elements, the numbers indicate the level of
the dragon, there are 5 levels, five elements, three identical cards of each kind, for a
total of 75 cards!

-Once you collect three of the same card, you can summon a dragon.

- The players can summon 2 dragons each

-The player who defeats the opposing player's dragons wins the game

Elements:
Water
Metal
Earth
Fire
Wood

Element victories:
fire beat metal
metal beat wood
wood beat earth
earth beat water
water beat fire

Azula finished telling Whisker about the game, then let him out.
114311112211121211.title: Learning about a new game

1143111122111212111.content:
Azula opened Whiskers' kennel and instructed him to exit. Naruto crawled out and looked around him. He was in a tunnel underground somewhere. He wondered why Azula had chosen to bring him here. Azula herself was unsure of why. She supposed she needed a quiet place to clear her head and deal with her actions earlier in the day. This underground bunker (used to hide the fire lord during an emergency) was the perfect place to do that. Permission from the royal family was needed to enter this chamber and with her father away having a conference with his troops and her brother god knows where pursuing the avatar, she would have the time alone with her pet.

She looked affectionately at Whiskers still feeling a little guilty over setting him on fire. While she tried to portray herself as cruel, she hated the fact that even her own mother had thought her a monster. Yet what she had done to her obedient pet certainly proved her mother right. There was the added fact that eventhough she had burned her pet, he had come out of the pond without a mark on him. Now she had to worry about karma as well.

Seeing her pet look up at her inquisitively, she decided to put her thoughts on hold. If karma was after her, she would deal with it later. In any case, for now she would give cruelty a break and just have some gentle fun with her pet.

"Whiskers I want to play a game of Dragon Cards with you."

Naruto nodded. Although he was still scared of his owner, the game sounded like fun. While he was not as skilled as Shikamaru, Naruto was a mischief maker at heart and liked playing games. Plus it sure beat having to go through the ring of fire again. Azula lead Whiskers to a table and they both took a seat at opposites sides. As Azula shuffled the deck, she spoke to her pet.

"Lets make this game interesting" She said. "If you lose, I'll punish you in my usual way."

Naruto shivered then looked up at her dying to say something. Azula chuckled realizing that her pet didn't dare speak unless she gave him permission to.

"What's on your mind Whiskers?" She asked.

"Well shouldn't I get something if I win?" Naruto asked. He cringed thinking Azula might punish him for daring to suggest that.

Instead she smiled before asking "What do you want?"

There were alot of things Naruto wanted at the moment considering he was currently a pet for a girl with a penchant for sick tortures...But as he thought about it, there was one thing he wanted from his owner maybe even more than his freedom.

"Let's call it a request to be named later." He finally said.

Azula scratched her head. Her pet was definitely up to something.

"Interesting," She said.

"Of course if you're not confident in your skills, I'll understand if you just want to play it safe and stick with just punishing me if I lose" Naruto said smiling. "After all losing to a first time player would be a sore wound in itself."

The crafty ninja was beginning to learn enough about his owner to know she wouldn't refuse that kind of challenge. Azula tried to make an angry face but she couldn't help admiring her opponent's guts.

"Me!! Lose!!!! Dream on!!!" She said laughing. "You got yourself a deal but when I win I'm going to enjoy punishing you"

Both players shook hands before getting the game underway.

Azula was born lucky but Naruto is the kid everyone wants to bet on.
How does the "Dragon Cards" game turn out?
1143111122111212111.title: The Stakes

11431111221112121112.content:
"Heh, I summon a level 3 fire dragon and level 2 fire dragon." Azula smirked, she felt pretty sure of herself.

"Darn, and all I can summon are these..." Naruto said with a grin as he summoned a level 4 water dragon and a level 5 water dragon.

Projections of the dragons arose from the cards. Naruto had his two water dragons attack Azula's fire dragons, Azula couldn't beleve it. She just sat there, her eyes wide and her mouth being the envy of a wide-mouthed bass. She lost...to her own pet! It was unbelevable! Azula never lost before and Whiskers, who had never even heard of "Dragon Cards" beat her so...easily! Just how good WAS this guy?!?!?!

"Good game, a bit too short, but still...would it be wrong to say that your amzing at this!" Azula laughed.

"I just got a lucky hand." her pet said bashfully.

Azula stood up and walked over to Whiskers and planted a kiss on his forehead. Naruto blushed bright as a bonfire, it was the first time a girl had kissed him. Azula giggled at the shocked look on his face, he was just too cute when he was embarrised.

"You got me, I'm not going to deny that you won fair and squar. What's this request of your's, Whiskers?"

"Do you remember how I was training when you found me?"

"Yeah, I'm glad I found you, so?"

Naruto whent into an explination about how his life in the Leaf village was as one of Kakashi’s students and how he had to grow up with no one in his life, leaving out the nine-tailed fox compleatly of course, Azula started to cry at the thought of her pet being so lonely, But more than anything, she was mad as heck at this Kakashi guy. She felt justified in beleaving Kakashi’s treatment of Naruto was wrong starting from the bell test. How on earth do you expect a boy who has been ostracized by his own village to just grasp the concept of teamwork like that? Naruto’s never had anyone really looking out for him, especially not his classmates. While the exercise would be understandable for Sasuke (if he weren’t such a stuck up prick) as he has been pampered by his village, it makes no sense for Kakashi to reasonably expect Naruto to rely on two people who have never been there for him, i,e. Sasuke and Sakura, to help him. Naruto, despite his outgoing personality, had to learn to be a loner to survive. What kind of idiot is Kakashi not to be able to see that anyway? Next is the training. Or lack thereof. Azula made a mental list what Kakashi taught Naruto: Climbing Trees...and that’s it. Kakashi regarded Sasuke more highly than Naruto, that much is pitifully obvious; as he watched Neji fight Hinata, he privately thought that not even Sasuke could stand up to him, as if that bastard set the bar for Genin standards; also when he told Naruto that he couldn’t train him, he blatantly said he had more important things to take care of. How Kakashi abandoned Naruto during the one month break of the Chunin exam was more than a little messed up. Granted that things worked out for the best (with Naruto finding a stronger teacher more willing to train him) Kakashi didn’t know that would happen. What exactly was better chakra control going to do to help Naruto defeat a Hyuuga prodigy!? He probably planned on Naruto losing and training him in the next exam, the bastard. First and foremost, if you can’t train more than one student at once, don’t take a three man squad. Secondly, Kakashi knows the Kage Bunshin. Why couldn’t he have at least made one to instruct Naruto. Thirdly, and this is the kicker, he had the gall to reprimand Jiraiya for teaching Naruto the Rasengan after he had taught Sasuke the Chidori! This clearly indicates that, while he knew the technique all along, Kakashi had no plans of teaching it to Naruto because he didn’t think he could handle it appropriately. What did he think Sunshine boy was going to do with the Chidori; use it as a magnetic force to attract an ice cream truck for the Konohamaru corps to have a snack!? He actually believed that Sasuke would use it to protect his fellow shinobi of the Leaf. Didn’t he spend a lot of alone time with Sasuke? You’d think he was a little more observant of the fact that everything Sasuke did was toward killing Itachi...especially since the prick had said that! Also, she made sure not to forget the rather ironic fact that Naruto mastered the Rasengan in roughly one month, the same amount of time taken to train for the third round...a rather obvious smear on Kakashi’s poor teaching. The idiot doesn’t even realize how Jiraiya taught Naruto the Rasengan because Kakashi was too busy being a dad to a pompuse ass that was just like her brother.

"So...your a fighter?"

"Yep...and being in that kennel made me feel I needed a good workout, no offince."

"I'll do what I can for you, after all, you are my owner!" Whiskers pipped up happly.

Azula laughed affectionately and ruffled Whisker's hair

Whiskers and Azula turned to see the ghost of the Fire Lord from a hundred years ago

"What's going on?!" Whiskers shouted, the nine-tailed fox was quick to answer, his tone was lacking it's usual blood-lust and malace, all of it replaced by urgency.

Sozin agreed and so the fate of the world was going to be desided on a card game between one of the living and one of the dead.

People form the Fire Nation relay souly on FIRE DRAGONS!" Naruto shot back. Sozsin screamed in outrage! That was the biggest flaw of anyone from the Fire Nation playing this game!

Just then, who should show up but the Avatar. Who handled it? Aang saw that a strange boy with blond hair was kneeling beside Azula, making a fuss about her well-being.

"Who are you?" Aang asked

Azula struggled to open her eyes and her pet told her about a bald kid with an arrow on his head showing up. Azula tried to rise and get the Avatar, but her body wouldn't listen to her. Whiskers put a comforting hand on her shoulder and told her he'd take care of it.

Aang had to guess this kid was Azula's new goon. He saw that the kid, who didn't look older than he did, create a ball of rotating spiritual energy. Aang was hit with it, the ball of energy slammed into his gut. Aang felt the ball's power torch his insides, it was an attack, no denying that. It was the size of a fist and felt like a hurricane forcing its way inside his body. Azula was likewise impressed, even simi-awake from her ansestor's doings, she was able to analyze how the attack worked.

Aang flew out of the cave and Naruto/Whiskers heard a rumble above Azula. A rock was coming loose, Aang had earthbent a rock above her. Acting on his natrual impulse to protect the ones he cared for, Naruto knocked her out of the way and the rock hit him over the head. He was out cold.

"Whiskers!!!!!!!!!!!!" Azula said, forcing her body to obey her, she rushed over to her pet and saw he wasn't hurt bad, just knocked out. She breathed a sigh of releif, She just had to wake him up, and she knew just how. She slid her boots off and held his head proped on her lap.

"Whiskers...I'm sorry but this it for your own good."
