Almost used to routine by now...Azula moved her feet onto his face and waited for the smell to do the rest. It didn't work at first. Azula become worried.

"C'mon please Whiskers wake up!!" she said tears forming in her eyes. She pressed her feet harder against his nostrils desperately trying to rouse the fallen ninja.
Finally her foot odor had the desired affect. Naruto coughed a bit before his eyes jolted open and he attempted to turn his head as far away from Azula's feet as possible.

"God that still smells awful." He said.

Azula laughed and hugged him tightly. She was so glad he was awake and unharmed. Naruto gently moved out of Azula's embrace before she accidently crushed his ribs from hugging him too hard. He looked at his owner. The last thing he remembered was trying to save her from that falling rock.

"Azula that boulder...you're not hurt are you?" He asked.

The fire nation princess was stunned. Even after everything she had done to him, he had risked his life for her, taken a boulder to the head and still managed to be worried whether or not she was injured. She felt an overwhelming amount of affection for the boy in front of her.

Azula shook her head. "No you saved me!" she told him. "You're my hero!"
Naruto smiled. He was glad he was able to protect her.

"What about the bald kid?" He asked.

"He got away!" Azula said. "After the rock feel he didn't bother continuing the attack."

Naruto got up. "I'll go after him for you!!" he announced.

Azula considered. It wasn't that long ago that she wouldn't have hesitated to use whatever means necessary to defeat the avatar, but now looking at blonde ninja, she couldn't help feeling worried about him facing such a powerful enemy. She felt the two thoughts collide within her mind. The need to catch the Avatar vs the need to protect someone close to her. In the end her affection won out.

"Whiskers wait!!" She called.

Naruto stopped.

"You don't need to do that!" She said. "He's not important to me anymore. You can just let him go."

Naruto thought about it. He suspected Azula was trying to protect him and was willing to give up what she wanted in order to keep him safe. He thought if he defeated the kid it might make his owner happy and he was more than willing to risk his own safety to do it. At the same time Azula still looked very weak and Naruto didn't want to leave her alone. Maybe he should give up the chase for now.

What does he do?

Which type of game does he choose?

114311112211121211121111212.title: Mind games

choices: Take up Azula's Challenge! He trusts her enough to put his thoughts at risk.
Play another game. There are just some thoughts he's not ready to share.
1143111122111212111211112121.content:
Azula smiled as she considered what type of mental game to play with her pet. There was something that she was dying to try with him but she wasn’t sure he would go for: a Mental Agni-Kai. This type of mental duel was something that only the most experienced firebenders challenged each other with because the stakes were very high. Not only would the participants of this duel be mentally tired out by the end of it, but they basically put their greatest secrets at risk by competing.

The Mental Agni-Kai basically allowed the competitors to see into each other’s souls. That was part of the reason Azula wanted to try this with Naruto. The Ninja fascinated her and she cared about him a great deal, but at the same time she didn’t understand him at all. What type of person would save her life after she had cruelly tortured him? Why would he stay with a cruel owner like her when he clearly had the power within him to escape? How did he really feel about her? This game was a chance for her to get to know him personally and understand what makes him tick. Azula looked at Naruto wondering if he would be willing to compete. She supposed that if she really wanted too, she could order her pet to engage in this duel. If she could get him to sniff her feet or jump through fire on command, it would be easy for her to force him to play. The problem with that she was beginning to care too much about him to violate his personal thoughts and secrets without his consent. She would tell him the facts first and only go through with it if Naruto was willing to try it.

“Whiskers, come here” Azula said signaling her pet to take a seat next to her. Without any hesitation, Naruto sat next to Azula and snuggled against his owner’s shoulder like an affectionate puppy dog. Azula smiled thinking about how the ninja made a cute pet. She hugged him tightly before continuing. “There is one mind game in particular that I would like to play with you.”

“Great set up the board,” Naruto said.

Azula laughed.
“No it’s not like that silly! Let me tell you about it first and then you decide whether you want to play or not.”

Naruto nodded.
“Okay!”

“I want to challenge you to a mental Agni Kai,”

“A mental what?” Naruto asked.

“Agni Kai. But we could call it a mental duel if that’s easier for you to remember.” Azula said. “It’s basically a battle between two opponents’ minds. The goal of the game is to penetrate your opponents’ mental defenses.”

Naruto was intrigued.
“How does that work?” he asked.

“Well using a special technique, firebenders can gain access into another person’s mind,” Azula said. “It only works if the person is willing to let them do it though.”

“Uh…isn’t there a small problem with that?” Naruto interrupted. “I’m not a firebender.”

“Yes I know that,” Azula chuckled. “Do you think I’m stupid?”

Naruto decided it was best not to bring up how she mistook him for an airbender when they first met. Instead he allowed Azula to continue.

“I can use the technique to give you access to my mind as well” She told him.

“Ah,” Naruto said.

Azula went on. “When our minds are linked, you’ll be able to see any of my thoughts, memories, or secrets that you want.”

“Really…Cool!!!!” Naruto said excited. He liked the idea of seeing Azula’s intimate thoughts.

Azula smiled. She loved the way Naruto could easily become really energetic.
“Easy Whiskers! That’s only if I allow you too.”

“Huh?”

“Well I did say this was a game right?” Azula reminded him. “I’m obviously going to try to prevent you from doing that. You’ll probably want to do the same as well.”

“Wait…You’d be able to see into my mind too?!!!!!!” Naruto asked.

“Oh course! That’s the whole point!! Why is there something embarrassing you don’t want me to see?” Azula asked.

Naruto’s eyes shifted back and forth. He did have his share of embarrassing moments. Among them was his first kiss with Sasuke. Rather than answer Azula, Naruto decided to distract her by asking another question. “How do I prevent you from seeing into my mind?”

Azula caught onto what Naruto was doing but she answered his question anyway.
“Well while our minds are linked like that. I can basically show you anything I want and Vice versa. If I wanted to, I could make you think you were boiling in oil and you can do that to me as well.”

“Oh so it’s like genjitsu” Naruto said.

“Ah that mental illusion jitsu you told me about,” She said. “Yes…I guess you can say that. Basically we’ll try to use mental images to force each other to submit and drop our guard.”

“I see” Naruto said considering. The game sounded challenging.

“Of course if you do decide to drop your mental guard. I’ll be able to see whatever secret or personal thought of yours that I want to. It will work the same way for me.”

“So if I dropped my guard, you would be able to see all my thoughts?” Naruto asked.

“Well only one thought or secret at a time.” Azula said. “You’d be able to see my thoughts and secrets as well but only if you are able to beat me.”
The fire princess smiled giving Naruto a teasing look like that was never going to happen.

Naruto scratched his head. He liked a challenge and he wanted to please his owner, but at the same time there were some personal thoughts that he had that he didn’t want Azula to see. Also knowing that Azula had a sadistic streak to her, Naruto wasn’t crazy about letting Azula show him whatever mental images she wanted to.

Azula saw Naruto thinking it over and gently squeezed his shoulder.
“It’s fine if you don’t want to do this,” She told him. “I’m not going to force you. If there are some secrets you don’t feel comfortable sharing with me, we could always play something else.”

Naruto smiled. Azula had softened a lot since she originally captured him. What does he decide to do?
1143111122111212111211112121.title: A Mental Duel?

11431111221112121112111121211.content:
Naruto slowly nodded towards Azula
“You know I can’t refuse a challenge!” he said.

“Are you sure? Don’t think you have to do it to please me.” Azula told him.

“I’m not. I wanna find out what your greatest secret is,” Naruto said giving a sneaky grin like he was about to pull off Kakashi’s mask.

Azula laughed. Her pet was really good at making her seem at ease.
“Well that’s only if you can beat me! And trust me that’s not gonna happen!!”
She playfully ruffled the ninja’s hair.

“I bet it’s that you like playing with dolls as a little girl.” Naruto teased her.

“Ick. Only setting them on fire,” Azula said trying her best to scowl. She couldn’t hold it for long and quickly broke out into a smile. Not wanting Naruto to get the last word in, she quickly added “And just for that…let’s make this game have the same stakes as last time. That way I can torture you in addition to learning your secret.”

“Great cause there’s another request I’ve been thinking of asking you to fulfill for me.” Naruto told her.

“Another request?” Azula asked curious.

“Yup! You’ll find out when I win!!!” Naruto said.

Azula giggled and shook her head.
“Dream on!…Alright let’s get started. I still have to teach you how to play the game.”
In must cases Azula would take advantage of her opponent’s inexperience but Naruto was a special case. She wanted to play fair with him. She would show him how to guard his mind and knowing Naruto’s ability to pick up games really fast…they would be evenly matched in this duel. She looked at her pet. “Are you ready Whiskers?”

Naruto nodded.

Azula got up and lit a fire.

Naruto got a little concerned. “Azula you’re still pretty weak…are you sure you should be firebending?”

Azula nodded. “It’s fine. I’m only using a little bit of power.”
She sat down on one side of the fire and motioned for Naruto to sit down on the other side. Naruto did as he was asked. Azula slowly begin to control the flame’s movements making the fire look like it was dancing around. Azula looked back up at Naruto.
“Ok…now I need you to stare into my eyes. Try and concentrate on reflection of the flame.”

Naruto nodded and did what the fire princess told him to. Azula’s eyes were one of her most exotic features. They were a bright amber color and despite the coldness they usually projected, they had a beautiful depth to them that anyone who could withstand her fierce stare would get lost in. As Naruto watched the reflection of the fire dance across her eyes, he felt like his soul was being drawn into hers.

Azula smiled. She was staring into Naruto’s eyes as well and felt the same pull on her soul.
“I think it’s working.” She announced. “Just make sure you don’t break my gaze.”

“Ok,” Naruto mumbled. He wasn’t sure he could look away even if he tried to.

“Good,” Azula said. “Now why don’t you try projecting an image into my head. Concentrate on something that you want me to see.”

Naruto thought for a second and focused on the first image that popped into his head.

Azula was instantly able to see it and smiled. “Don’t you think about anything besides Ramen?” She laughed.

Naruto chuckled. “Couldn’t help it. I’m pretty hungry. But this technique is pretty cool. I didn’t think it would work.”

“Of course it works.” Azula said clicking her tongue. “Ok let me try and project an image into your head.”

Naruto gave a nod. “Go ahead.”

Azula focused an image in her mind.
“What image are you seeing?” She asked.

“A dragon?” Naruto said unsure if that was what he was supposed to see.

“Right!” Azula said. “It seems to be working. Remember that when you are projecting images into my head. You are actually protecting your mind from me seeing what’s inside it.”

“Got it!” Naruto said.

“I’m going to be doing the same thing to you as well.” Azula explained. “If at any time you can’t take any more of my mental imagery…just relax your concentration and think of the color white and I’ll know to stop. That will be the equivalent of giving up. Ok?”

“Ok!” Naruto said.

“That’s basically it. Are you ready to start?” Azula asked.
“Ready!” Naruto said.

With that Azula started the duel and everything went black.
11431111221112121112111121211.title: Naruto Accepts Azula's Challenge

choices: Nope (compared to Mangekkou Sharingan this is nothing)
Absolutely (Azula's creative tortures could give even Itachi nightmares)
114311112211121211121111212111.content:
The darkness cleared and Naruto found himself staring up at a clear blue sky. It was surprisingly peaceful until Naruto discovered that he couldn’t move his arms or his legs.
What’s going on? He thought. Am I paralyzed?

“Hey Whiskers,” A voice playfully called.

Naruto looked over his shoulders to find Azula standing over him.

“Azula…what happened?” He asked. “I thought we were going to have a mental duel.”

Azula chuckled. “We are dueling silly! And I have to tell you I’m in the lead.”

“We are? How come I can’t move my arms or legs?” He asked.

Azula grinned. “That’s because I tied you down.”

“Huh!” Naruto asked confused. “I don’t see any…”

Azula snapped her fingers and chains appeared around his arms and legs.

“Hey that’s not fair!!!!!!!” Naruto said. “Let me up!!”

“Sorry Whiskers but I play for keeps” Azula said sticking her tongue at him teasingly. “Give up yet!!”

“Nope!”

“Suit yourself! I just want you to remember that any tortures you go through aren’t real and that no matter how much pain you are feeling…WHEN you give up, you’ll be totally fine again” Azula reminded him. “But that said, I’m going to mentally torture you until you beg for mercy.”

Naruto gulped. “What do you plan to do to me?”

Azula smiled “I always wondered what cooked pet tasted like! I think I’ll try barbecuing you first before breaking out some other special tortures I have planned just for you.”

Naruto shivered. “Did anyone ever tell you’re sick!”

Azula giggled and tossled her pet’s hair. “All the time. Anyway, check this out!”
The fire princess snapped her fingers again and this time Naruto found himself chained to a barbecue grill.

“Wow you’re pretty good at this” He said.

“Of course!! I’m a champion when it comes to mental duels.” Azula said proudly. “All the more reason that you should give up now!”

“Uh-Uh” Naruto said. “Not when I have the chance to find out your deepest secret.”

“Well…you’d better hope whatever mental images you are showing me beats this” Azula said lighting the grill.

“Ow! It’s hot!” Naruto said wincing in pain. Despite the fact that the flame underneath him was a figment of Azula’s imagination, it definitely felt very real.

“Like I said…I play for keeps.” Azula said “Remember all you have to do to get out of here is think of the color white.”

Naruto frowned. He was beginning to think that he may have accepted more than he could handle by agreeing to Azula's challenge. The fire princess' need to win had definitely brought out her sadistic streak. Still, if he could hold out a little bit more, he might be able to win this. After all he was projecting his own mental images toward Azula as well.

Does he give up?
114311112211121211121111212111.title: What Azula Cooks Up...

choices: Naruto finds a way to counter Azula
She makes Naruto experiences  being an object under her feet for 24 hours.
1143111122111212111211112121111.content:
Naruto concentrated very hard. Despite the fact that he felt like he was on fire, he knew the flames weren’t real. Fortunately, his Ninja training came in handy. Genjitsu was a popular attack technique among ninjas and he was used to protecting himself against it. While in most cases it was usually possible to break out of technique, Jiraiya had prepared him for the rare situation where he would have no choice but to endure the illusion technique to the end. Focusing his mind the way he did in his training, Naruto mentally endured the searing flames the same way he would endure a genjitsu attack.

After what seemed like an hour of being barbecued alive, Naruto heard Azula applaud.
“Very impressive Whiskers,” She said petting his head. “Not everyone can withstand the feeling of being burnt alive for so long.”

Naruto groaned in acknowledgment. It was taking all his concentration not to give up. C’mon, he thought, Azula is going through mental torture as well…I just need to outlast her.

“But you didn’t really think that I would leave things there…did you?” Azula said smiling. “I think it’s time to kick things up a notch.”
The grill disappeared and Naruto found himself sitting in front of Azula looking at her boots. Grinning, the fire nation princess sat down and stretched her legs towards him. “You knew this was coming…didn’t you?” She said.

Naruto frowned. He couldn’t say it was a surprise but he was definitely hoping that his owner had forgotten about his aversion towards her feet.
“I suspected.” He grumbled. “I was just hoping it wouldn’t happen.”

Azula shook her head. “There’s no way I wouldn’t press such an obvious advantage” She said giggling.

“Rats!” Naruto said as Azula placed her booted feet in his lap.

“Why don’t you take off my boots for me?” Azula suggested with a sneaky smile on her face.

Robotically, Naruto reached for Azula’s boots. Not good, he thought. Apparently while he was inside Azula’s mind, the fire princess could control his every action. He really hoped that Azula was on the verge of giving up because he doubted he could withstand this particular torture for very long. After a little bit of tugging, Azula’s boots popped off and Naruto once again found himself closer than he ever wanted to be to Azula’s sweaty bare feet. The fire princess wiggled her toes and slowly brought them to her pet’s face. Naruto coughed. Azula had managed to recreate her special form of torture in her mind perfectly right down to the smell.

Azula chuckled as she saw Naruto’s reaction. Now that she had revealed her secret weapon, Naruto didn’t stand a chance.
“You should just give up now,” She suggested as she began rubbing her feet against his face.

Naruto shook his head. Despite the fact that he was already feeling pretty sick, he was determined to hold out for as long as he could.

Azula smiled. The leaf ninja was really something. Even when the cards were heavily stacked against him…he still was determined to fight it out.
“Ok,” She said gently stroking his face with her toes. “Looks like I’ll have to play with you a bit more!”

How does the fire nation attempt to win the duel?
1143111122111212111211112121111.title: Azula's Secret Weapon

choices: Azula runs for it, too scared to remember how to surrender
Naruto cuts Azula some slack and drops the appearance of a Jiang Shi
11431111221112121112111121211111.content:
Azula yelped as the flames suddenly burst into bonfire levels, consuming Naruto completely. Azula felt horrified...she hadn't ment to KILL Whiskers! That was when she realised she HADN'T done that with the flames. Too late, she felt her pet's minor pressing on her mind vanish. She'd gotten overconfidant and hadn't noticed the light, fingertip-like pressure against her mind.

That was when she saw Naruto rise from where the flames had been. Azula sighed in relief and then as he bunny-hopped out of the smoke from the flames, she noticed Whiskers was different.

Naruto's skin had turned a pale bluish color, almost a blue-gray. Naruto's costume consisted of blood-red socks, black slippers, loose black trousers, a long-sleeved black tunic with red cuffs and a black, high-collared, sleeveless overtunic with red trim. A wide red sash/belt kept the overtunic in place.Naruto also wore a black Mandarin-styled hat topped with a red ball and trim. He now sported claws on both his hands and feet. His canines had also lengthened and turned into fangs, while his whisker-marks had grown wider, darker and more pronounced until they looked more like tattoos than birth-scars. His eyes had been the greatest change as his once soulful blue eyes had changed becoming blood red with an animalistic black slit for the pupil and black rings appeared around his eyes. And his lips had turned pitch black.

Azula turned as pale as much as her uncle loved tea and Pai Sho. Of all things, Whiskers just HAD to turn himself into THAT to counter her advantage over him!

A Jiang Shi!

Azula was terrified of Jiang Shi! She'd heard the story of the hopping, chi-draining vampires when she was two years old and she'd had nightmares about the creatures until she was nine! A full SEVEN YEARS without being able to sleep or even shut her eyes for even a single second!

What made them worse for benders was that Jiang Shi fed off chi and therefore could literally EAT whatever a bender tried to use on them!

Whiskers bunny-hopped towards Azula once, tilted his head to the side and looked at her a moment as she stood there trembling before he said one word, giving her a good look at his fangs as he opened his mouth.

"Chi!"

"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

the way I was as a kid (I was little monster, even back then!) ."

Azula giggles as she watches Naruto shiver in anticipation of her torture.
"Don't worry Naruto," She told him. "I'm not going to force you to smell my feet or boots like I did before."

"You're not?" Naruto said grimacing. Seeing the way Azula was smiling...he had a really bad feeling.

"No...there are much better ways that I can torture you now."

That's what Naruto was afraid of. Somewhere in the back of his mind...he knew the smart thing to do would be surrendering but he was always pretty stubborn and he didn't give up easily.

"I mean imagine what I could do to you. I could make you become an object under my feet if I wanted. Maybe a footstool or a pair of socks. I could even turn you into one of my well used insoles or boots if I wanted to."

Giving up is really starting to sound good right about now, Naruto thought. Still, he couldn't bring himself to let Azula win.

Azula sensed she was close to winning the duel. She just needed to pick the best way to crack Naruto's remaining resistance. She considered which torture would be the worst on him.

"I've decide" She announced. "For the next 24 hours you're going to experience...

Naruto gulped, remembering what Azula had said about setting her playthings on fire at that age, also, he suspected Azula was a bit MORE spoiled back then!!! A kid who got everything she wanted when she was little, that couldn't be good.

"Awww...what's wrong Whiskers, think I looked cute back then?" kid-Azula giggled

"I can't answer seeing as how I'm trying to keep from roasting alive!" Naruto said, kid-Azula frowned, her pet was too busy to compliment her becouse he was on the grill? That wouldn't do at all. The grill suddenly vanished under Naruto and he fell to the ground.

"I asked if you thought I was cute at this age my pet." kid-Azula said, frowning cutely at him with her hands on her hips as Naruto turned rightside-up. Naruto formed a blindfold out of thin air and tied it around his head so he couldn't see.

"I don't deserve to see someone that cute." he said just as the younger version of his owner was trying to think of how big she wanted the mallet she planed on wacking him with for bilndfolding himself would be. She giggled at her pet and hugged him...with strangth equal to Sasuke's ego-problem. Clearly, Azula enjoyed having people underestamate her when she was this young so she could rub beating them at anything in they're faces. The face that she'd used the mental duel to give herself superstrangth when she had made herself younger was proof of that. Naruto gasped for air and squrmed in her grip, but even when his body was as thin as a peice of thread were kid-Azula was hugging him, he didn't break in half or anything like that like he was expecting to. She liked hugging him too much at this age.

Kid-Azula then grabbed Naruto and squished him into a big mountain of what he guessed was play-dough, his mistress entertained herself by twisting and packing him into variouse shapes then when she was done, Naruto was turned back to normal.

"I like being this young when I'm playing this mental duel with you Whiskers, I'm staying this age until one of us wins this challenge and every time we have a mental duel from now on." kid-Azula told him as she stuck Naruto in a apple-sized bubble so that his body was forcibly took the round shape and his face pressed aginst the inside of the round object she'd stuffed in in as she rolled him around and juggled him around like a soccer player. Naruto felt ill when kid-Azula took him out and stuck her hand inside of his back.

"I'm not going to take away your fun, my little misstress, so play with me as much as you want for as long as you feel like." Naruto said, but it was acctualy the pint-sized pyromanic useing him like a hand-puppet that caused him to say that.

Kid-Azula blushed and looked at her pet fondly "Awwwww...that's so sweet of you Whiskers! Ok, I'll play with you for as long as I want." then the little monster grinned, a flicker of how Azula was when her and Naruto had first met "Too bad for you, the more I play with you, the more I want to play with you for even longer!!!!" she cackled, it sounding out of place comming from a child.

Naruto tried to think of the color white, but never got it, it seemed that kid-Azula had blocked out his ability to give up and let her know when she had won until she'd had her fill of being able to do anything she wanted to him in this game when she had her hand up his back, little kids never wanted it to end when they were having fun with something. Naruto found himself Azula would change back, he'd been right, shw really WAS worse when she'd been younger!

kid-Azula thought for a moment about what to do with Whiskers and nodded to herself as she decided on what she wanted.

Then...
114311112211121211121111212111122.title: Young Azula

choices: Azula gives up ending the duel.
Azula tries to fight it out. (She doesn't like losing)
114311112211121211121111212112.content:
“Alright Whiskers let’s see what you can come up with to overwhelm me with!” Azula said. “I hope it’s something good…I’d hate for this to be a one-sided duel”
Azula walked through the darkness wondering what type of mental images Naruto would come up with. Slowly the environment around her began to form. The darkness didn’t completely disappear but there was enough light around her for the fire nation princess to make out where she was. Judging from the stone walls around her and the iron bars in front of her, she guessed that she was in some type of dungeon. Well…it looked like a dungeon anyway. She was right outside of a huge iron gate. Two torches on either side of the gate provided the only sources of light in the room. Looking at the gate gave Azula an uncomfortable feeling. It felt like she was staring into the gateway toward hell.

“Well I got to hand it to you fox-boy,” She said aloud. “You certainly know how to create a creepy atmosphere but don’t expect to beat me with special effects”

In response Azula heard a cruel laugh that caused her to shiver.

“Naruto?” She called.

Two red eyes glowed through the gate.
“Ah, Fresh meat!!!” An evil voice growled. “You look awfully tasty little girl.”

Azula’s heart beat fast. She didn’t scare easily but somehow seeing those eyes staring menacingly at her filled her with dread. She still tried her best to conceal her fear.

“Oh please Naruto…you’re going to have to do a lot better than that to win.” Azula said. “Right now I’m in the middle of picturing you getting burnt alive. If you think some red eyes and an evil voice are going to scare me away, you’re dreaming.”

The voice laughed again. “Give it up…the brats not around right now. It’s just you and me.”

Somebody else? Azula thought, yeah right!! She didn’t buy it for a second. Naruto was probably just playing a trick on her. He was probably just using his imagination to create a big scary voice while in the meantime laughing in the back of his mind.

“Oh and who are you?” Azula asked, “Naruto waking up on the wrong side of the bed?”
The fire princess laughed at her joke. Her laughter was met with a ferocious roar that caused Azula to instantly stop laughing.

“Stupid girl!! I already told you that I wasn’t him. Let’s see if it’s still funny when I rip you apart!!!!!!”

Azula gulped. She was frightened now but she refused to let it show.
“Yeah well even if that was true. You’re all locked up. What are you going to do? Stare me to death?”

The cage snapped open. “You were saying?”

The fire princess screamed as the demonic beast tackled her ready to make to make good on his threat.

What happens now?
114311112211121211121111212112.title: Naruto's Inner Demon

choices: Azula's surrender works and the duel ends in the nick of time.
Azula finds herself still trapped in Naruto's mind.
1143111122111212111211112121121.content:
As her back hit the ground, it no longer mattered to Azula whether Naruto was responsible for this monster or not. All the princess could think about was getting out of there. Seeing the cruelty burning in the monster's eyes, Azula knew that his threat to rip her apart wasn’t a figure of speech. She also recognized an opponent’s strength enough to know that this creature was way beyond anything she was capable of dealing with and she immediately tried to end the duel by giving up. Closing her eyes to focus on the color white, Azula could still hear the creature’s evil laughter around her and feel the creature’s claws dig into her arm as it pinned her to the ground. C’mon, C’mon, the princess thought frantically. Get Me out of here!!!!!! Work Already!!!!!!!

Azula opened her eyes just in time to see the fox demon’s jaw close around her head.

What happens now?
1143111122111212111211112121121.title: Azula's Surrender

choices: They manage to shake the fox off their trail.
The demon fox catches up to them.
11431111221112121112111121211212.content:
To her horror, Azula realized that surrendering the duel wasn’t working Not only was she trapped there, she was about to become the monster’s snack.

The fire princess shrieked as the demon’s jaw snapped shut around her.

CRUNCH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Smoke filled the air and the Demon Fox angrily spit out the pieces of a log that had shattered in his mouth.

“DAMN KAWARIMI” The Ninetails growled. “WHERE ARE YOU? YOU BRAT!!!!!!”

***

Several feet away Naruto comforted a frightened Azula. He had just managed to execute a replacement technique and quickly get Azula away from the demon fox in the nick of time.
“You ok?” he asked.

Azula nodded. “Just a little shaken,” She said pulling herself together.

Naruto noticed her injured shoulder and wrapped a piece of cloth around it. “I take it this is not supposed to be a part of our duel” he said.

Azula shook her head. “Not unless you brought that monster here to torture me. Which, judging from your reaction is becoming increasingly less likely.”

Naruto frowned. He didn’t know how the demon fox had gotten loose but he definitely wasn’t responsible for it. Since the Kyuubi was unpredictable and extremely violent, he wouldn’t think about using it in a mental duel against a friend. Also the demon fox was the one thing about himself that he had intentionally kept a secret from Azula. When he had first met her and she was…well a sadistic psycho…there was no question about keeping such dangerous knowledge from her. However, even though she had softened quite a bit since then, Naruto still couldn’t bring himself to tell her. A part of him wanted to share his secret with his new friend (maybe that was why he agreed to this mind game so willingly) but another part of him was horrified over the way she might react. His own village had pretty much ostracized him because of the demon within him, while his enemies wanted to rip that power from him. Azula was capable of reacting either of those two ways. He hoped that his friendship with his owner had changed her and that she wouldn’t see him as a source of power…but did he really know her that well? Even more terrifying was the thought that his new friend would hate him because of it. After all, the demon fox had almost eaten her. If she discovered his unique connection to the monster...she might not want anything to do with him.

Naruto knew that now that the Ninetails was roaming free in his mind, he was going to have to tell Azula about it eventually. Still...he couldn’t bring himself to tell her just yet. He decided to change the subject for now.
“Nope that wasn’t me!! I had something else in mind for getting you to give up.” He told her.

Azula took the bait.
“Yeah…what exactly?” she asked.

Naruto smiled “Tickle torture.”

“You were going to tickle me into submission,” Azula said raising an eyebrow.

“Well…I had to win somehow,” Naruto said sheepishly “I was all set to ambush you, tie you down and tickle you good when I heard you scream.”

“Oh.” Azula said. “Well you got there just in time. One more second and that thing would have eaten me." The princess looked at the Ninja seriously. "Naruto...Thanks for saving my life again.”

Leaning over, Azula kissed the ninja on the cheek. Naruto blushed and hugged her tightly.

“As long as I’m around…I’ll always protect you.” He promised.

Despite, the pain in her shoulder, Azula couldn’t help smiling as she heard that. If anyone else had made that promise to her, she would have met that statement with sarcasm, disbelief and contempt. Yet somehow when Naruto said it, it made her feel warm inside. She gently wrapped her arms around Naruto returning his hug.

An evil laugh interrupted them.
“AWWWW I HATE TO BREAK UP THIS TOUCHING SCENE. BUT I STILL HAVEN’T EATEN” A menacing voice growled.

The two of them turned to see the demon fox glaring at them. Naruto quickly pushed Azula away.

“Run!” Naruto said. “I’ll try and hold him off as long as I can”

“If you think I’m leaving you alone with that thing...you’re crazy!!!” Azula said.

Naruto frowned gathering his chakra.
“I’ll be right behind you!” he said.

The Demon Fox snickered. “YOU’RE ACTUALLY THINKING OF TAKING ME ON BRAT? I THOUGHT YOU OF ALL PEOPLE WOULD KNOW HOW USELESS THAT IS. YOU’RE WAY OUT OF YOUR LEAGUE!!!!”

Naruto grimaced. The fox was right. He was totally outmatched but he still had to try. He had just promised Azula that he would protect her and he wasn’t about to go back on his word.

“Tajuu kage bushin no jitsu!!!”

Azula watched in amazement as hundreds of Naruto clones appeared. She had never seen that technique performed before and it was an impressive sight.

Naruto quickly grabbed Azula’s arm pulling her away as waves of clones charged towards the demon fox. “C’mon Azula, this technique probably won’t even slow him down.”
The two of them began running. In the distance Naruto could hear the popping sounds his clones made upon disappearing. It sounded like they were being eliminated one hundred at a time. He pressed Azula to run faster.

***Ten minutes later***

Azula panted heavily as she rushed alongside Naruto. She moved pretty fast but she couldn’t keep up with the Ninja’s speed. They were in a forest now. Azula didn’t recognize it at all but Naruto seemed to move around it like he know where he was. She guessed that this place was familiar to him. Maybe he was picturing it in his mind. She wondered what else he was subconsciously picturing.

“Naruto stop a second.” She said. “I can’t keep up with you.”

“We can’t stop!!!” Naruto said frantically tugging Azula’s arm. “If we do…he’ll get us!!!”

“Naruto do you know this monster?” Azula asked. She had never seen the Ninja so terrified before. Having met the demon, she couldn’t say she blamed him but she sensed that something else was scaring him about the monster. Something that he was hiding from her.

Naruto paused before nodding slowly.
“A little too well,” he said.

“What is that thing?” She asked.

“My worst nightmare!” He said slowly. “C’mon we have to hurry!!”

He’s definitely not telling me something, Azula thought. She wanted to press him on it but now wasn’t the time. Instead she nodded and the two of them ran further into the woods.

What happens now?

Aang, who busted into Naruto's mind from the spirit world
114311112211121211121111212112122.content:
Naruto and Azula ran, where to, they didn't care just so long as they put some distence between them and the giant killer fox. Naruto had Azula riding on his back, it was quicker that way and Azula found herself comforted by Naruto's closeness.

-----

"Heheheh...how enjoyable, they think they can escape me...good, I enjoy a good chase before my meals." the demon snickered

The fox knew they couldn't get out, he liked that best of all, he was hungry...he'd been hungry for years. He would enjoy the sounds of crushing bones and the taste of fresh, warm blood in his mouth again. It had been too long since he'd had such plesures... Minato Namikaze...daman that wrech, he'd done this. sticking him in the brat who refused to kill...the fact that his hoste was Minato's son would make it sweeter...his hunger would be sated and he'd have his vengence at the same time. Just the thought of that alone spured the fox on...

The two were more than glad to comply with that order.

The Ninetails got up and shook his head, outrage ready to explode amd swaring to kill whoever it was that had stopped him from devouring them. The beast swung his head around to see who had stopped him.

"YOU!!!!!!" the monster snarled with hate.
114311112211121211121111212112122.title: Rescued and the fox's duel

1143111122111212111211112121121221.content:
The fox turned to see a blonde haired man dressed in white. He recognized him well. It was the man responsible for him being sealed in the first…the Fourth Hokage Minato Namikaze.

"YOU!!!!!!" the monster snarled with hate.

At first the Demon Fox was stunned to see the Fourth Hokage standing between him and his lunch but that quickly changed as a smile broke out on his face. He began to laugh viciously. “HA HA HA HA…THIS JUST KEEPS GETTING BETTER AND BETTER. I THOUGHT I WOULD HAVE TO SETTLE WITH GETTING MY REVENGE ON YOU THROUGH THE BOY BUT NOW I HAVE A CHANCE TO WATCH YOU SUFFER AS WELL.”

Minato glanced back through the corner of his eyes into the woods. He could see Azula and Naruto running away. They were moving fast just not fast enough.
“Fine you have a quarrel with me so don’t take it out on them.” He said.

The Demon Fox laughed. “NAH I THINK IT WOULD BE SO MUCH MORE FUN TO EAT THEM IN FRONT OF YOU!!”

Minato frowned. “I can’t allow you to do that!” he said gathering his chakra.

The fox watched him with malevolent amusement. “I LOVE HOW YOU THINK YOU CAN STOP ME.”

The fox charged.
1143111122111212111211112121121221.title: The Man in White

choices: Naruto's and Azula's as they race toward Konoha!
Minato Namikaze's as he faces off against the fox!
11431111221112121112111121211212211.content:
The sky darkened as Naruto and Azula ran through the woods. It was clear that a vicious battle was being fought behind them the likes of which neither of them had ever seen before. Both of them were focused on one thing…getting as far away from there as possible and neither of them dared turn to witness what was going on.

It was only when he felt the ground tremble underneath them like a massive earthquake had struck that Naruto couldn’t resist looking behind him to see what was going on.

“What the…?!” He said, turning to see a 600 long X 600 tall Iron wall sizzling with energy cutting across the ground behind them.

“Naruto Watch Out!!!!” Azula (who hadn’t bothered to turn around) screamed pointing in front of him.

Bam!!! Naruto looked back ahead just in time to notice the tree in front of him and slam into it face first. The speed and force with which he charged into it caused him to tumble backwards bumping into Azula (who had been running right behind him) and causing them both to hit the floor hard.

“Ow!!” Naruto groaned sitting up. He was still a little dizzy from hitting the tree.

A hand reached towards him and helped him up. Naruto looked up to see the man who had saved him from being devoured by the Ninetails a few moments ago.

“Are you alright?” the man asked.

Naruto nodded. Staring at the man in white, the energetic Ninja was unusually at a lose for words.

The man moved toward Azula and helped her up too. Azula gave him a nod of thanks. Minato looked at the two of them. “I suggest that we continue to get as far away from here as possible.” He told them.

Neither of them argued with him and the three began running further into the forest.

“What happened?” Naruto asked finally finding his voice.

Minato looked at them “I used a jutsu known as Heaven’s gate!” he explained. “It creates a barrier that can even repel Bijū.”

Naruto scratched his head. There was something about the man in white that seemed very familiar to him. Something pleasant. Almost like a dream or distant memory that he had trouble recalling.

“I’ve met you before…?” Naruto said rubbing his forehead trying to remember. He asked it like a question but he knew it was true. Somehow he knew. Naruto wished he could remember. He wanted to remember.

The man simply nodded. “Yes a long time ago,” he said softly.

“How?” Naruto asked.

For a brief second the man looked at Naruto like he wanted to say something. There were a million things he wanted to say. A million things he wanted to tell him. He wanted Naruto to know the connection between them. A connection he valued more than anything. He wanted to let his son know that he was proud of him. That he was sorry for leaving him and most of all he wanted to tell Naruto how much he loved him. Unfortunately as so often seemed the case, time was not on his side. Sighing, he took his eyes off his son to focus on the task at hand.

“Sorry…no time to reminisce,” The Man in white said. “That jutsu won’t hold him for long so I’m going to have to make this quick.”

Almost in response to the 4th Hokage’s statement, the sound of thunder was heard as the demon fox attacked the gate pounding it from the outside. The gate shook violently looking like it would give way at any second.

Minato frowned. “Listen carefully because I probably won’t get the chance to explain this again. Engaging in a mental duel was a bad idea because unlike a normal person, you share your consciousness with another.”

Naruto suddenly understood. “You mean the Kyuubi?”

The 4th Hokage nodded.

“Kyuubi?” Azula said.

Naruto grimaced. Now was definitely not the time to discuss his secret with her. “That thing,” He said pointing at the gate. “But I’ll have to fill you in on it later.”

Azula reluctantly nodded. She was curious but realized that there were bigger things at stake to be worried about.

Minato went on. “When Azula locked your minds in a mental duel, it allowed the Demon Fox’s consciousness to surface and now…it’s fighting for control of your body.”

Minato glanced at the two of them “I don’t need to tell you that if it wins out it will be very bad do I?”

They both shook their head.

The 4th hokage managed a weak smile. “Good!”
There was another thunderclap at the gate. This time it began to crack.

“As informative as this is turning out,” Azula said. “I’m less concerned with how that thing escaped and more concerned with how to stop it.”

“You can’t stop it in the conventional sense,” Minato explained. “What you need to do is try to end the duel. It should return things to normal”

Azula scowled. “Yeah well…Newsflash blondie. I tried that already.”

The Fourth Hokage shook his head. “Since you are locked in Naruto’s subconscious, Naruto has to be the one to get you out of here.”

They looked at the fox ninja. Nodding, Naruto tried thinking of the color white but nothing happened.

More pounding…the crack was visibly bigger.

“It’s not working!!” Azula said frustrated.

Minato sighed. “It looks like the demon fox is using its powers to suppress your thoughts.”

“So what do we do?” Naruto asked.

Minato considered. “You need to head to the center of your subconscious.” He told Naruto.

“The center of my subconscious?” Naruto repeated giving him a blank expression.

The Fourth Hokage smiled. “That’s the location where your mind will be strongest.” He explained. “With a little luck that should provide the extra mental boost that will allow you to escape from here.”

The pounding and cracking got louder. The three continued to run through the woods.

“Great so how do we get there?” The boy asked

“It not quite that simple,” Minato said. “First you have to figure out where there is. The center of your subconscious would be a place that you have a deep emotional attachment towards; a place that you would call your home.”

Naruto considered carefully. “The only place I can really say that about is Konoha village. I’ve lived there all my life.”

The man nodded. “Then that is where you should be headed.”

“But how do I get there?” Naruto asked.

The 4th looked at him calmly. “Naruto, this is your mind. Whether you realize it or not…you know where everything is.”

Concentrating, Naruto looked towards the south east. “I think it’s that way.” he said.

BANG!!!!!!!!!! A hole appeared in the gate and from the distance the group could see a malevolent eye peering through at them.

The 4th hokage nodded to Naruto and Azula. “You two go on ahead…I’ll try to hold him off.”

Naruto looked worried. He didn’t know why but he didn’t want the man to leave him. “You can’t take on the Kyuubi alone…he’s too strong!!”

Minato waved him off. “Don’t worry about me…I’ll be fine.”

Naruto still looked concerned.

The 4th Hokage lightly tipped Naruto’s chin. “Believe it!”

Something about the warm look in the man’s eyes made Naruto trust him and he consented.

Minato looked at Azula. “Keep on eye on him for me! He’s a handful”

Azula nodded.

Just before Naruto left, he turned to ask the man in white one more question. “If this is my mind…How are you able to be here?”

Minato smiled. “While the Demon Fox exists in your soul…I guess you could say I exist in your heart.”

Naruto smiled. Somehow that cryptic remark made him feel happy.

The 4th leaned in to whisper to Naruto. “When you get back to Konoha…the real Konoha that is. Check the rock beside the waterfall outside of the village. I left something there that you might need in the future.”

Naruto nodded and he and Azula headed off into the woods to find the village. When they were out of earshot, Azula asked Naruto who the man in white was.

Naruto stared off into distance before answering. “I don’t know.” He said. “But when I was around him…I felt this really familiar vibe.”

***

Crash!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Minato Namikaze watched as the rest of the gate crumbled before him. “It’s been a while since I fought, I might be a little bit rusty.”

The Fox look at him and smiled.



Which perspective does the story continue from?
11431111221112121112111121211212211.title: Reunion

choices: The village holding his Heart's Desire.
114311112211121211121111212112122111.content:
Not daring to look back, Azula and Naruto ran through the forest looking for Konoha. The Fire Nation Princess really had to push herself to keep up with the ninja. She was in good shape but he just seemed to have an endless amount of stamina. Added onto that Naruto’s intimate connection with the fox made him push himself that much harder. He knew how dangerous the fox was and was determined to reach the center of his subconscious as soon possible

It was a sudden surprise when he stopped abruptly in front of her causing her to bang into his shoulder.

“Ow!!!!!” Azula “What did you stop for?”

“The paths suddenly changed,” Naruto explained. “I don’t know which way to go.”

“What do you…?” Azula trailed off as she looked ahead of her. Sure enough the dirt trail that Naruto was following had suddenly forked in two directions. “oh.”

She walked a little bit in front of him examining the possible routes. She noticed where the road forked were two road signs. The one pointing towards the right path read Konoha of Memories while the one pointing towards the left path read Konoha of Heart’s Desires.”

Azula frowned. “As we reach deeper areas of your mind, you need to fine tune the path you want to take.” She said.

“But which of these Konoha holds the center of my subconscious.” Naruto asked.

“How should I know?” Azula asked annoyed. “This is your mind.”

She softened slightly explaining to ninja what he needed to do.

“Concentrate Naruto, you know where your subconscious is located even if you don’t realize it.”

“Well that’s just great.” Naruto said frowning as he remembered Iruka’s lessons. “Concentration has never really been my strong point.”

Focusing his mind the way he would gather Chakra for the Rasengan attack, the Ninja concentrated on where he wanted to go. One direction in particular seemed to pop out at him.

“I think it’s this way.” He said moving in one direction.

Which version of the village did he decide to head towards?
114311112211121211121111212112122111.title: Divergent Paths

choices: Ty Lee reluctantly tortures Whisker while Azula watches with delight.
Ty Lee paralyzes Azula and helps the poor pet escape.
11431111221112122.content:
“I’m so disappointed in you Whiskers, messing up your trick like that.” Azula said faking a sad expression. “Now mommy has to punish you again.”
Naruto whimpered as Azula removed her boots. Eventhough the demon fox had intervened and prevented him from getting seriously hurt, he was still sore all over from the fire and unable to get away as Azula sat down and moved her feet towards him.
Ty Lee was shocked as she realized what punishment Azula had in mind for Naruto. On the road she had shared a room with Azula and knew the result of Azula removing her boots. The smell that filled the room was unbearable. She dreaded thinking of what that poor boy would go through having to smell Azula’s feet up close.
“Azula you’re making him smell your feet?” She said horrified.
“Yup…Pretty cruel huh” Azula said grinning. Punishing her pet even though he got the trick right thrilled her beyond belief.
Ty Lee tried her best to save the boy from experiencing the punishment. “Don’t you think he’s suffered enough? He was just set on fire.” She said trying to reason with Azula.
Azula thought for a second.
“Uh…No” She giggled.
“But you’re feet smell awful” Ty Lee protested.
“So what!…need I remind you your feet smell just as bad.” Azula laughed.
Ty Lee blushed embarrassed. Azula was definitely right about her foot odor.
“That’s true but I’m not making anyone smell them.” Ty Lee told her.
“If it really bothers you that much I suppose I could use firebending to punish him.” Azula said considering to herself.
Whiskers screamed in horror.
“That’s not what I meant” Ty Lee whispered terrified of the thought.
Azula was annoyed at her friend's intervention. Suddenly a cruel idea popped into Azula's head.
"Actually you're right Ty Lee" Azula said. "It would be cruel of me to punish my pet after he already got burned"
Ty Lee breathed a sigh of relieve. Maybe she misjudged Azula. That heart inside the princess' body might do more than pump blood.
"Besides it would be much more fun if you made my pet smell your feet as punishment," Azula told her with an evil grin.
Ty Lee frowned. "There's no way I'm going to do that" She said finally directly standing up to Azula.
"If you don't, I'll punish him anyway after I make YOU do the hoop of fire" Azula said giving her a look that showed she wasn't playing around.

Ty Lee gave Naruto an apologetic look. "Sorry Whiskers" She said sadly.
She wanted to help him, she really did. However not carrying out Azula's orders would just make things harder on both of them. With tears in her eyes, she sat down next to the abused pet and removed her shoes...

choices: They get picked up by the Avatar's group
114311112211121222.content:
Ty Lee wincked and turned away, she didn't want to do this. Ty Lee gave Naruto an apologetic look. "Sorry Whiskers" She said sadly. She wanted to help him, she really did. Suddenly, Ty Lee stood up and put her shoes back on.

"What are you...?!?!" Azula shouted as Ty Lee quickly hit her presure points and blocked her chi. Azula fell to the ground, limp as a rag doll.

"Come on!"

Naruto didn't need to be told twice, he fallowed Ty Lee as she did a series of gymnastic moves to get in a tree and jump down to the ground on the other side of the cortyard.

Naruto fallowed, part of him was impressed with Ty Lee's skill and manuvering throught trees, being from a higly forested area himself, he knew she was a pro.

"TY LEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Azula was screaming, mad as heck.

The two ran until they raeched the docks and swipped a boat and went to the shores of the Earth Kingdome, fearing Azula's rage was quite the motivational boost.

"THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Naruto cried, throwing himself at Ty Lee and hugging her around the waist and crying into her stomach.

"No need to thank me, that was the first time I've directly stood up to Azula, she's scary. I couldn't let her torture you...um...what's your real name?"

"Naruto."

"Well, nice to meet you Naruto. I'm Ty Lee. I take it those unusual clothes are your real ones?"

"Yep! I like being able to stand out, Life's too dull to be worth living if everyone's the same."

Ty Lee knew what he was talking about. Growing up in a high-ranking family with six sisters who looked exactly like her, Ty Lee felt as if she didn't have her own identity, and decided to join the circus in an attempt to escape being part of a "matched set".

"I know that feeling, you and me are the type that take pride in having their own identity just to prove to themselves their alive."

Naruto smiled at his savior, so...she knew that need to stand out and show the world your not what everyone thinks of you as, but rather be true to you yourself to know your even alive.
114311112211121222.title: They are OUT!  OF!  THERE!!!!

choices: Ty Lee and Naruto got to find a cure
1143111122111212222.content:
Ty Lee and Naruto set up a campsite and feel asleep, going form the Fire Nation to the Earth Kindome in one day was exausting. Ty Lee's head was buzzing about Naruto, she had to find out more about him. She got up in the middle of the night and looked over at the figure shifting underneath the sheets, blonde hair all that was visible. She tip-toed over to him and pulled the sheet away. The first thing she noticed were the marks on each cheek that greatly resembled whiskers, the ones that inspired Azula to re-name him. Maybe they were some kind of birthmark? She didn’t know, all she did know was she had to touch them. Letting her curiosity get the best of her, she gently pressed her hand against his right cheek and ran her fingers over the grooves of each mark. She found them to actually be very soft and kind of nice to touch. She was taken aback for a moment when the boy in her hand subconsciously nuzzled his cheek against her hand, seeking more comfort from her fingers’ gentle touch. A small smile graced her lips as she resumed gently rubbing his cheek. She then took notice of his somewhat long, shaggy blonde hair. It was pretty matted and messy, she wondered when the last time it had seen a brush was. Slowly running her left hand through it, the texture of his hair was something she had never really felt before. It reminded her of a mixture between hair and fur. It, like everything else about the boy was odd, but not unpleasantly so. Ty Lee couldn’t help but smirk a little bit when she heard the boy started to make a low rumbling noise in his chest that sounded awfully a lot like a purr. A curious idea began to form in her mind that she just had to try out. Stopping her ministrations on his cheek and scalp, she was delighted for some unknown reason when she heard what sounded like a small pitiful whimper from him. Was her touch really having that much of an effect on him? Ty Lee amused herself with him for a few more hours, delighted at having him around. She whent to bed eventualy and when she woke up, Naruto was moaning. Worried, Ty Lee stepped forward and pulled the sheet away. The cloth dropped from nerveless fingers when she saw what was underneath. Naruto’s human ears were gone, and in their place, two large, fuzzy fox ears stuck out from the top of his head. Looking down, Ty Lee saw he had also sprouted a red, furry tail, also fox-like. Ty Lee let out a delighted squeal that was probably heard by half of the Earth Kingdome. He was so CUTE!

"Naruto...is that you?"

The foxboy yipped in answer, Ty Lee stayed with Naruto all day and found out that his intelligence had been reduced to almost the level of an animal’s. Naruto rubbed up aginst Ty Lee's feet, purring happly that she was near by. Ty Lee knew Azula was bound to have her feeling back by now and that she'd do who-knows-what to Naruto if she found him like this.
1143111122111212222.title: What the heck happened to him?!?!?!

choices: Ty Lee decides to search for one of the sources in hiding (Iroh or Aang)
Ty Lee risks seeking the advice of Lo and Li.
11431111221112122221.content:
Eventhough Naruto looked incredibly cute as he snuggled up against Ty Lee's feet for warmth and affection, Ty Lee knew that she couldn't leave him like that. The problem was that Ty Lee had no idea who to ask for help regarding this situation. This type of transformation was so beyond the bending abilities that Ty Lee was used to seeing and she didn't know of any places that dealed with that type of magic.

Naruto in that state of mind was unable to offer her any advice. Ty Lee had tried questioning him as she stroked his ears but all he could do was purr and whimper. Also Ty Lee suspected he was getting steadily worse. Before he seemed to be able to follow anything she was saying but now it seemed that he only understood short sentences. She had to do something and quick.

Putting Naruto on her lap and gently stroking his fur, Ty Lee began to think of people who would be able to help her or at least point her in the right direction. The first person she thought of was Azula's uncle General Iroh. He was a seasoned veteren who was very wise. Unlike his niece, the man was a very kind-hearted person who would be happy to help those in need. He might know of some place that they could go to reverse what was happening to her friend. The problem was that General Iroh had recently escaped imprisonment in a fire nation prison and his whereabouts were currently unknown. Ty Lee was hesitant to began a lengthy search for him when time could be running out for Naruto.

Another information source was the Avatar. Eventhough the current incarnation of the avatar, Aang, seemed extremely naive, he had the ability to tap into his past lives' knowledge. Somewhere in his lifetimes of experience there must be the answer to this problem. Unfortunately, like Iroh the Avatar was also in hiding from the fire nation. Not only that, Ty Lee had spent the last year working for Azula trying to capture him. Chances were the Avatar would be extra careful avoiding her.

There was a third option that was rather risky. Another good source of advice was a group of elderly twins named Lo and Li. Ty Lee had met these twins in the past and their wisdom had been really helpful and resulted in her and her friends gaining insight into their own souls. Ty Lee thought there was a good chance they could put her and Naruto on the path towards finding a cure. The downside however, was that Azula frequently used the twins as advisors. Seeking their advice might lead them into contact with the cruel princess. Ty Lee hated to risk that type of danger but she at least knew where the twins were.

Ty Lee looked at Naruto's cute face. She rubbed his head. "Don't worry Naruto, I'll definitely help you!" She said.

She had to come to a decision about which information source to seek out soon otherwise it might be too late for her friend turned fox.
11431111221112122221.title: The Search for a Cure.

Ty Lee knew Azula would be out for both her and Naruto's blood. If she risked going to Lo and Li, she could get them killed. So that left Azula's uncle, General Iroh and the Avatar. Ty Lee felt herself get more worried about her friend as time passed.

"Just hold on a while longer Naruto, Please. I'll definitely help you get back to normal, just hang on until we find one of the ones that can at least point us in the right direction to be able to cure you." Ty Lee said to him. She was getting desprate, if she didn't find Naruto help soon...Ty Lee didn't want to think about that.Her prayers were rewarded as she came to a clearing ans spotted on of the people she was looking for. Now maby she could get Naruto some help.

It was...

“Look there’s the Avatar and his friends Naruto,” Ty Lee told him. “With their help we’ll have you back to normal in no time”
Naruto yipped in agreement.

Aang, Sokka, Katara and Toph were sitting in front of a camp fire laughing. For a second Ty Lee hesitated not knowing how the Avatar and his friends would react to seeing her. Realizing that there was no time to waste, Ty Lee gathered her courage and forced herself to initiate a meeting with the Avatar.
“C’mon Naruto…It’s now or never” Ty Lee told him. Rushing out of the bushes Ty Lee ran towards the Avatar’s group with Naruto following her on all fours. Naturally chaos ensued...

“Yikes!!! It’s Ty Lee!!” Sokka said throwing his boomerang at her.
“Wait I…” Ty Lee tried to say as the razor edged weapon flew towards her.
Naruto quickly leaped towards the deadly weapon catching it in his teeth and protecting his friend. He tossed the weapon aside growled and charged at Sokka only to be knocked aside by a wave of water from Katara (who was becoming ever more impulsive these days). Naruto shook off the water attack and charged angrily towards Katara ready to rip her apart. Ty Lee ran to stop this fight from escalating but tripped as Toph trapped her ankles underneath the earth.

The Ninja was once more knocked aside by an air attack from Aang who rushed in front of his waterbending friend to protect her. The air attack didn’t do more than stun Naruto and he quickly turned on the airbender knocking aside any earth, air and water attacks that that the avatar used to slow him down. Naruto (acting completely on impulse now) was getting angrier by the second and the angrier he got the more powerful he became. He didn’t even feel the tidal wave Katara hit him from behind with and he shattered through an attempt by Toph to imprison him under earth. Sokka tried to attack the ninja on Appa but Naruto backhanded him sending the entire Air bison flying straight into a tree. As the brutal Ninja charged towards him, Aang tried to separate the two of them using a wall of air. Naruto pierced through the wall and began clawing his way towards the Avatar ready to rip Aang’s heart out of his body. Aang just barely managed to protect himself by encasing himself in stone using earthbending. Naruto pounded viciously against Aang’s earth made armor ignoring Toph and Katara’s boulder and tidal wave sized-attacks like they were pebbles and rain. As his armor shattered around him, the Avatar felt a feeling of terror he had never felt against any enemy before. He closed his eyes as Naruto’s claw-like fingers came toward his unprotected throat thinking he had finally met his match...

“THAT’S ENOUGH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”

A powerful fireblast hit Naruto hard causing him to look up and stop from dealing the fatal blow to Aang. The ninja turned to find Zuko holding a flaming fingertip to Ty Lee’s throat.

“Stop it or I kill this girl!” the exiled prince ordered.

Even in the beast-like state his mind was currently in, Naruto recognized Ty Lee was his friend and stopped the attack in order to protect her. Everyone breathed a sigh of relief. Quickly Toph and Aang imprisoned the ninja in earth to prevent him from attacking again. Katara added a layer of ice just in case.

“Good thing I got back early from collecting firewood.” Zuko said. He moved his fingers away from Ty Lee’s throat and smashed the rocks holding her feet in place. “Sorry Ty Lee, I didn’t burn you did I?”

Ty Lee shook her head .
“I’m fine.” She said. “So you really are friends with the avatar now?”

Zuko sighed. He didn’t know quite how to describe his association with the Avatar group.
“Well I’m teaching Aang firebending,” Zuko said. “But I wouldn’t describe my relationship with them as friendship quite yet.”

Katara was quick to prove his point. “Why’d you let her go…Are you changing sides again?” she asked furiously. She didn’t trust Zuko at all.

“No Katara,” Zuko sighed. He didn’t blame Katara for not trusting him but it definitely didn’t make things easy for him. “Ty Lee explained things to me while you guys had your hands full. It was her idea I use her as a hostage.”

“I don’t believe you!!!” Katara said. “You’re probably working with her to trick us.”

“Wait Katara!!” Sokka called.

She looked at her brother angrily but stopped when she realized he was badly hurt from the battle. She rushed to his side to heal him and the flying bison.

While Katara was tending to Appa and her brother, Ty Lee convinced Toph and Aang to let Naruto go. Though they were initially reluctant, they finally consented based on the fact that Toph discerned that Ty Lee was telling the truth when she said she would prevent Naruto from harming them. Once Naruto was free, he cuddled his face against Ty Lee’s legs happily. Toph and Aang watched shocked. They found it hard to believe that just a few minutes ago that person had nearly killed all of them.

“You have a lot of explaining to do!” Aang told her.
Ty Lee nodded.

***
Once Sokka was healed, he convinced Katara to at least hear Ty Lee out. Sitting down and stroking Naruto’s ears, Ty Lee told them the entire story. The gang listened quietly for the most part but did make occasional comments or questions.

When Ty Lee described how Azula made Naruto do the hoop of fire. Sokka told Zuko his family was sick.

“Believe me I know.” Zuko said pointing to his eye.

The gang applauded Ty Lee standing up to Azula and helping Naruto out and Ty Lee felt a little proud of herself as she continued her tale. Finally Ty Lee got to the part about Naruto’s transformation and why she needed their help. When the girl had finished telling her story, the avatar looked at Toph.

“Was she telling the truth?” Aang asked.

The blind girl nodded. “Every word.” She told him.

Now the Avatar group had an important decision to make. Knowing Naruto’s and Ty Lee’s situation…Should the Avatar tap into his past lives' knowledge and help those two out?

“You lunatic…your ambition…to kill innocent people…to take over the world and kill anyone that get in your way!!!” Naruto snarled

“Stupid fool. I wanted peace. With all those villages it was never going to happen. Akatsuki’s goal was split into three stages. The first step was to collect money. After that, the second stage is to use that money as a capital. To create the Shinobi world’s very first contracted organization of war.”

“How the hell…is that any different from the rest of the villages?”

“We’ll be completely different from villages in service of countries, actually. Here I’ll explain it for you. For countries with powerful Shinobi villages, “Shinobi business” represents a large percentage of that country’s income. The Shinobi villages participate in internal and external conflicts, thus earning massive amounts of money and effectively supporting the country’s economy. In other words, for the country to obtain a stable income a certain amount of war becomes necessary…But in this day and age, while there do exist any number of small conflicts, the great wars of the past are no longer to be seen. Countries have scaled back the villages and many Shinobi have lost their place of being. Shinobi exist for battle, yet this peace is the “reward” they receive for putting their lives on the line for their countries. The “five great Shinobi countries” still aren’t that bad…both the countries and their villages are large, with much trust still placed in them contracts still pour in from other countries, and their existence is secure…still the same cant be said for smaller countries. Maintaining a Shinobi village, even in times of peace, requires massive finding equal to approaching that in time of war. But if you try to scale back the village you become unable to respond to unexpected conflicts. And that’s where our organization, Akatsuki, comes in! Paying no allegiance to any country, we will provide our clients with exactly the amount of Shinobi needed exactly when they need them. Amassing an appropriate amount of power, we will create a contracted organization that fulfills the warring needs of small countries and villages everywhere! At first we would’ve taken on all wars for trifling amounts of money, thus dominating the market of war, an, furthermore, in relation to the size of that market we will use the Bijuu to cause more conflict. Eventually we would’ve control all war, establishing a monopoly! And with that the system of Shinobi villages in larger countries will collapse people will be forced to rely on Akatsuki and thus we will arrive at the realization of our true ambition.”

At this he put his hand in front of him. “The third stage of our objectives. World domination.”

Naruto glared at him. How could they acquire peace like this. “World domination… so you just wanted to take over everything.”

“Yes. But once we would’ve ruled we can then start rebuilding, start everything from scratch and thus everything would be peaceful.”

“What about us Jinchuuriki. We were nothing but slaves.”

“You are wrong. We didn’t just capture you to help us in the war, but the fact that demons like yourself will never make the nations go at peace as people will fear that the demon would be released and as such destroy the land. People will always fear your kind.”

"THAT'S A LIE!" Ty Lee shouted "People fear what the don't understand, if a person is good, how dose them useing whatever they have in order to protect what's important and show the world that everything's not just good and bad so that everyone can understand one another be something to be afraid of?! You say you want peace, yet you enlist people who kill the innocent for you plans? How are you a good person if your goals make the innocet suffer? Your no saviour, just another deluted madman!"

Pein glared at her, this girl dared to call him a madman?!

"You will never understand."

"That's were your wrong." Zuko said "It was that same idea that became the cause of a 100-year old war here."

Pein's eyes flashed.

"Die then."

He created the (now disbanded) ANBU training department known as Root and acted as its head. Danzo believes that Konoha must go through a fundamental ideological shift in order to survive, he's stated that the First Hokage's influence has meant that subsequent Hokages have proven to be indecisive and weak as they adopt his philosophies of how he saw the people of Konoha as a part of his own family, and that they were worth dying for and refused to draw a line between the rulers and protecters of the people. He'll be easy to spot becouse he lost an arm at some point. Are you telling me HE'S why I'm transforming?"

Pein nodded

Suddenly, Naruto's fox-tail split, so that he nine tails.

"Ho no...THAT'S what that wacko has planned? He plans on turning me into a mimiture virsion of the nine-tailed fthen have me sent back to the village I'm from and publicly kill me so he's given control of the village?"

Pein and Konan winced, that was just cruel, it was also just the kind of thing Danzo would try.

"We'll keep the Akatsuki from troubbling you, as for finding him, you'll have to do that on your own, the transformation should wear off nartually if you stop the one who cast it on you, but that has to be done BEFORE the transformation is compleated."

choices: She wears the boot Naruto is inside of.
114311112212.content:
Naruto rubbed his head as he woke up. He felt incredibly sick from breathing in the smell of Azula’s foot odor. He was dizzy and nauseous and could barely think straight. As he struggled to get his bearings, he realized he was no longer in the forest. He looked around trying to get a sense of his environment. He was in what looked like a dark tunnel. Walls surrounded him on every side. The floor underneath him was soft and spongy and felt wet to the touch. The atmosphere of this place was incredibly hot and humid. The temperature was hotter than the desert outside the sand village while at the same time damper than the village of hidden mists, making being in the area a truly unpleasant place for the ninja.While the heat of this location alone made this place unbearable for Naruto, there was something even worse inside the environment. Something that made the young Shinobi wonder whether he had been sent to hell. The air inside this cave smelled exactly like Azula’s feet. At first Naruto thought that the smell was just some of Azula’s foot scent that had remained inside his nostrils after her torture but then to his horror he realized that the smell was a hundred times worse. It was as if smell was a part of the environment and nothing Naruto tried could get the smell out of his nose.

The hot dampness coupled with the smell in the air took its toll on Naruto both mentally and physically and he desperately began to seek a way out of the cave. First he tried using chakra techniques but the smell made it impossible to think straight. Without being able to establish the proper concentration, Naruto realized he would have to seek a way out of cave naturally. He gagged and coughed as he moved through his surroundings hoping to find an exit. Suddenly he saw something that gave him hope. Light was shining through the top of the cave. Quickly he moved towards it hoping to find a way out. As he got closer to the light source, Naruto felt happy thinking he would finally get to experience fresh air again. However upon gazing on the source of the light, Naruto saw a sight that not only crushed his hopes, it filled his heart with terror. Azula’s pretty face was smiling down at him (a scary sight in itself) only now it was gigantic.

Azula smiled at Naruto’s reaction to seeing her again. It was exactly the reaction she hoped for.

“Hi little guy,” She laughed. “Enjoying your new home?”

“What did you do to me?” Naruto asked horrified.

“You seemed to love my boots so much,” Azula grinned. “I thought you might want to experience being inside one of them. Unfortunately I had to shrink you down so you would fit. I hope you don’t mind.”

That explained a lot Naruto thought. He wondered why he hadn’t been able to figure it out from the smell and surroundings. Eventually he chalked it up to Azula’s foot odor hindering his ability to think. Anyway...he had no intention of staying like this.

“Turn me back!!!!” Naruto demanded.

“Hee Hee you’re so cute when you’re angry.” Azula giggled. “But maybe you should be less concerned with what size you are and more concerned about what I’m obvious going to do to you next.

The color dropped from Naruto’s face as he realized what was going to happen.

Azula grinned as she saw the terrified look on her prisoner’s face. As bad as it was for him now, It was about to get a whole lot worse.

Aula crossed her legs, she stared at the higher of the two articals of footwear, the one that had her prisoner inside it, natrually. The princess thought of how to enjoy a tiny prisoner as her personal living insole. Suddenly she smiled cruelly as she lowered her foot and started to walk away. Next he felt the toes his head was between start to shake as Aula rubbed her toes aginst his head and Naruto felt like he was in hell. Then it got worse. Naruto couldn't take this. But he couldn't get out. The only way to get free was if Azula took him out to amuse herself by having him as a foot-toy!
