114311112212112121.title: He was surrounded by three pairs of feet, Azula...

1143111122121121211.content:
"Dammit. If I do this, I'd basically be submitting myself to them, but if I don't, I might not survive their punishment. I guess I'll have to do this until I get a chance to escape." Naruto thought to himself. "Yes ma'am. Who shall I start with first?" he said out loud.

"Hmm, let's see. Ty Lee and I have already had some fun with you, so let's let Mai have her turn with you. Hurry up, you don't want to make us wait, do you?" Azula said with a smile. Naruto slowly started to walk to the one called Mai.

Before he was even ten feet away from her feet, to his perspective, the smell was horrible. It was worse than anything he had ever smelt before. Then the heat came. It felt like he was wearing a blanket on a summer day. As he got closer, he started to make out more and more details, such as the tiny droplets of sweat, which were the size of basketballs to him, as well as the subtle movements of her feet. He also saw the black polish she had on her toes, shining in the light. He realised that these feet, while hot and sweaty, weren't the worst feet he has ever seen.

"Come on little foot toy, don't just stand there. Start worshipping already." Azula said. "Yes,"said Mai."My feet are waiting for their turn, so hurry up." Naruto quickly snapped out of the sudden trance he was in and started to massage her feet. "Wow," he thought. "This is actually very soft." Soon after he started Mai said down to him, "Come on little air bender, you can do better than that. I can't even feel you down there. If I don't feel a change down there, I might have to help you, and you won't like how I will do it. Oh, and don't forget to go between the toes.They need some love too." Naruto quickly understood and worked even harder. Eventually, he finished the heel and sole. All he had to do now was the toes and he would be done with this foot. Using chakra, he climbed Mai's foot and got between her first and big toe. As soon as he touched the skin between them, the oes scrunched together and trapped him in their grasp.

"Oops, sorry. Guess I forgot to warn you that the skin between my toes are extremely ticklish. Oh well, you know now at least. Now hurry, you still have another foot to get to after this." Mai said to Naruto. "Man, I feel sorry for the little guy." said Ty Lee. "It must be so stinky and sweaty down there. Especially considering how we just got done training before this." "Don't worry Ty Lee. Just remember, he is an enemy of the fire nation. It is his duty to service and worship us." said Azula. "Besides, soon he'll learn to love serving and enjoying our feet." "Well," said Ty Lee unsure, "if you say so Azula. I guess he'll be happy, eventually."

Meanwhile, Naruto was massaging between Mai's toes. First he had to move most of the toe jam out of the way to get to the skin, as well as make sure it stayed out of his way.Next he had to make sure to be careful not to tickle her, or else he will probably be made into toe jam by accident. All of this, while dealing with the heat and sweat pouring off of them. Needless to say, by the time he was done, he was soaked in sweat, most of it not even his.

"Nicely done, little one. You did pretty well for your first time. No time for a break, though, you still have my other foot to do, as well as Azula's and Ty Lee's." said Mai. When he heard that, the life drained from his face. "Oh god, I just finished one and I'm kinda tired. There's no way I'll be able to do five more." he thought. " Come on, little one, your wasting time. You still have much to do."said Mai. Resigned to his fate, Naruto made his way over to Mai's other foot and started the whole process over again. From heel to toe, Naruto massaged her foot and felt even worse than when he finished the first time. "Very good, but you're not done yet."said Mai. "My feet are so sweaty now, don't you think? I also bet you're really thirsty and hungry after all that work. Since you worked so hard on my feet, I'll let you drink my sweat and eat my toe jam as a reward. I promise you'll love it. The best part is, we both get something out of it. I get a clean foot, and you get a meal fit for someone of your size. Enjoy." Mai said with a cruel smirk.

As soon as Naruto heard those words, he nearly threw up. Sweat and toe jam for a meal? No way! Sadly, he didn't have much choice, because as soon as she was done talking, she grabbed him and dropped him head first into the stuff between her toes. Naruto struggled to get out of it, but his efforts were misidentified to the others. "Wow, you were right Azula. He really is loving his new life." said Ty Lee. "See Ty Lee, he loves it. Look at him trying to get as much in as possible. I told you he would and he is. But he does look like he needs help. Mai, can you help him get more food?" asked Azula. "Gladly." Mai said. Taking her index finger, she slowly pushed Narutos head into his 'meal'.

To Naruto, it was different. As he was struggling to get out of the toe jam, he suddenly felt something hard push into his head. "What the heck is pushing me!?" he thought. "I hope you enjoy the help I'm giving you , little toy. I saw how you wanted more, but couldn't, so I decided to give you a little push. Don't worry about thanking me. Your struggles to get more of it is thanks enough. Even better, is you still have seven more places to eat from. You are one lucky bug." Naruto tried to get out of doing this, but her finger was to strong. Slowly he made himself eat chunks out of her toe jam, while sipping sweat to get it down, each taste worse than the last. Finally, the torture ended.

"Excellent work. Sadly, my time with you is almost up. Don't worry, though. I'm sure she'll treat you just as good as I did. And I'm sure I'll see you around even more." said Mai. "Enjoy your turn..."
1143111122121121211.title: He obeys

11431111221211212111.content:
"...Ty Lee." "Oh boy!" said Ty Lee. "It's my turn with you little guy. Don't worry, I saw how much you enjoyed Mai's feet. Hopefully you'll enjoy mine just as much. I'll warn you now. My feet may be less smelly than Mai's, but they are a lot more sweaty. Also, you'll have to put more into massaging and worshipping my feet. As with Mai, Naruto started to slowly walk over to Ty Lee's left foot to start.He soon found out she was right. Her feet didn't stink as bad as Mai's. Sure, there was still some stale air, but under that air was the smell of vanilla. "Huh. Guess she must use some sort of lotion on her feet or something." he thought. He also saw that there were some calluses on here feet. Not many. Just one or two. Next he saw was a layer of sweat all over her foot. "Dang. She wasn't joking when she said a lot more sweat than Mai. It may be harder to climb, but I'll manage. Thank god for chakra control techniques. Finally, he noticed that she had on white toe nail polish.

"Okay little fox, you can start now." said Ty Lee. "Hey, why did you call him a fox?" asked Mai. "What, you didn't see? He has these cute little whisker marks on his cheeks. They kinda make him look like a fox, so little fox." "Huh. Wonder how I missed them." said Mai. "You probably got distracted by his massage. No harm done. We could each train him all sorts of tricks and other stuff. He could be the perfect pet!" said Ty Lee. "Hmm. That is actually a really good idea Ty Lee. It would be wonderful to have a good massage after chasing after the Avatar." said Mai, giving her own opinion. "I don't know. First we'll have to break him in and interrogate him for any information he has that could be useful. Afterwards, I don't see why we can't. But first things first. We have to break him so he willingly tells us what we need and listens to us." said Azula.

Naruto was half way through the sole of the foot when he heard their conversation above him. "What!? No way will I be some sort of pet to them, even if their feet are kinda nice. NO! Snap out of it Uzumaki. You don't even know what they will do if they find out about the village. I gotta focus. First thing I gotta do is get out of here and away from these people. Next I gotta get back to the village and warn Tsunade about these people. Hopefully she'll be able to turn me back to normal." thought Naruto. While he was having his inner monologue, he didn't notice that he was slowly stopping at massaging Ty Lee's feet. But the others noticed.

"Huh?" "What's wrong Ty Lee?" "Little foxy is slowing down for some reason. Do you think he is getting tired for massaging our feet?" asked Ty Lee. "I don't know. Maybe." "I know. Ty Lee, why don't you give foxy a little help down there. You know, shoulder the burden." told Azula to Ty Lee. "Good idea Azula. He was looking a little bit tired. Maybe this will give him the rest and energy for your feet. Don't worry foxy, I understand you're tired and I'll help you out."

Suddenly, Naruto felt something grab him." Huh? What's happening?" "Here foxy. I'll help you out. Hopefully you can build up your stamina after this." "Wait, wha-!" Before he could finish, he was slammed into Ty Lee's sole. Then she started rubbing him all over her foot. "See foxy. We can be nice to you. You can trust us. Now for the toes." She moved him up to her toes and pushed him up against her big toe. To Naruto, it was like he was jammed up against it and was being cuddled by it face first. After a minute of this, she took him away and put him between her toes and started using him like floss. This process repeated itself until he was done with the first foot. "Now for the other foot." Hearing that, Naruto couldn't help but groan out from doing this. To Ty Lee, however, it was like he was groaning out a thank you. "Don't mention it foxy. I understand you're tired, so it's the least I can do." Ty Lee said to him. "Who knows. We may be doing this for the rest of our lives. Doesn't that sound nice?" To Naruto, this idea sounded like a nightmare. "Then again, she is being nice to me, and they are helping me. NO! I have to get back to the village. I am not someone's pet."

Soon Naruto was done with both her feet. Needless to say, he was soaked from her foot sweat by the time they finished. "Oh~ you're so wet foxy. I'm sorry about that. Maybe next time it won't be so bad. Still, at least you enjoyed it. Next time, you may not even need my help for this. Too bad my turns up now. We could have had a lot more fun. You could have watched my acrobatic tricks. Oh well, maybe next time. Now, be good to Azula, she is a princess,a and you don't want to make her angry. Then again, maybe shell give you the rest of the day off. It's up to her , I guess. What do you say, Azula?" Ty Lee asked Azula. "Hmm, let me think. One one hand, he's very tired, but on the other, he could have useful information. I guess I'll..."

114311112212112121112.content:
Deciding to take her turn, Azula grabbed Naruto and put him near her feet. While Ty Lee's feet were more sweaty than anything, Azula's were the opposite. Due to always practicing her fire bending, the heat from the flames would always make her feet sweat, but the sweat would quickly evaporate, leaving behind the strong smell of old cheese and vinegar. This cycle continued for years, ultimately leading to Azula having some of the worst smelling feet in the entire fire nation. This fact was quickly discovered by Naruto, because as soon he was dropped around twenty feet, to his perspective, he was having to force himself not to throw up everything he had eaten that day. "Oh god," thought Naruto, "what the hell did this crazy lady even do to get her feet this bad!?" Quickly, he tried to cover his nose, but the damage was done. The smell was already inside his nose, and didn't seem to want to leave. He fell to his knees and tried to get the smell away, but his efforts were all in vain.

While this was happening, Azula was watching this play out, smirking and enjoying his pain. "If this won't get any information out of him, nothing will." Azula thought to herself. "It's a shame that I could never get my feet smell more pleasant, but it looks like this can come in handy for interrogating prisoners. Oh, he must be in horrible torture from them. Even at my size, they are pretty bad. To him, this must be unbearable." Seeing he wasn't going to start anytime soon, she decided to grant him some small mercy. "Okay little airbender, I'm going to be a little bit nice to you. I will give you five minutes to get used to the smell. If you don't start to massage my feet within those five minutes, I will assume you will need some help, and I know you won't wish for my help." She said down to him. Starting to count in her head, she came to her five minute mark and saw he was nowhere near able to massage her feet. "Oh dear. Looks like the five minutes are up and you still haven't done anything at all. Don't worry, one of your kind future owners will help you. Just don't make a habit out of this, though." Lifting up her foot, she quickly brought it down one the prone ninja.

Naruto was barely aware of what was going on around him. The scent of Azula's feet were that powerful to him at his current size. It was as if he were in some kind of foggy state of mind that had him question everything he would do. "Why do I have to through this? How did I end up in this predicament? How will I get back to Konoha?" These question where some of the few that were going through his head right now. They soon started to go to things like, "What can I do to quit this torture? How can I survive being the pet to these three women? Why do they want me to suffer?" The thoughts eventually became corrupted from there original design to instead be, "How can I please these three women? Why not be a pet to them? How can I please these kind people?" These last thoughts were the ones he had when Azula brought her foot down.

The first part of her foot she started with was her heel. Lightly placing it on him, she slowly and carefully rolled his body under her heel, like he was some kind of toy. "This feeling is just what my feet needed." thought the princess. "Even if he was telling the truth about not being an air bender, I still won't let him go. If this does break him, Ty Lee, Mai, and myself could easily mold him to be the perfect consort to us. All he would do is worship and please us like the goddesses he would think we were, even if he was regular sized. Not to mention Ty Lee was right about those whisker marks. They are kind of cute." She was suddenly brought out of her musings when she felt a wet sensation from her heel. Looking down, she quickly noticed it was from their pet. What shocked her was that he was willingly licking her foot with a smile on his face. "Oh my god... I think we actually broke him." Looking up to he friends, she saw the shocked look on Mai's face and the happy look on Ty Lee's. "Hey Azula, does this mean we get to keep him?" asked Mai. "Well Mai, it looks like we may. It appears he finally accepted his place." replied Azula. "Yay!" squealed Ty Lee. "That means we get to keep him forever and ever!" "Mistress Azula, why did you stop?" asked Naruto for the first time. "I might be done with your beautiful heel, but the rest of your gorgeous foot need my attention." Shocked about what they just heard, the quickly asked to repeat what he said. Repeating it word for word, it quickly brought them back to reality. "Of course." replied Azula, still a little shocked. She started to roll his body under the rest of her foot.

After the heel was the arch and ball of the foot. Carefully and with an eye for detail, Naruto licked all over those areas, as well as eating any dried skin Azula had on her foot without being asked. Deciding to save the toes for last, she quickly repeated the process with her other foot, during which, Naruto never lost his smile at pleasing his owners. Finally, she started on her toes. Deciding to do something different, she brought the soles of her feet together and kept them that way. Grabbing Naruto, she quickly put him between both sets of crimson colored toes. Then, she started to clench the two sets of toes together, making sure Naruto's face got between each toe and ate what was between them. Finally done with the message, Azula and the others wondered what to do with him now. "Well since today is almost over, I say we get back on track and look for the avatar and his little group. Who knew that stopping here on the way to earth kingdom would end with us finding a little pet. Now the question is, who does he sleep with? It isn't like he can sleep with each of us." stated Azula. "Ooh, I have an idea. How about we all get in the same bed and let him cuddle with our feet all at once. That way, we each get equal time until we work out a schedule and he gets to be next to each his owners." stated Ty Lee with a smile on her face. "Well, the idea is better than nothing, I guess." said Mai."Not to mention he just fell asleep." Looking down, they quickly saw that he was indeed asleep. Deciding to end the day, they each got themselves prepared and went to bed. Naruto, however, was tied to the feet of Ty Lee, since she seemed to care for him a bit more than the others. During this time, Naruto was having an internal struggle. In his mind, the idea of staying with his owners was fighting for control over the desire to leave. Which would win would soon be decided when he woke up. The next morning, the winner of the fight was made clear when...

1231.content:
Aang groaned and tried to move but he couldn't. As his vision cleared, he saw he was strapped down to a table.

Not only that, but he wasn't alone.

A tall yet famine figure stood looking down at him.

She was beautiful, her eyelids were heavily coated with eye black shadow. Her face was a heart-shaped to boot. She had silky blue hair that clung close to her neck and face. Her clothing consist a long, dark cloak that reached to her shins bearing red clouds and a red interior with a chin-high collar. In addition to her appearance, on her bottom lip was a small lip piercing and on her Right middle finger was a ring with a kanji symbol "white" or "Byakko" - (White Tiger) And to complete her appearance, was a paper flower accessory in her silky blue mass of what she calls "hair."

The woman looked at him with calm, almost emotionless inky black eyes.

"Interesting...you seem to have a massive chakra signature, one surpassed only by the nine-tailed fox's vessel...and yet, your not a Jinchuuriki." she said.

"Huh?" Aang didn't know WHAT this woman was talking about. Chakra signature? Jinchuuriki? Who was she? And were was he anyways? Aang struggled against the bonds but they held fast.

"Don't bother...those were bolted to the table and have chakra flowing through them." the woman said.

"Who are you and what do you want? And were am I?" Aang said, fearing that this woman has ties with the fire nation in some way. The woman gave him an odd look.

"You were found at the Final Valley after the duel between the curse-marked brat and the boy who is the living prison of a demonic god." she said plainly, speaking slowly as if Aang were a bit dim. "You must have seen them."

Aang frowned in thought and tried to recall what she was talking about. Then it hit him like one of Azula's lightning bolts: she meant those two!. The boy with hand-shaped wings coming from his back and the boy in orange with the red energy that was in a fox's outline!!!!!

Aang remembered now, he had gone into the Avatar state just as the two attacks the two of them were using, a blade of black lightning and a ball of compressed, concentrated, rotating spiritual energy, collided and the energy of the two attacks meeting and the power of Aang's Avatar state started resonating, and Aang was transported to this world!!!!!

The woman snickered when she saw the look on his face when he recalled that.

"So you do remember." she said, she looked at him. It was clear that he came from another world, another dimension. And that power he had...she knew that harnessing it would greatly speed up the Akatsuki's goal.

"Tell me boy...what manner of power is it that you possess?" the woman asked

Aang looked at her, so that was what she had him prisoner for! She wanted to use the Avatar state the same way as General Fong and make him into a living weapon.

"I'm not telling you!" Aang shouted at her, the woman sighed "Suit yourself, we could have settled this diplomatically by telling me and then being released, but you chose not to use reason. Now I have no choice but to torture you for information."

Aang paled, not knowing what this woman would do to him, he wished that she was just going to ask him questions then let him go before he shouted that he refused to go along with her before.

"Now let's see, what do I use to get you to tell me what I want to know?" the woman said to herself out loud, making the young avatar gulp. Then much to his confusion, she flicked her wrist and pulled out a...piece of paper? Much to his horror the paper slowly morphed into a kuni, it seemed harmless, but she had made it change by applying spiritual energy to it, thereby making it sharper than a diamond-edged buzz saw!!!!

Aang screamed.

"Hmmm. This won’t do. I need you alive so my jutsu are out of the question if they're used to form origami weapons." the woman said to herself, Aang relaxed.

"I'll just have to use some other means to get you to tell me what I want from you." she said.

Somewhere else, Sokka was guarding the camp where he, her sister Katara, Aang, Toph and Zuko were. Sokka was really nervous, especially when he imagined an army of firebenders attacking him, or worse ... Azula and her gang! even if he was quick, he still had more than meters to do before he could reach the camp and warn others. After a moment he heard a noise in bushes. Due to the pressure he immediately used his boomerang to attack the source of it.



Temari was on her guard. All that could be a trap ... and it seems it paid, she saw a weird "shuriken", she used her giant fan to produce a very powerful wind. It deflected it easily ... in fact it even came back to where it came. Which made things easier for Temari who knew exactly where her opponent was.

"Bitch please ... I can deflect hundread of weapons if I want!'

"That wind ... are you an air ..."

Sokka couldn't finish his sentence: Temari was already behind of him and knocked him with the edge of her hand. It seems that opponent was not strong at all and even didn't really look like a ninja ... and it was too real to be a genjutsu. Temari started to wonder where she was ... and what to do with him!

* Oh I know! * she thought. Temari remember she heard tickling could be a surprisingly effective method of torture to get what you wanted from someone. She then started to remove his boots and socks. Sokka's vision was blured, the last thing he remember was that girl who wanted to infiltrate the camp. He tried to attack her with his boomerang, but it was deflected by a powerful wind. When his vision became more distinct, he saw that girl again, Sokka started to panic. And that panic feeling increased even more when he noticed he was tied up and couldn't move his arms.


"Who ... who are you? What do you want?"

"I want some information. You better answer my questions correctly or else ...".

Sokka could see that girl was serious, so he felt cooperative ... as long as it wouldn't harm Aang and the rest of the gang.

"First question: where are we exactly?"
